1.name: Rocket Boots
1.description: Increase the cast range of Xplodium Charge by 30% and its damage by 35%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Xplodium Charge by 30% and its damage by 35%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Big Game Hunter
1.description: Increase maximum Scrap by 2. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes, Mercenaries, or Monsters accelerates Reduce, Reuse, Recycle Scrap regeneration by 1.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase maximum Scrap by 2. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes, Mercenaries, or Monsters accelerates Reduce, Reuse, Recycle Scrap regeneration by 1.5 seconds.

1.name: One Man Wrecking Crew
1.description: Casting Basic Abilities cause Gazlowe's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 60% more damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Casting Basic Abilities cause Gazlowe's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 60% more damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Rock It Sock It
4.description: Casting Rock-It! Turret grants Gazlowe a Shield that absorbs up to 200 (+4% per level) damage for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Casting Rock-It! Turret grants Gazlowe a Shield that absorbs up to 200 (+4% per level) damage for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Hyperfocus Coils
4.description: Heroes hit by Deth Lazor or Xplodium Charge take an additional 2% of their maximum Health in damage. Gazlowe is healed for 150% of the damage dealt.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Deth Lazor or Xplodium Charge take an additional 2% of their maximum Health in damage. Gazlowe is healed for 150% of the damage dealt.

4.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
4.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%, and reduce damage dealt by all nearby enemy Heroes and Summons by 50% for 3 seconds
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%, and reduce damage dealt by all nearby enemy Heroes and Summons by 50% for 3 seconds

7.name: Goblin Fusion
7.description: Generate 3 Scrap for each Hero hit by Deth Lazor.
7.longDescription: Generate 3 Scrap for each Hero hit by Deth Lazor.

7.name: Overload
7.description: Deth Lazor can now store up to 2 charges. Each enemy Hero hit by Deth Lazor reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Deth Lazor can now store up to 2 charges. Each enemy Hero hit by Deth Lazor reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Master Blaster
7.description: Deth Lazor and Xplodium Charge Slow enemies hit by 35% for 3 seconds. Rock-It! Turret Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed in this way extend the Slow duration by 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Deth Lazor and Xplodium Charge Slow enemies hit by 35% for 3 seconds. Rock-It! Turret Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed in this way extend the Slow duration by 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 90 (+4% per level) bonus damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
10.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 90 (+4% per level) bonus damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 220 (+4% per level) damage. Basic Abilities deal 30% more damage for 5 seconds after casting Grav-O-Bomb 3000.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 220 (+4% per level) damage. Basic Abilities deal 30% more damage for 5 seconds after casting Grav-O-Bomb 3000.

13.name: Positive Reinforcement
13.description: Primary Rock-It! Turret attacks against Heroes increase Gazlowe's Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Primary Rock-It! Turret attacks against Heroes increase Gazlowe's Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Superior Schematics
13.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage and have 30% increased Basic Attack range.
13.longDescription: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage and have 30% increased Basic Attack range.

13.name: Overcharged Capacitors
13.description: Gazlowe gains 5% Spell Power for each active Rock-It! Turret, up to a maximum of 15%. Dealing Basic Attack damage extends the duration of Rock-It! Turrets by 1.25 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gazlowe gains 5% Spell Power for each active Rock-It! Turret, up to a maximum of 15%. Dealing Basic Attack damage extends the duration of Rock-It! Turrets by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
16.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 125 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 125 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Ark Reaktor
16.description: Reduce the cooldown of Xplodium Charge by 2 seconds. Casting Xplodium Charge creates 3 miniature Rock-It! Turrets that last for 3 seconds.  These Turrets do not drop Scrap or benefit from other Talents.
16.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Xplodium Charge by 2 seconds. Casting Xplodium Charge creates 3 miniature Rock-It! Turrets that last for 3 seconds.  These Turrets do not drop Scrap or benefit from other Talents.

16.name: Overklock
16.description: Basic Attacks grant Gazlowe 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Dealing Basic Attack damage to Heroes causes them to take an additional 2.5% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks grant Gazlowe 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Dealing Basic Attack damage to Heroes causes them to take an additional 2.5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Gazlowe's Armor by 10 for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30, and deal 50% bonus damage to Stunned or Slowed enemies.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks increase Gazlowe's Armor by 10 for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30, and deal 50% bonus damage to Stunned or Slowed enemies.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increase Grav-O-Bomb 3000's radius by 25% and its damage by 50%. Each enemy Hero pulled reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase Grav-O-Bomb 3000's radius by 25% and its damage by 50%. Each enemy Hero pulled reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Reduce the Scrap cost of Rock-It! Turrets by 1. Regain 2 Scrap for each Scrap pickup.
20.longDescription: Reduce the Scrap cost of Rock-It! Turrets by 1. Regain 2 Scrap for each Scrap pickup.

20.name: Bomb Toss
20.description: Xplodium Charge gains a 2nd charge with a 3 second cooldown between uses and launches 2 more bombs when it detonates.
20.longDescription: Xplodium Charge gains a 2nd charge with a 3 second cooldown between uses and launches 2 more bombs when it detonates.

1.name: Bird of Prey
1.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.
1.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

1.name: Easy Prey
1.description: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Flare
1.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

4.name: Hungry Bear
4.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar and Misha's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.
4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar and Misha's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
4.description: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.
4.longDescription: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.name: Animal Husbandry
4.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.
4.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Taking Flight
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.

10.name: Bestial Wrath
10.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.
13.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
16.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Feign Death
16.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.
16.longDescription: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.
20.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Passive: Misha gains 15% Movement Speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.Type: Command, SummonTargeting: Unit target / Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: GlobalMishaType: Heroic PetScaling: 4.00390625% (damage), 4.76% (Health)Targeting: RetargetableSight radius: 7.0Leash radius: 17.25Killing Misha rewards a Takedown credit and 0.25 Hero kills/XP.When Misha is dead, killing Rexxar rewards a Takedown credit and 0.75 Hero kills/XP. If Misha is alive while Rexxar is killed, she dies as well, totaling a full Hero kill/XP and two Takedown credits.Misha's death timer is 14s+.5s/level.Rexxar becomes unable to control Misha while he is unable to act (Stunned, Dazed or put in Time Stop or Stasis, other than Feign Death) or Silenced.If Rexxar enters a Vehicle or is some other way removed from the battleground, Misha will be removed from the Battleground as well.Issuing Move and Attack commands to Misha doesn't dismount or break objective channels, hearthstone or dismount, but using Abilities will.Rexxar and Misha share the effects of Healing Fountains.Both Rexxar and Misha can pick up Regeneration Globes, but their effect is not shared.Misha's passive Movement Speed bonus does not stack with other Movement Speed bonuses, including the bonus from the 'return' command.When Rexxar is Mounted, Misha's Movement Speed bonus is increased to 40% while she is within 6 radius.

1.name: One-Two Punch
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Melee by 1 second and it gains an additional charge.
1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Melee by 1 second and it gains an additional charge.

1.name: Parting Gift
1.description: Recall leaves behind 6 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets. Heroes hit with these bombs are slowed by 50% for 0.75 seconds and grant 7% Pulse Bomb charge.
1.longDescription: Recall leaves behind 6 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets. Heroes hit with these bombs are slowed by 50% for 0.75 seconds and grant 7% Pulse Bomb charge.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 10%. Basic Attacks against Heroes reveal a small area around them for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 10%. Basic Attacks against Heroes reveal a small area around them for 3 seconds.

4.name: Leeching Rounds
4.description: Increase the healing from Basic Attacks by up to 200%, based on the amount of health Tracer is missing.
4.longDescription: Increase the healing from Basic Attacks by up to 200%, based on the amount of health Tracer is missing.

4.name: Pulse Generator
4.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero heals Tracer for 25% of her maximum Health over 1.5 seconds and refunds a charge of Blink.
4.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero heals Tracer for 25% of her maximum Health over 1.5 seconds and refunds a charge of Blink.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe instantly heals Tracer for 10% of her maximum Health and reduces the cooldown of Healing Fountain by 15 seconds.  Drinking from a Healing Fountain instantly heals for 20% of Tracer's maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Collecting a Regeneration Globe instantly heals Tracer for 10% of her maximum Health and reduces the cooldown of Healing Fountain by 15 seconds.  Drinking from a Healing Fountain instantly heals for 20% of Tracer's maximum Health.

7.name: Sleight of Hand
7.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.
7.longDescription: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

7.name: Focus Fire
7.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 80 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.
7.longDescription: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 80 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

7.name: Locked and Loaded
7.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.
7.longDescription: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are Slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are Slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 6% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.
10.longDescription: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 6% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Untouchable
13.description: Passive: After Blinking, gain 20% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.  Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 5%, up to 25%. These bonuses are lost on death.
13.longDescription: Passive: After Blinking, gain 20% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.  Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 5%, up to 25%. These bonuses are lost on death.

13.name: Jumper
13.description: Passive: When Blink has no charges remaining, its cooldown refreshes 150% faster.  Casting Blink grants Tracer a Shield equal to 8% of her maximum Health for 3 seconds. This Shield stacks up to 3 times.
13.longDescription: Passive: When Blink has no charges remaining, its cooldown refreshes 150% faster.  Casting Blink grants Tracer a Shield equal to 8% of her maximum Health for 3 seconds. This Shield stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Telefrag
13.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Recall by 0.1875 seconds.  When Tracer arrives at her Recall location she becomes Unkillable for 1 second and nearby enemies take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked back.
13.longDescription: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Recall by 0.1875 seconds.  When Tracer arrives at her Recall location she becomes Unkillable for 1 second and nearby enemies take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked back.

16.name: Bullet Spray
16.description: Increases the radius of Melee by 30%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.
16.longDescription: Increases the radius of Melee by 30%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

16.name: Heavy Handed
16.description: Heroes hit by Melee have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Melee have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Ricochet
16.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 60% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.
16.longDescription: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 60% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

20.name: Chrono Triggers
20.description: Casting Blink causes Basic Attacks to not consume ammo for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Casting Blink causes Basic Attacks to not consume ammo for 1 second.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge against Heroes from 10% to 20%. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knock the target away.
20.longDescription: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge against Heroes from 10% to 20%. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knock the target away.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.
20.longDescription: Recall heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.
20.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.8125 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.Basic Attacks heal Tracer for 10% of damage dealt.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantReload cannot be interrupted.Tracer's effective Attack Speed with Reload is ~4.85 per second.Reload activates automatically when Tracer successfully Mounts or Hearths at a partially loaded clip.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Charge Cooldown: 9 / 0.125 secondsDash toward an area. Stores up to 3 charges.Type: Movement: DashAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 6.0Missile speed: 60

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 220 damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00390625%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Automatic (closest)Cast time: InstantRange: 2.35Impact delay: 0.125 secondsCannot be activated if there is no targetable enemy within the cast range.Cannot target enemies that are not visible.Stops Tracer from Basic Attacking for 0.375 seconds upon activation.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Tracer returns to the position she was at 2 seconds ago, refilling her ammo and removing all negative status effects from herself.Type: Status effect, Movement: TeleportAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: StasisCan be cast while Rooted.Tracer is put in Stasis for 1.25 seconds before reappearing, removing most debuffs and making her untargetable and immune to damage.Teleport to end location takes place 0.0625 seconds after the Ability is cast.The destination of Recall is visible to enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to an enemy if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds, dealing 298 damage to them and 149 damage to other nearby enemies.This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 6.00585938%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SkillshotCast time: InstantRange: 3.6Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Center: 0.75 (ground only)- Outer: 2.5Hitbox: 1.25 x 1.0Missile speed: 32The Ability is available from the start of the game with 0% charge.Basic Attacks grant 0.75% charge each. This amount is unaffected by any damage modifiers on Tracer or her target.Enemies that walk over the center of the bomb while it's on the ground are considered primary targets and take the same damage as if the bomb were attached to them.Pulse Bomb will not attach to Structures, and will instead go through or land under them.

1.name: Nerubian Armor
1.description: Increase Hardened Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.
1.longDescription: Increase Hardened Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.

1.name: Legion of Beetles
1.description: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.
1.longDescription: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Bed of Barbs
4.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Shed Exoskeleton
4.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.
4.longDescription: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

7.name: Subterranean Shield
7.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles gain 30% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.
7.longDescription: Beetles gain 30% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

10.name: Locust Swarm
10.description: Deal 68 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 68 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.
10.longDescription: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Urticating Spines
13.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.
13.longDescription: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

13.name: Burning Beetles
13.description: Deal 21 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Beetles deal 6 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Deal 21 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Beetles deal 6 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

16.name: Debilitation
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge or Impale have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge or Impale have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: Passive: Beetles gain 30% increased health.  Every 4th Basic Attack spawns a Beetle.
16.longDescription: Passive: Beetles gain 30% increased health.  Every 4th Basic Attack spawns a Beetle.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 165 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 80 (+4% per level) health.
20.longDescription: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 165 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 80 (+4% per level) health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 6 seconds per Cocoon. Upon exiting the Cocoon, enemies take 50 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage is increased by 100% for each second that they were inside.
20.longDescription: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 6 seconds per Cocoon. Upon exiting the Cocoon, enemies take 50 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage is increased by 100% for each second that they were inside.

20.name: The Traitor King
20.description: Gain 10% bonus maximum Health and 20 Spell Armor.  Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Gain 10% bonus maximum Health and 20 Spell Armor.  Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Scarab Host
abilities.description: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 damage.Type: SummonTargeting: No targetBeetleType: ActiveScaling: 4.00% (damage & Health)Targeting: AutomaticHealth: 285Basic Attack damage: 20Attack speed: 1.00Attack range: 0.75Movement Speed: 4.0Sight radius: 7.0Beetles spawn randomly in one of eight possible locations around Anub'arak.If Anub'arak is attacking an enemy when a Beetle is spawned, the Beetle will also attempt to attack that target.If Anub'arak is not attacking anything when a Beetle is spawned, the Beetle will attempt to find a nearby target to attack. If an enemy Hero is close enough it will be prioritized.Beetles will then attack and pursue a target found this way until that enemy dies, or the Beetles lose track of the target (through teleporting away, for example). Only then will the Beetles return to a lane.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Deals 90 damage. Stuns for 1 second.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Piercing Skillshot, StunCast time: InstantRange: 12.5Hitbox: 1.5 x 2.0Missile speed: 10

abilities.name: Harden Carapace
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 340 damage over 3 seconds.Type: Shield, Defensive damage modifierScaling: 4.00%Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Spell ArmorCast time: InstantDamage is dealt to shield after modifications.Spell Armor ends immediately if the shield breaks.Does not stack with other positive Spell Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

abilities.name: Burrow Charge
abilities.description: Burrows to location, dealing 91 damage and briefly Stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, Slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Slow, Stun, UnstoppableCast time: 0.0625 + 0.15 secondsRange: 13.25Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 1.75Missile speed: 12Stun duration: 0.5 secondsBurrow Charge grants Anub'arak Unstoppable for its duration. Regardless, Burrow Charge cannot be cast while Rooted like other Movement Abilities.Scarab Host spawns the Beetle after Anub'arak resurfaces.

abilities.name: Locust Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 68 damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 24 Health. Lasts 6 seconds.Type: Spell Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00% (both)Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 5.125Tickrate: 1.0 per second (x6)

abilities.name: Cocoon
abilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.Type: SummonAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Unit targetCast time: 0.2 + 0 secondsRange: 6.0Missile speed: 20CocoonType: PassiveScaling: - (health)Health: 28 (1Basic Attack damage: -Movement Speed: -Sight radius: 8.01) Cocoon takes 2 damage for every instance of damage, effectively reducing its remaining duration by 0.5 seconds.Enemies inside the Cocoon are put in debuff Stasis, preventing interaction with them until they are freed.Minions, Structures and friendly Mercenaries do not attack the cocoon.

1.name: Greater Polymorph
1.description: Passive: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%.  If Brightwing hits an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center within 2 seconds of being Polymorphed, then reduce Polymorph's cooldown by 7 seconds and gain 50 Mana.
1.longDescription: Passive: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%.  If Brightwing hits an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center within 2 seconds of being Polymorphed, then reduce Polymorph's cooldown by 7 seconds and gain 50 Mana.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 8% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 8% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.
1.longDescription: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

4.name: Dream Shot
4.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Magic Spit
4.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 6 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 6 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Flare
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

7.name: Peekaboo!
7.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) Shield for 4 seconds and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) Shield for 4 seconds and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

7.name: Critical Mist
7.description: Soothing Mist heals allied Heroes for 165 (+4% per level). Increase this healing by 140% if Soothing Mist removed a disabling effect from that ally.
7.longDescription: Soothing Mist heals allied Heroes for 165 (+4% per level). Increase this healing by 140% if Soothing Mist removed a disabling effect from that ally.

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

13.name: Safety Dust
13.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Soothing Mist and Blink Heal heal allies with an active Pixie Dust for 75% more.
13.longDescription: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Soothing Mist and Blink Heal heal allies with an active Pixie Dust for 75% more.

13.name: Pixie Power
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

16.name: Hush!
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.
16.longDescription: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Phase Out
16.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Invisible Friends
20.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
20.longDescription: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

20.name: Intensive Winds
20.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.name: Speedy Dragon
20.description: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed. Reduce Phase Shift's cast time by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed. Reduce Phase Shift's cast time by 1 second.

20.name: Faerie Protector
20.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.  Passive: Pixie Dust always bounces back and applies to Brightwing.
20.longDescription: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.  Passive: Pixie Dust always bounces back and applies to Brightwing.

abilities.name: Soothing Mist
abilities.description: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.Passive: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 115 every 4 seconds.Type: CC removal (active) / Healing (passive)Scaling: 4.00%Affects: Allied Heroes, SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: - Initial: 1.0- End: 7.0Expands to its maximum radius over 0.6 seconds.Passive heal does not trigger if Brightwing and all targetable allied Heroes in range are at full Health, but instead remains at 0 cooldown and automatically activates just after any valid target takes damage.Upon entering a Vehicle, the cooldown from the Passive is frozen at its value prior to entering, and resumes counting down from there upon exiting.If Brightwing enters a Vehicle while the Ability is off cooldown (usually because it hasn't triggered in awhile as Brightwing and any allied Heroes in range are all at full Health), the passive heal from this Ability will trigger from the Vehicle exactly one time as soon as any targetable allied Hero in range is not at full Health.

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Shoot a flare dealing 75 damage to enemies hit, and an additional 105 damage to enemies in the center. abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: After 2 seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for 25% of their maximum Health.Type: Healing / Movement: TeleportScaling: -Affects: Allied Heroes / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 2.0 + 0 secondsRange: GlobalInterrupting the Ability during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.

1.name: Widowmakers
1.description: Enemies hit by Corpse Spiders' jar are Slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.  Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30% and their duration is increased by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Enemies hit by Corpse Spiders' jar are Slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.  Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30% and their duration is increased by 1 second.

1.name: Pandemic
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Plague of Toads.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.  Reward: After hitting 80 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it reduces the damage Heroes deal by 5%, stacking up to 25%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Plague of Toads.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.  Reward: After hitting 80 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it reduces the damage Heroes deal by 5%, stacking up to 25%.

1.name: Thing of the Deep
1.description: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.  Reward: After gaining 50 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain 5% Spell Power.  Reward: After gaining 100 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain an additional 5% Spell Power.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.  Reward: After gaining 50 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain 5% Spell Power.  Reward: After gaining 100 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain an additional 5% Spell Power.

4.name: Hexed Crawlers
4.description: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.
4.longDescription: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

4.name: Big Voodoo
4.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.
4.longDescription: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.name: Blood Ritual
4.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.  Passive: Takedowns grant 5 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.
4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.  Passive: Takedowns grant 5 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.

7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
7.description: The number of Corpse Spiders spawned is increased from 3 to 4. If Corpse Spiders' jar hits only one enemy, it creates an additional spider.
7.longDescription: The number of Corpse Spiders spawned is increased from 3 to 4. If Corpse Spiders' jar hits only one enemy, it creates an additional spider.

7.name: Dead Rush
7.description: Zombie Wall deals 100% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Zombie Wall deals 100% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Toads of Hugeness
7.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.
7.longDescription: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

10.name: Gargantuan
10.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.name: Ravenous Spirit
10.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 230 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 230 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Guardian Toads
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads grants 30 Armor for 2 seconds, stacking up to 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads grants 30 Armor for 2 seconds, stacking up to 6 seconds.

13.name: Superstition
13.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds and spawn a Corpse Spider to attack the Hero.
13.longDescription: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds and spawn a Corpse Spider to attack the Hero.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Spider Colony
16.description: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds and the cooldown of Corpse Spiders by 0.125 seconds.
16.longDescription: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds and the cooldown of Corpse Spiders by 0.125 seconds.

16.name: Ring of Poison
16.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.
16.longDescription: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.name: Soul Harvest
16.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

20.name: Humongoid
20.description: Gargantuan Stomp's area is increased by 25% and its slow amount is increased to 50%.  Passive: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.
20.longDescription: Gargantuan Stomp's area is increased by 25% and its slow amount is increased to 50%.  Passive: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.name: Annihilating Spirit
20.description: When Ravenous Spirit damages an enemy Hero, reduce their healing received by 50% for 1 second and increase Ravenous Spirit's damage by 5% for the rest of its duration.  Passive: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50%.
20.longDescription: When Ravenous Spirit damages an enemy Hero, reduce their healing received by 50% for 1 second and increase Ravenous Spirit's damage by 5% for the rest of its duration.  Passive: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50%.

20.name: Vile Infection
20.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.

20.name: Bad Medicine
20.description: Consume 5 stacks of Voodoo Ritual to become Unstoppable, gain 20% increased Movement Speed, and 50 Armor for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Consume 5 stacks of Voodoo Ritual to become Unstoppable, gain 20% increased Movement Speed, and 50 Armor for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Voodoo Ritual
abilities.description: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 66 additional damage over 6 seconds.❢  Quest: If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.Type: Spell Damage / Bonus Health, Bonus ManaScaling: 4.00% (damage) / - (bonuses)Affects: Non-Heroic enemies / SelfProperties: Attack Modifier, Damage over TimeTickrate: 1.0 per second (x6)Damage per tick: 11Damage over Time effect does not stack. Subsequent applications refresh the duration.

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 38 damage. abilities.name: Plague of Toads

1.name: Ranger

1.longDescription: Sentinel pierces the first Hero hit. Its width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

1.longDescription: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%.  Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

1.longDescription: Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 30%.  Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark, increase the bonus of Trueshot Aura to 30%, and apply it to other nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.

4.longDescription: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 80% more.

4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Marked targets Heal all nearby allied Heroes for 4% of their maximum Health.

4.longDescription: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for 175% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

7.longDescription: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

7.longDescription: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Shadowstalk

10.longDescription: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

10.longDescription: Deal 92 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Sentinel Slows enemies hit by 35% and reduces their damage dealt by 35% for 4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 2 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets reduce the cooldown of Lunar Flare by 4 seconds.

16.name: Celestial Attunement

16.longDescription: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

16.longDescription: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. Heroes hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 12% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds.

20.longDescription: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 10 seconds and heals for 50% more.

20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Starfall to 40% and cause it to apply Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

20.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 30 Armor for 5 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds and Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage. While under 25% Health, this damage bonus is increased to 60%.

10.name: Suppression Pulse

10.longDescription: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.longDescription: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 6 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 50 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 2 seconds.

13.longDescription: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

16.longDescription: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.longDescription: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.longDescription: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Zealot Charge

20.longDescription: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 75%.

20.longDescription: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

1.name: Consume Vitality

1.longDescription: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

1.longDescription: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1.25% of his maximum Health and 6 Mana.

1.longDescription: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

4.description: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

4.longDescription: Skeletal Swing deals 75% additional damage to Mercenaries and Monsters, and hitting them activates Skeletal Swing's cost and cooldown refund.

7.name: Willing Vessel

7.longDescription: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

7.longDescription: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Hopelessness
7.description: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

10.name: Entomb
10.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

10.name: March of the Black King
10.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.
10.longDescription: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Unyielding Despair
13.description: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.75 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.75 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

13.name: Ominous Wraith
13.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Spectral Leech

13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

16.name: Crushing Hope
16.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.
16.longDescription: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.
16.longDescription: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.name: Mithril Mace

16.longDescription: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.name: Buried Alive

20.longDescription: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.name: Death March
20.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.  While Drain Hope is active, gain 40 Armor and the damage and area is increased by 100%.
20.longDescription: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.  While Drain Hope is active, gain 40 Armor and the damage and area is increased by 100%.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.Type: Special death stateAffects: SelfLeoric can use Ghastly Swing (Q), Drain Essence (W) and Hearth and provide vision while Undying. Leoric cannot Mount, use other Abilities or interact with other units in any other way while Undying, unless otherwise noted.Leoric is untargetable by everything while Undying and cannot be interacted with.Leoric can pass through pathing blockers and enemy Gates while Undying, but not through real terrain.Reaching full Health while Undying automatically resurrects him at his current location after 1 second. Leoric is still Undying, but unable to act for the duration of the resurrection sequence.If an ally is mounted with the Caboose Mount, Leoric can right click on them even in this form to Mount and connect to them. This lets him traverse the map much more quickly than normal, since otherwise he cannot Mount or use E in this form.Wrath Of The Bone KingLeoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 225% damage to a single target.Type: Physical Damage / Offensive damage modifierScaling: -Affects: Enemies / SelfProperties: Attack Modifier, SplashArea of Effect: RadialRadius: 3.5Arc: 220 degreesDamage bonus of the third attack (+125%) stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Leoric's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first two targets.
4.longDescription: Frostbolt will now pierce the first two targets.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.  Passive: While above 75% Mana, Jaina gains 10% Spell Power.
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.  Passive: While above 75% Mana, Jaina gains 10% Spell Power.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.
4.longDescription: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, doubled against chilled Heroes, up to a maximum of 8 seconds per use.
7.longDescription: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, doubled against chilled Heroes, up to a maximum of 8 seconds per use.

7.name: Icefury Wand

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Chilled enemies deal 50% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1.25 seconds.  Doubled against enemy Heroes.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.
13.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins

13.longDescription: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 50%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 100%.
16.longDescription: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 50%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 100%.

16.name: Northern Exposure

16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.
16.longDescription: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 15 seconds.
20.longDescription: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 15 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.
20.longDescription: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

1.name: Salvation

1.longDescription: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 80% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

1.name: Ardent Restoration

1.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 20 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.  Quest: Every Regeneration Globe gathered increases this heal amount by 1%.

4.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 3 seconds after teleporting.

4.longDescription: Heroes hit by El'druin's Might heal Tyrael for 3% of his maximum Health. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

7.longDescription: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 190 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Purge Evil

7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 60% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Swift Retribution

7.longDescription: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

13.longDescription: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

13.name: Law and Order

13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 35%.

16.longDescription: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Smite the Wicked
16.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.
16.longDescription: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.

20.name: Seal of El'Druin
20.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Defense of the Angels

20.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 3 seconds.  Each time Tyrael damages an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Basic Ability, increase the duration of this Armor bonus by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Unyielding Power
