1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile gains an additional charge.

1.name: Furious Spark
1.description: Every 3rd hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 65 (+4% per level) bonus damage and grants Mephisto 2 Mana.
1.longDescription: Every 3rd hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 65 (+4% per level) bonus damage and grants Mephisto 2 Mana.

1.name: Malicious Intent
1.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 25% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then increase the duration of the Spell Power bonus to 10 seconds after it ends.
1.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 25% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then increase the duration of the Spell Power bonus to 10 seconds after it ends.

4.name: Hateful Mending
4.description: Skull Missile grants 10 Mana and heals Mephisto for 70% of the damage it deals to Heroes.
4.longDescription: Skull Missile grants 10 Mana and heals Mephisto for 70% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

4.name: Static Barrier
4.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Spite
4.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 150%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second.
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 150%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

7.name: Ghastly Armor
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 25 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.
7.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 25 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

7.name: Frost Storm
7.description: While Shade of Mephisto is active, enemies who are hit by Lightning Nova are Slowed by 15% for 1 second and the Slow from Skull Missile is increased to 50%.
7.longDescription: While Shade of Mephisto is active, enemies who are hit by Lightning Nova are Slowed by 15% for 1 second and the Slow from Skull Missile is increased to 50%.

7.name: Trickery
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then reset the cooldown of Shade of Mephisto.
7.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then reset the cooldown of Shade of Mephisto.

10.name: Consume Souls
10.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Durance of Hate
10.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

13.name: Abhorred Skull
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 25% Spell Power for 6 seconds. Skull Missile deals 40% more damage to Heroes under 50% Health.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 25% Spell Power for 6 seconds. Skull Missile deals 40% more damage to Heroes under 50% Health.

13.name: Hysteria
13.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.  Mephisto is healed for 15% of his maximum Health and Mana when he casts his Heroic Ability.
13.longDescription: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.  Mephisto is healed for 15% of his maximum Health and Mana when he casts his Heroic Ability.

13.name: Shard of Hate
13.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.

16.name: Lightning Reaction
16.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

16.name: Static Field
16.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Animosity
16.description: Increase the duration of Lightning Nova by 1 second and the maximum amount of bonus damage it can deal from 30% to 42%.
16.longDescription: Increase the duration of Lightning Nova by 1 second and the maximum amount of bonus damage it can deal from 30% to 42%.

20.name: Consumed by Hatred
20.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.
20.longDescription: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

20.name: Unspeakable Horror
20.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies while they are Rooted and for 3 seconds after its Root expires.
20.longDescription: Durance of Hate Silences enemies while they are Rooted and for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

20.name: Mimic
20.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.
20.longDescription: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

20.name: Shade Lord
20.description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.
20.longDescription: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

abilities.name: Lord Of Hatred
abilities.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns. Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.

abilities.name: Skull Missile
abilities.description: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.625 seconds, dealing 127 damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Skillshot, SlowCast time: 0 + 0.125 secondsRange: 12.5Hitbox: 2 x 1.8Missile speed: 19

abilities.name: Lightning Nova
abilities.description: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 43 damage every 0.25 seconds. Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsArea of Effect: RingRadius: - Inner: 4.5- Outer: 5.25Tickrate: 4.0 per second (x11)Damage per tick: 43Mephisto's 4.5 Basic Attack Range is the same as the Lightning Nova's inner radius, meaning that AA move puts him at the correct distance.Damage bonus stacks additively with itself and other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Lightning Nova's damage.

abilities.name: Shade of Mephisto
abilities.description: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location. After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: Teleport (primary cast)Scaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Self-castableCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 7.5Radius: 2.5Does not damage on return.The return always triggers regardless of any positive or negative status effects on Mephisto, with the exception of Stasis, which fully prevents relocation back to Shade's position.Teleporting back dismounts, interrupts mounting, Hearthing and channeling objectives, but does not interrupt channeling Mephisto's Heroic Abilities or Warhead Junction's Nukes.

abilities.name: Consume Souls
abilities.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: No targetProperties: Revealed, Slow, Stationary channelCast time: 0 + CH + 0 secondsRange: GlobalInterrupting the cast puts the Ability on full cooldown.

abilities.name: Durance of Hate
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 damage to them over the same duration.Durance of Hate spreads outward from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), Damage over Time, Root, SkillshotCast time: 1.0 (ch) + 0 secondsRange: 15Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Initial: 0.25- Final: 5.5 (1Hitbox: 2.0 x 1.25Missile speed: 22Tickrate: 4.0 per second (x8)Damage per tick: 251) The area grows in increments of 0.5625 radius every 0.1875 seconds, reaching its maximum radius after 2.0625 seconds.Interrupting the Ability during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.If Mephisto teleports back with Shade of Mephisto during the cast time, the wave is unleashed in the direction of target point.Enemies that are immune to skillshots cannot be hit by the initial missile, but can be affected by the spreading area, as long as they are not also immune to AoE.

1.name: En Pointe
1.description: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end and grants 1 additional Chaos.
1.longDescription: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end and grants 1 additional Chaos.

1.name: Growing Nightmare
1.description: Increase Dread's damage by 50%.   Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single cast of Dread's eruption.  Reward: Permanently increase Dread's eruption damage by 50% and increase the Slow amount of Dread's eruption by 15%.
1.longDescription: Increase Dread's damage by 50%.   Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single cast of Dread's eruption.  Reward: Permanently increase Dread's eruption damage by 50% and increase the Slow amount of Dread's eruption by 15%.

1.name: Ancestral Strength
1.description: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 15% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies. Enemy Heroes who are hit with Overflowing Chaos are Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 15% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies. Enemy Heroes who are hit with Overflowing Chaos are Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Allegrissimo
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Shadow Waltz by 1 second.  Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Shadow Waltz by 1 second.  Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Backbiter
4.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.
4.longDescription: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.

4.name: Chaotic Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes while having 3 stacks of Chaos deal an additional 75% bonus damage.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes while having 3 stacks of Chaos deal an additional 75% bonus damage.

7.name: Insatiable
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 2 seconds.

7.name: Ravenous Hunger
7.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

7.name: Mind Devourer
7.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.
7.longDescription: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

10.name: Eternal Feast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

10.name: Crushing Jaws
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Determination
13.description: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.
13.longDescription: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

13.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos and a 170 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos and a 170 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.

13.name: Invasive Miasma
13.description: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.
13.longDescription: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

16.name: Bond of Anguish
16.description: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.
16.longDescription: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

16.name: Dead Magic
16.description: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 90 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to the target and all enemies around them.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 90 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to the target and all enemies around them.

16.name: Lurking Terror
16.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area. Enemy Heroes hit by this Chomp are Slowed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area. Enemy Heroes hit by this Chomp are Slowed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Monster Within
20.description: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active and for 5 seconds afterwards, Orphea's Basic Abilities recharge 150% faster.
20.longDescription: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active and for 5 seconds afterwards, Orphea's Basic Abilities recharge 150% faster.

20.name: Engulfing Oblivion
20.description: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 50 for 3 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 50 for 3 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.name: Eldritch Conduit
20.description: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

20.name: Final Toccata
20.description: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 5 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown and increases the duration of Final Toccata by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 5 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown and increases the duration of Final Toccata by 1 second.

abilities.name: Overflowing Chaos
abilities.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants 1 Chaos. Chaos can stack up to 3 times. While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consume all Chaos, dealing 50% increased damage per stack, and healing for 100% of the damage dealt.Type: Healing, Offensive damage modifierScaling: -Affects: SelfProperties: Attack Modifier, LifestealChaos stacks additively with itself and multiplicatively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Orphea's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Waltz
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 165 damage to enemies in a line. During this time the first movement command issued, including Ability and attack orders that require her to move in their range, causes Orphea to dash in that direction.Can be cast while Rooted, but Orphea cannot dash afterward if she was/became Rooted after hitting an enemy Hero.Orphea cannot attack while dashing.

abilities.name: Crushing Jaws

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.
1.longDescription: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 15% and Basic Attacks against Heroes grant an additional stack of You Want Axe?.
1.longDescription: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 15% and Basic Attacks against Heroes grant an additional stack of You Want Axe?.

1.name: Headhunter
1.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.
1.longDescription: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Troll's Blood
4.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
4.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.
4.longDescription: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.name: Amani Hide
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.
4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.description: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 45%.
7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 45%.

7.name: Arcanite Axes
7.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.
7.longDescription: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.
7.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!
10.longDescription: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.
10.longDescription: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds. If no Heroes are hit, Ensnare's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds. If no Heroes are hit, Ensnare's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor and deal an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor and deal an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.
16.longDescription: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.
20.longDescription: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.
20.longDescription: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
20.longDescription: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

20.name: A Surprise For Ya
20.description: Basic Attacks bounce to a nearby enemy for 50% damage, prioritizing enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks bounce to a nearby enemy for 50% damage, prioritizing enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: Cooldown: 0.5 secondsActivate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.Type: Offensive damage modifier, Self-Damage, Status effectScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No target (toggle)Properties: Attack SpeedCast time: InstantToggling Berserker on or off does not dismount.Self-damage is not lethal.Self-damage consumes Health regardless of the attacks hitting or not.Berserker Attack Speed bonus stacks additively with itself and other effects that affect Attack Speed.Damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage.You Want Axe?❢  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.❢ Reward: After attacking 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.❢ Reward: After attacking 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.Type: Bonus damageScaling: -Affects: SelfMaximum damage bonus: 500 (2500 stacks)Continues to gain stacks even after the quest is completed.

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. abilities.name: Guillotine

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.
1.longDescription: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Unending Hatred
1.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Reflexive Block
4.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.
4.longDescription: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

4.name: Thirsting Blade
4.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.
4.longDescription: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

4.name: Hunter's Onslaught
4.description: Basic Abilities heal for 35% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.
4.longDescription: Basic Abilities heal for 35% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

7.name: Rapid Chase
7.description: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

7.name: Friend or Foe
7.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.
7.longDescription: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

7.name: Unbound
7.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.
7.longDescription: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.
10.longDescription: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
10.longDescription: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
13.longDescription: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.
13.longDescription: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.
13.longDescription: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 3rd attack against the same Hero deals an additional 7% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd attack against the same Hero deals an additional 7% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.
20.longDescription: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.
20.longDescription: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Betrayer's Thirst
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce Ability cooldowns by 1 second.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: SelfProperties: Attack Modifier (enemies), LifestealCooldown reduction affects both Heroic and Basic Abilities, but not active Abilities gained from Talents.Getting Blinded makes you unable to hit enemies and gain cooldown reduction or lifesteal.

abilities.name: Dive

If the target dies, Illidan does not get flipped to the other side.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash toward target point, dealing 119 damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases Illidan's Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.Type: Spell Damage / Offensive damage modifier, Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: InstantRange: 5.5Hitbox: 3.0 x 2.55Missile speed: 14.4Does not stack with itself. Consecutive applications refresh the duration.Damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Illidan's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: EvasionCast time: Instant

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. abilities.name: The Hunt

1.name: Winged Guard
1.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Aura
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 30% of Physical Damage dealt, and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.
1.longDescription: Mal'Ganis heals for 30% of Physical Damage dealt, and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.

1.name: Time to Feed
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 70 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero, but is also refreshed when they are Slept by Night Rush.
1.longDescription: Mal'Ganis heals for 70 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero, but is also refreshed when they are Slept by Night Rush.

4.name: Fueled by Torment
4.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 12 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 20% more Hero damage into healing.
4.longDescription: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 12 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 20% more Hero damage into healing.

4.name: Might of Sargeras
4.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50.
4.longDescription: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50.

4.name: Echo of Doom
4.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 68 (+4% per level) damage.  For each enemy Hero hit, gain 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Necrotic Embrace by 0.75 seconds.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.
4.longDescription: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 68 (+4% per level) damage.  For each enemy Hero hit, gain 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Necrotic Embrace by 0.75 seconds.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Black Claws
7.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage and reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes by 15 for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage and reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes by 15 for 2 seconds.

7.name: Will of Tichondrius
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws causes the final slash to steal 1% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes, up to 4%.  If at least 4 enemy Heroes are hit with the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws, then the final slash Stuns enemies for an additional 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws causes the final slash to steal 1% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes, up to 4%.  If at least 4 enemy Heroes are hit with the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws, then the final slash Stuns enemies for an additional 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Spreading Plague
7.description: After casting Night Rush, deal 33 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.  This effect lasts for 5 seconds and Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh its duration.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.
7.longDescription: After casting Night Rush, deal 33 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.  This effect lasts for 5 seconds and Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh its duration.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

10.name: Carrion Swarm
10.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

10.name: Dark Conversion
10.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

13.name: Deep Sleep
13.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.
13.longDescription: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

13.name: The Night Beckons
13.description: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to Sleeping enemies.  After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to Sleeping enemies.  After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Blood Rush
13.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 15%.
13.longDescription: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 15%.

16.name: Plague Bats
16.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Frenzied Assault
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage heal for an additional 50% of damage dealt.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with a lower Health percentage grant 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage heal for an additional 50% of damage dealt.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with a lower Health percentage grant 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

16.name: Blind as a Bat
16.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.   Enemy Heroes hit by the final slash of Fel Claws reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.   Enemy Heroes hit by the final slash of Fel Claws reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 4 seconds.

20.name: Seeker Swarm
20.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
20.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

20.name: Vanquish the Weak
20.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.
20.longDescription: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

20.name: Alone in the Dark
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Night Rush by 4 seconds.  Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Night Rush by 4 seconds.  Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

abilities.name: Vampiric Touch

abilities.name: Fel Claws
abilities.description: Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 66 damage to enemies.Reactivate to slash up to 2 more times. The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Piercing Skillshot, Stun (third cast)Cast time: - First & second: 0 + 0.15 seconds- Third: 0.15 + 0.05 secondsRange: - First & second: 3.25- Third: 4.6025Hitbox: - First & second: 4.25 x 1.425- Third: 3 x 2.5End area radius: 2.125 (1End area arc: 180 degrees (1Dash speed: 13Dash duration: - First & second: 0.25 seconds- Third: 0.3125 secondsReactivation time: 3 seconds1) The last part of the first and second dashes' damage area is a half circle in front of Mal'Ganis.Cooldown starts immediately upon the first cast.The first 0.25 seconds of the third dash's Stun knocks the enemies up in the air. This effect is purely visual.

abilities.name: Necrotic Embrace
abilities.description: Desecrate the air, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and gaining 25 Armor for 3 seconds.Type: Spell Damage / Defensive damage modifierScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, ArmorCast time: InstantRadius: 3.5Does not stack with other positive Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

abilities.name: Night Rush
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.Type: Crowd control / Status effectAffects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Mobile channel, Movement Speed buff, SleepCast time: 0.75 + CH + 0Area of Effect: RadialRadius: 1.3Arc: 205 degreesNight Rush can be reactivated after 0.5 seconds to end its effect early.Mal'Ganis can use Necrotic Embrace during Night Rush without breaking the channel. Using any other ability interrupts Night Rush immediately.Mal'Ganis cannot use Basic Attacks during Night Rush.Sleep counts as a Stun effect and interacts with all effects that interact with Stuns.

abilities.name: Carrion Swarm
abilities.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 damage per second to enemies. Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.Type: Spell Damage / Status effectScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (mobile), StasisCast time: 1.0 (ch) + 0Area of Effect: Radial (x3) (1Radius: 4.0Arc: 45 degreesTickrate: 2.0 per second (x6)Damage per tick: 601) Carrion Swarm's damage area consists of three cones in "opposite" directions that rotate every 0.0625s between three possible orientations. Regardless, enemies can only be damaged by the Ability once every 0.5 seconds.Interrupting the ability during its cast puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Mal'Ganis can move, but cannot use Abilities both while channeling and during Carrion Swarm.Carrion Swarm removes most negative effects from Mal'Ganis once the channel finishes and Mal'Ganis enters Stasis.Carrion Swarm sets the base lifesteal bonus to 75% against all enemies, which is against non-Heroic enemies reduced multiplicatively by 87.1%, resulting in 9.675% lifesteal when no other lifesteal effects are in place.Stacks additively with Vampiric Touch bonuses from Fueled by Torment and Vanquish the Weak as well as other sources of lifesteal.

abilities.name: Dark Conversion
abilities.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.Type: Spell Damage / HealingScaling: -Affects: Non-Vehicle Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Unit TargetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Damage over time, Heal over timeCast time: 0.75 (ch) + 0.15 secondsRange: 3.75Tickrate: 2.0 per second (x6)Interrupting the ability during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Cast is interrupted if the target moves at least 3 units past its maximum range.Despite being based on percentage of target's Health, Dark Conversion is  not considered Percent Damage. Its damage can be affected by damage modifiers, such as Armor and Spell Power.Heal over time persists even in the case that the DoT is removed.Dark Conversion's damage is not affected by the lifesteal from Vampiric Touch.If Mal'Ganis has a higher percentage of Health than the target enemy Hero, the ability will instead damage Mal'Ganis while healing the enemy Hero, and can even deal fatal damage to Mal'Ganis.

1.name: Consuming Fire
1.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.
1.longDescription: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

1.name: Calloused Hide
1.description: While under 60% maximum Health, Cho gains 15% increased Movement Speed and healing received.
1.longDescription: While under 60% maximum Health, Cho gains 15% increased Movement Speed and healing received.

1.name: The Will of Cho
1.description: Quest: Killing enemy Minions grants 1 stack of The Will of Cho, and Hero takedowns grant 10 stacks.  Gain 1 Armor for every 30 stacks of The Will of Cho, up to a maximum of 10 Armor.  This Armor bonus stacks with Ogre Hide.
1.longDescription: Quest: Killing enemy Minions grants 1 stack of The Will of Cho, and Hero takedowns grant 10 stacks.  Gain 1 Armor for every 30 stacks of The Will of Cho, up to a maximum of 10 Armor.  This Armor bonus stacks with Ogre Hide.

4.name: Uppercut
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their max Health and reduces the cooldown of Surging Fist by 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their max Health and reduces the cooldown of Surging Fist by 5 seconds.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.
4.longDescription: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

4.name: Seared Flesh
4.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to enemy Heroes deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a non-Heroic enemy is attacked.
4.longDescription: Each consecutive Basic Attack to enemy Heroes deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a non-Heroic enemy is attacked.

7.name: Power Surge
7.description: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Surging Fist are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  Gain 15% Movement Speed while charging Surging Fist and for 2.5 seconds after casting the Ability.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Surging Fist are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  Gain 15% Movement Speed while charging Surging Fist and for 2.5 seconds after casting the Ability.

7.name: Firestarter
7.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

7.name: Enraged Regeneration
7.description: Each time Cho hits an enemy Hero with an Ability or Basic Attack, he heals for 60 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Gall's Dread Orb receive 35% less healing for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each time Cho hits an enemy Hero with an Ability or Basic Attack, he heals for 60 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Gall's Dread Orb receive 35% less healing for 2 seconds.

10.name: Hammer of Twilight
10.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

10.name: Upheaval
10.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Surging Dash
13.description: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.
13.longDescription: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

13.name: Twilight Veil
13.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide to 75 for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.
13.longDescription: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide to 75 for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

13.name: Molten Block
13.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.
13.longDescription: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

16.name: Frenzied Fists
16.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.
16.longDescription: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

16.name: Runic Feedback
16.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Runed Gauntlet
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 6%.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 6%.

20.name: C'Thun's Gift
20.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 2 seconds.

20.name: Fuel for the Flame
20.description: Basic Attacks against enemies cause them to explode, dealing 21 (+4% per level) damage to them and 45 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  This damage is doubled against enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemies cause them to explode, dealing 21 (+4% per level) damage to them and 45 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  This damage is doubled against enemy Heroes.

20.name: Hour of Twilight
20.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

4.longDescription: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

7.longDescription: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 12% damage, to a maximum of 60%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.

10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

13.longDescription: Increase Gall's damage to enemy Heroes by 10%. Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

7.longDescription: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds have an additional 1.5 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

Grunts deal 39 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

Grunts deal 39 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

13.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

16.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Olaf the Stout
1.description: Passive: Olaf gains 20% bonus maximum Health.  Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Passive: Olaf gains 20% bonus maximum Health.  Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Spy Games
1.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving and once removed, Erik gains 75% bonus Basic Attack damage for 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving and once removed, Erik gains 75% bonus Basic Attack damage for 6 seconds.

1.name: Explosive Attacks
1.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.
1.longDescription: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

1.name: Viking Bribery
1.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0
1.longDescription: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
4.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.
4.longDescription: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.name: Erik the Swift
4.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.
4.longDescription: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: It's a Sabotage!
4.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 3 seconds, causing 225 (+4% per level) damage.
4.longDescription: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 3 seconds, causing 225 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Baleog the Fierce
7.description: Increase Baleog's attack range by 2.5.  While near Olaf and Erik, he becomes inspired by the power of teamwork and his Attack Speed is increased by 50%.
7.longDescription: Increase Baleog's attack range by 2.5.  While near Olaf and Erik, he becomes inspired by the power of teamwork and his Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

7.name: Spin To Win!
7.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 85 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Deals 100% bonus damage to enemy Heroes.
7.longDescription: Activate to have each Viking deal 85 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Deals 100% bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

7.name: Norse Force!
7.description: All Vikings gain a 140 (+4% per level) to 308 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: All Vikings gain a 140 (+4% per level) to 308 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!
10.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 128 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 228 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for 1 second. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.
10.longDescription: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 128 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 228 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for 1 second. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!
10.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.
10.longDescription: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
13.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Jump!
13.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
13.description: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% maximum Health to enemy Heroes.
13.longDescription: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% maximum Health to enemy Heroes.

16.name: Large and In Charge
16.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.
16.longDescription: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.31 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.31 seconds.

16.name: 64 KB Marathon
16.description: Activating Go Go Go! grants an additional 40% Movement Speed and breaks the Vikings out of Roots and Slows.
16.longDescription: Activating Go Go Go! grants an additional 40% Movement Speed and breaks the Vikings out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%. Reduce Longboat Raid!'s cooldown by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%. Reduce Longboat Raid!'s cooldown by 30 seconds.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.
20.longDescription: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 100 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 100 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.

1.name: Assimilation Mastery
1.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 50 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globe healing grants 50 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

1.name: Fury of the Swarm
1.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.
1.longDescription: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

4.name: Sharpened Blades
4.description: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.
4.longDescription: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
4.description: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.
4.longDescription: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2 seconds after its first explosion.
4.longDescription: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2 seconds after its first explosion.

7.name: Queen of Blades
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Ravage by 3 seconds and increase its damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 100%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Ravage by 3 seconds and increase its damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 100%.

7.name: Boundless Fury
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

13.name: Psionic Barrier
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor and 4% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20% Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor and 4% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20% Movement Speed.

13.name: Volatile Power
13.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

13.name: Chrysalis
13.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.
13.longDescription: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

16.name: Mounting Potency
16.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.
16.longDescription: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

16.name: Painful Spikes
16.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

16.name: Unbridled Energy
16.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.
20.longDescription: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: Increase the Health and Basic Attack damage of the Ultralisk by 20%.  The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.
20.longDescription: Increase the Health and Basic Attack damage of the Ultralisk by 20%.  The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Assimilation Blades
20.description: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.
20.longDescription: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

1.name: Fetid Touch
1.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 50% less damage. This effect can be toggled.  Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 15% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 50% less damage. This effect can be toggled.  Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

1.name: Reactive Ballistospores
1.description: While below 50% Health, the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch refreshes 150% faster.  Activate to instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 60 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: While below 50% Health, the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch refreshes 150% faster.  Activate to instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

1.name: Low Blow
1.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 50% Health and persists for 1 second after it is canceled.
1.longDescription: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 50% Health and persists for 1 second after it is canceled.

4.name: One Good Spread...
4.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

4.name: Biotic Armor
4.description: Healing Pathogen grants 10 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 50 for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Pathogen grants 10 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 50 for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
4.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.
4.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

7.name: The Long Pitch
7.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

7.name: Growing Infestation
7.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

7.name: Targeted Excision
7.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 8 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 8 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Flailing Swipe
10.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.
10.longDescription: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

10.name: Massive Shove
10.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.
10.longDescription: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

13.name: It Hungers
13.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 8 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.
13.longDescription: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 8 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

13.name: Virulent Reaction
13.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Poppin' Pustules
13.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.
13.longDescription: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.

16.name: Superstrain
16.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.
16.longDescription: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Universal Carrier
16.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.
16.longDescription: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.

16.name: Pox Populi
16.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

20.name: Controlled Chaos
20.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 25 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 60 to 25.
20.longDescription: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 25 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 60 to 25.

20.name: Push Comes To Shove
20.description: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.
20.longDescription: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Top Off
20.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.
20.longDescription: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
20.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, dealing 230 (+4% per level) damage, applying a Weighted Pustule, and Silencing enemy Heroes inside for 2.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, dealing 230 (+4% per level) damage, applying a Weighted Pustule, and Silencing enemy Heroes inside for 2.5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Increase Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.

4.longDescription: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 30% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 30%.

4.longDescription: Passive: Increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 10%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 15%.

7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Minigun by 4 seconds. Reduce the cooldown of Minigun by an additional 4 seconds after using Run and Gun.

7.longDescription: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 30%.

10.longDescription: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.longDescription: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.longDescription: Overkill Slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% and its range is increased by 25%.

13.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.
