16.longDescription: Each time Overkill hits an enemy, its damage against them is increased by 15%, stacking up to 60% bonus damage.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.longDescription: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage in its area.

20.longDescription: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.longDescription: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.  After using Run and Gun, increase Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 4 seconds.

1.name: Transcendence

1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.

4.longDescription: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

4.longDescription: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.longDescription: Place an Air Ally that gives allied Heroes 15% Spell Power, grants vision, and reveals a large area around it. Has 200 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.

7.longDescription: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.  Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3.5 seconds.

7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.longDescription: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.longDescription: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.longDescription: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

20.longDescription: Divine Palm's healing amount is increased by 75% and its cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

4.name: Infernus
4.description: Increase the damage of Molten Flame against enemy Heroes by 25%.  Increase this damage bonus to 75% when Molten Flame is cast at 75 Energy or higher.
4.longDescription: Increase the damage of Molten Flame against enemy Heroes by 25%.  Increase this damage bonus to 75% when Molten Flame is cast at 75 Energy or higher.

4.name: Heat Wave
4.description: Destroyer: After hitting an enemy Hero with Incinerate, Deathwing deals 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to all nearby enemies for the next 8 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  World Breaker: Increase the explosion damage of Lava Burst by 125%.
4.longDescription: Destroyer: After hitting an enemy Hero with Incinerate, Deathwing deals 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to all nearby enemies for the next 8 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  World Breaker: Increase the explosion damage of Lava Burst by 125%.

4.name: Dragon's Ire
4.description: While Deathwing has 3 or fewer Armor Plates, his damage is increased by 25%.
4.longDescription: While Deathwing has 3 or fewer Armor Plates, his damage is increased by 25%.

7.name: Firestorm
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Deathwing's landing Abilities by 2 seconds.  When Deathwing lands, he drops 7 meteors near the landing area, dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Heroes hit by the meteors reduce Dragonflight's cooldown by 25 seconds.  Meteors prioritize landing on Heroes, otherwise they fall randomly in the area.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Deathwing's landing Abilities by 2 seconds.  When Deathwing lands, he drops 7 meteors near the landing area, dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Heroes hit by the meteors reduce Dragonflight's cooldown by 25 seconds.  Meteors prioritize landing on Heroes, otherwise they fall randomly in the area.

7.name: Death Drop
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 6 seconds and Deathwing's Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 6 seconds and Deathwing's Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.name: Skyfall
7.description: After using Dragonflight, Deathwing can drop meteors anywhere within vision dealing 58 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area. Has 3 charges.  If a Hero is hit, Deathwing heals for 3% of his maximum Health.
7.longDescription: After using Dragonflight, Deathwing can drop meteors anywhere within vision dealing 58 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area. Has 3 charges.  If a Hero is hit, Deathwing heals for 3% of his maximum Health.

10.name: Burn Beneath My Shadow
10.description: When an enemy Fort or Keep is destroyed the cooldown of Cataclysm is reset. Cataclysm's periodic damage is increased by 80%.
10.longDescription: When an enemy Fort or Keep is destroyed the cooldown of Cataclysm is reset. Cataclysm's periodic damage is increased by 80%.

10.name: Bellowing Roar
10.description: After 1 second, Deathwing unleashes a mighty roar, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Heroes and causing them to run in Fear for 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Deathwing unleashes a mighty roar, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Heroes and causing them to run in Fear for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Wicked Inferno
13.description: Molten Flame's Energy cost per second is reduced by 10.  After using Molten Flame, Deathwing gains 15 Energy over 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Molten Flame's Energy cost per second is reduced by 10.  After using Molten Flame, Deathwing gains 15 Energy over 3 seconds.

13.name: Ruination
13.description: Destroyer: The bite from Onslaught now Slows by 60% for 1.5 seconds.  World Breaker: Reduce Earth Shatter's cooldown by 6 seconds and its Energy cost by 10.
13.longDescription: Destroyer: The bite from Onslaught now Slows by 60% for 1.5 seconds.  World Breaker: Reduce Earth Shatter's cooldown by 6 seconds and its Energy cost by 10.

13.name: Fire and Fury
13.description: Basic Attacks against Rooted, Slowed, or Stunned enemy Heroes deal 30% additional damage and reduce the cooldowns of Deathwing's Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Rooted, Slowed, or Stunned enemy Heroes deal 30% additional damage and reduce the cooldowns of Deathwing's Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Conflagration
16.description: Dealing 320 (+4% per level) damage with Molten Flame to enemy Heroes within 4 seconds causes them to burn for an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. While burning, they explode every 1 second, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Dealing 320 (+4% per level) damage with Molten Flame to enemy Heroes within 4 seconds causes them to burn for an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. While burning, they explode every 1 second, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Gaze Onto Destruction
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing causes their damage to be reduced by 75% and Slows them by 40% for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing causes their damage to be reduced by 75% and Slows them by 40% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Elementium Plating
16.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 30% of Deathwing's missing Health for 8 seconds. While the Shield holds, Deathwing regenerates 2% of his maximum Health per second.  When the Shield expires or is destroyed, Deathwing regains Armor Plates appropriate for his new Health.  The Shield and effect end immediately if Deathwing uses Dragonflight.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 30% of Deathwing's missing Health for 8 seconds. While the Shield holds, Deathwing regenerates 2% of his maximum Health per second.  When the Shield expires or is destroyed, Deathwing regains Armor Plates appropriate for his new Health.  The Shield and effect end immediately if Deathwing uses Dragonflight.

20.name: Stood in the Fire
20.description: Enemy Heroes are Slowed by 40% while standing in scorched ground, and its duration is increased by 50%.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes are Slowed by 40% while standing in scorched ground, and its duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Arrival of a God
20.description: Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage is increased by 400%.  Deathwing also gains the benefits of all of his level 7 talents.
20.longDescription: Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage is increased by 400%.  Deathwing also gains the benefits of all of his level 7 talents.

20.name: Destroyer's Rampage
20.description: For the next 6 seconds after landing in Destroyer form, Deathwing's damage is increased by 40% and his Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Damaging Heroes refreshes this effect and switching to World Breaker form removes the effect.
20.longDescription: For the next 6 seconds after landing in Destroyer form, Deathwing's damage is increased by 40% and his Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Damaging Heroes refreshes this effect and switching to World Breaker form removes the effect.

abilities.name: Aspect of Death
abilities.description: Deathwing is fitted with 4 Armor Plates which grant 10 Armor each. Every 25% Health lost causes Deathwing to lose a plate. Plates are only restored when Dragonflight is used, based on the amount of Health Deathwing has when landing.Deathwing is also a mighty Dragon Aspect who is permanently Unstoppable and deals 100% additional Spell Damage to Heroes, but views his allies with contempt and ignores any of their friendly effects.Type: Defensive damage modifier, Offensive damage modifier, Status effectAffects: SelfProperties: Armor, UnstoppableDeathwing uses Energy instead of Mana as a resource. Deathwing has 100 max Energy, which regenerates at 5 Energy per second (even while channeling Molten Flame).Deathwing can still be affected by allied and enemy Time Stop and pathing blockers and by enemy non-crowd control debuffs, like Attack Slows, Damage over time, Damage modifier, Healing modifier, Revealed, Armor debuffs and hero specific debuffs that are not tied to applying a crowd control effect on the target.Deathwing cannot be eaten by Zagara's Devouring Maw (but its pathing blocking properties still work).Damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Deathwing's damage.Armor bonus stacks additively with itself, but not with other Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.Deathwing does not heal while in the Hall of Storms or after casting Hearthstone.Deathwing can heal himself by using Dragonflight, benefiting from Regeneration Globes, using Healing Fountains, and by selecting certain talents.

abilities.name: Form Switch
abilities.description: Switches Deathwing between Destroyer and World Breaker forms, each granting access to two unique Basic Abilities. Incinerate damages enemies around Deathwing and Onslaught allows him to lunge at enemies. Lava Burst creates a Slowing area and Earth Shatter Stuns enemies in two lines.Type: TransformationAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: 2.0 + 0.5 secondsDeathwing starts the game in Destroyer form.Whenever Deathwing respawns, he respawns in the form he was using when he died.

abilities.name: Molten Flame
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, Deathwing breathes a stream of flame, dealing 21 damage every 0.125 seconds. Drains 30 Energy per second.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Stationary channelCast time: 1.5 + 0 secondsArea of Effect: RectangleWidth: 3.5Height: 12.0Tickrate: 8.0 per secondMolten Flame is usable in both forms.Molten Flame can be canceled 0.75 seconds after successfully casting it to end its effect early.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, Deathwing flaps his wings, dealing 65 damage to nearby enemies.World Breaker: Lava burstCreate a lava pool that damages and Slows.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.75 + 0 secondsArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 7.0

abilities.name: Lava Burst
abilities.description: After a 1 second delay, deal 30 damage to all enemies in the area and create a pool of magma that deals 24 damage per second and Slows enemies by 35%. Lasts 6 seconds.Destroyer: IncinerateDamage enemies near Deathwing.Type: Spell damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, SlowCast time: 1.0 + 0 secondsRange: 9.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.0Tickrate: 4.0 per second (x24)Damage per tick: 6

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Deathwing lunges in a direction, dealing 38 damage to enemies and Slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds. Deathwing bites enemies at the end of the lunge, dealing an additional 72 damage.World Breaker: Earth ShatterDamage and Stun enemies in two lines.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd Control / Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Piercing Skillshot, SlowCast time: 0.5 + 0.1875 secondsRange: - Dash: 2.0- Bite: 3.0Area of Effect: - End: Radial- Bite: CircleRadius: - End: 2.25- Bite: 1.25Arc: 180 degrees (end area)Hitbox: 4.5 x 1.5Missile speed: 20.0After dash the hitbox lingers for 0.25 seconds. 0.0625 seconds after that it impacts the half-circle at the end of the hitbox and another 0.0625 seconds later it deals the bite damage.

abilities.name: Earth Shatter
abilities.description: Create a fissure of earth that deals 90 damage to enemies hit and Stuns them for 0.75 seconds.Destroyer: OnslaughtLunge in a direction.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesProperties: Piercing SkillshotCast time: 1.0 + 0 secondsRange: 14.0Hitbox: 2.0 x 2.0Missile speed: 10.0Fissure alignment: 6 degrees

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.description: After 2 seconds, Deathwing flies in the targeted direction, dealing 90 damage on impact and leaving scorched ground that deals 36 damage a second. Lasts 6 seconds.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Piercing SkillshotCast time: 2.0 + 0 secondsArea of Effect: RectangleWidth: 9.0Height: 22.0Hitbox: 9.0 x 3.0Missile speed: 17.0Tickrate: 4.0 per second (x24)Damage per tick: 9Starts on a 270 second cooldown at the beginning of a match.Can be used to enter out-of-bounds areas by landing exactly perpendicular to and with the end of the launch being exactly on the edge of Terrain.

abilities.name: Dragonflight
abilities.description: After 3 seconds, fly into the sky, becoming immune to all effects and gaining 2.5% Health per second. Once cast, this Ability cannot be interrupted. Cannot be cast for 4 seconds after taking damage, Basic Attacking or casting an Ability.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: 3.0 + 0 secondsTickrate: 1.0 per secondTaking damage only prevents using the Ability. Once it has been activated it cannot be interrupted.Last indefinitely until Destroyer or World Breaker are used.While in the air, enemies will be alerted by occasional roars.

abilities.name: Destroyer
abilities.description: After 1.75 seconds, Deathwing slams down to the ground, dealing 52 damage to enemies in the area and landing in Destroyer form. Deathwing can begin to cast Abilities 3 seconds after landing.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: TeleportScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 1.75 + 0 secondsRange: GlobalArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 5.0Cannot be cast on a point that is out of vision.Begins on cooldown when Dragonflight is cast.If Hero-created Terrain is placed in the landing zone after this is cast, it can prevent Deathwing from using his W and E Abilities until he next lands (correctly). This happens most often with Hogger Loot Hoard placed in the landing area.

abilities.name: World Breaker
abilities.description: After 1.75 seconds, Deathwing slams down to the ground, dealing 52 damage to enemies in the area and landing in World Breaker form. Deathwing can begin to cast Abilities 3 seconds after landing.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: TeleportScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 1.75 + 0 secondsRange: GlobalArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 5.0Cannot be cast on a point that is out of vision.Begins on cooldown when Dragonflight is cast.If Hero-created Terrain is placed in the landing zone after this is cast, it can prevent Deathwing from using his W and E Abilities until he next lands (correctly). This happens most often with Hogger Loot Hoard placed in the landing area.

1.name: Backlash
1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.
1.longDescription: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 2 seconds and its Mana cost by 15.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 2 seconds and its Mana cost by 15.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.description: Increase Xul's Basic Attack damage by 15%.  Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Xul's Basic Attack damage by 15%.  Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 25% Movement and Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 25% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.
7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
7.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.
7.longDescription: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

7.name: Wall Of Bones
7.description: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to 35% of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains 20 Spell Armor for its duration.
7.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to 35% of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains 20 Spell Armor for its duration.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 40% damage.
13.longDescription: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 40% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Amplify Damage
13.description: Increase the Root duration of Bone Prison by 0.25 seconds.  Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Bone Prison by 0.25 seconds.  Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds.

16.name: Decrepify
16.description: Enemy Heroes that are damaged by Spectral Scythe or Skeletal Warriors are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that are damaged by Spectral Scythe or Skeletal Warriors are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Weaken
16.description: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal 35% less damage for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal 35% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.
16.longDescription: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by 50%.
20.longDescription: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.   Every 5th Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.
20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.   Every 5th Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by 1.5%.
20.longDescription: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by 1.5%.

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton
abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 240 Health that attacks for 21 damage and lasts up to 12 seconds. Upon death, Skeletal Warriors deal 40 damage to nearby enemies. Up to 3 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once when spawned in this way.Type: SummonAffects: Enemy MinionsRadius: 12Skeletal WarriorType: ActiveScaling: 4.00% (Health, regen & damage)Health: 240Health regen: -20Basic Attack damage: 21Attack Speed: 1.0Attack range: 0.5Movement speed: 4.0Sight radius: 8.0Leash radius: -Spawn delay: 0.65 secondsCorpse ExplosionType: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesProperties: Area of EffectRadius: 1.5This explosion damage will trigger A Call For Help, i.e. Structure aggro onto Xul, if Xul and an enemy Hero hit by the explosion are in range of that enemy's Fort, Keep or Core.

abilities.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 190 damage to enemies and spawning a Skeletal Warrior when hitting Enemy Heroes. These do not count toward Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.Type: Spell Damage / SummonScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point TargetProperties: Area of Effect, SkillshotCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 8.1Radius: 1.5Missile speed: 12The scythe persists up to 5 seconds.

abilities.description: Xul's Basic Attack deals damage in a wide area and reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of Xul's maximum Health for 3 seconds.Type: ShieldScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: Instant

1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 30 Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 30 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.   Samuro and his Mirror Images' Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduce their Physical Armor by 5 for 2.25 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
1.longDescription: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.   Samuro and his Mirror Images' Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduce their Physical Armor by 5 for 2.25 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.  Casting Wind Walk heals Samuro for 5% of his maximum Health.
1.longDescription: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.  Casting Wind Walk heals Samuro for 5% of his maximum Health.

4.name: Mirage
4.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 40%.
4.longDescription: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

4.name: One with the Wind
4.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk active and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.
4.longDescription: While Samuro has Wind Walk active and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

4.name: Deflection
4.description: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 35 Physical Armor.
4.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 35 Physical Armor.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.description: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes deal an additional 35% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active and reduce the cooldown of Image Transmission by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes deal an additional 35% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active and reduce the cooldown of Image Transmission by 1 second.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 2 seconds.   Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Basic Attack damage by 10% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
7.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 2 seconds.   Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Basic Attack damage by 10% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.description: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.
13.longDescription: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.
13.longDescription: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.
16.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.
16.longDescription: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

20.name: Dance of Death
20.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 45% damage.  If Samuro hits at least 20 enemy Heroes with Bladestorm, then reset its cooldown.
20.longDescription: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 45% damage.  If Samuro hits at least 20 enemy Heroes with Bladestorm, then reset its cooldown.

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Samuro's Mirror Images only deal half of the damage they take to themselves, effectively increasing their Health by 25% and their duration is increased to 16 seconds.
20.longDescription: Samuro's Mirror Images only deal half of the damage they take to themselves, effectively increasing their Health by 25% and their duration is increased to 16 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

20.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
20.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Image Transmission
abilities.description: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.Type: Movement: Teleport, Status effectAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: StasisCast time: InstantRange: GlobalSamuro can not use Image Transmission on a target Image that is Stunned, Silenced, in Stasis or in Time Stop.Using Image Transmission to swap between Images puts Samuro and his Images in Stasis for 0.125 seconds, removing debuffs from them and making them briefly untargetable and immune to damage, regardless of which Image was targeted.All of Samuro's Mirror Images' Health is set to match the percentage of Samuro's current Health when the swap is finished.Using Image Transmission during Wind Walk's Unrevealable period doesn't break Stealth, but using it after the Unrevealable period is over will. Real Samuro retains Stealth through the swap.Advancing Strikes Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.Type: Status effectAffects: Self, ImagesProperties: Attack Modifier, Movement SpeedAdvancing Strikes and the talents enhancing it proc independently on Samuro and each of his Mirror Images.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating 2 images for 8 seconds with 100% of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for 11 damage. Images have their duration increased by 1 second each time they or Samuro use a Basic Attack against an enemy Hero. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.Maximum 2 Mirror images can be active at a time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.Type: Summon / Movement: Teleport, Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, StasisCast time: InstantRange: 3.5Mirror ImageType: HallucinationScaling: 4.00% (damage)Targeting: AutomaticHealth: 100%Basic Attack damage: 11Attack speed: 100%Attack range: 100%Movement Speed: 100%Sight radius: 100%Leash radius: -Samuro appears in the direction of the player's mouse cursor when Mirror Image is cast. Samuro and his Mirror Images spawn in an equilateral triangle around the point where the ability was cast from.Using Mirror Image puts Samuro in Stasis for 0.125 seconds, removing most debuffs from Samuro and making him briefly untargetable and immune to damage.Samuro and the Images retain the last attack command given to Samuro before casting the Ability and attempt to complete it when the cast ends, unless they are spawned within Basic Attack range of another target, in which case they will focus that target instead.Mirror Images deal the same type of damage that Samuro does.Mirror Images gain all benefits from Samuro's Trait and Talents affecting it.Mirror Images can be affected by Regeneration Globes' healing, but cannot pick them up themselves. The effect is not shared between Samuro and his Images.Killing Mirror Images rewards no XP or Takedown credit.All Mirror Images are destroyed 1 server tick after real Samuro successfully Hearths, meaning he can use Image Transmission to swap to one after Hearthing before it is destroyed if done quickly enough, to heal for 1125 Health (done more easily using the Command Queue button, i.e. Q -> Shift -> D by default).

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.Type: Offensive damage modifierAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack ModifierCast time: InstantDoes not stack with itself. Activating sets Samuro's next attack to be a critical strike (regardless of if it already was), putting the Ability on cooldown.Activating resets Samuro's Basic Attack cooldown, causing his next Basic Attack to strike immediately.Stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage.While Stealthed, Samuro heals for 1% of his maximum Health per second, his Movement Speed is increased by 20%, and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.Type: Healing, Status effectScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Movement Speed, StealthCast time: InstantTickrate: 1.0 per secondUsing Mirror Image and Mounting during the Unrevealable period will break Stealth once the period ends.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 damage per second to nearby enemies.Type: Spell Damage / Defensive damage modifierScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Armor, Mobile channelCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 4.25Tickrate: 5.0 per second (x15)Damage per tick: 36Bladestorm can be ended prematurely by reactivating the Ability and is also canceled by activating Mirror Image or Image Transmission due to their brief Stasis windows.Does not stack with other positive Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.Type: Offensive damage modifierAffects: ImagesIllusion bonus damage stacks additively with other damage modifiers.Illusion Master's active shares a cooldown with Image Transmission, and has all the same properties.Mirror Images have a copy of Illusion Master active and Image Transmission, both of which swap the Image using it with Samuro. The cooldown is shared between Samuro and all his Images.Mirror Images can Mount, Hearth and drink from Healing Fountains. The effect and cooldowns are independent from Samuro and his other Images, including those that have expired.Images can fake capturing Objectives.A Mirror Image Hearthing does not destroy any Mirror Images, but real Samuro Hearthing still does.The Command Queue system can be used to queue Mirror Image and then Illusion Master to swap places with a targeted Mirror Image and then create a new set at his location prior to the swap.

1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.longDescription: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

13.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

13.longDescription: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

16.longDescription: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Icing by 3 seconds.  If Mei enters her own Blizzard while Icing is active, the cooldown of Icing is reduced by 5 seconds and she gains 80 Mana.

13.longDescription: While in her own Blizzard, Mei gains 50% increased Attack Speed and Blizzard's cooldown refreshes 125% faster. If Mei is in her own Blizzard when it ends, gain these bonuses for 3 additional seconds.

13.longDescription: Using an ability causes Mei to deal 24 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes damaged by this effect also have their Movement Speed and Attack Speed Slowed by 20%.

16.longDescription: Icing's Slow effect no longer decays over its duration. Icing deals 300% more damage to enemies very close to Mei.

16.longDescription: Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero, the damage she deals and healing she receives is increased by 1%, stacking up to 20 times. While at maximum stacks, Mei also gains 10 Armor. Lasts 8 seconds.

20.longDescription: When Ice Wall expires, trapped enemy Heroes hit take 210 (+4% per level) damage and have their Armor reduced by 25 for 5 seconds.

20.name: The Big One

20.longDescription: Every 15 seconds, the next Snow Blind you cast has 67% increased area and 200% increased damage.

20.longDescription: When Mei takes fatal damage she instantly gains Cryo-Freeze. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

7.longDescription: While Resonance Beam is fully charged, Shock Ray's cooldown refreshes 100% faster and its Slow duration is increased to 4 seconds.  Passive: Reduce the Mana cost of Shock Ray from 55 to 40.

7.name: Psionic Echo
7.description: Casting Psionic Storm causes your next Shock Ray within 3 seconds to only cost 30 Mana and create a Psionic Storm on the first enemy Hero hit.
7.longDescription: Casting Psionic Storm causes your next Shock Ray within 3 seconds to only cost 30 Mana and create a Psionic Storm on the first enemy Hero hit.

7.name: Arc Discharge
7.description: When Resonance Beam is fully charged, Tassadar's Basic Attack range is increased by 1 and its next instance of damage also creates a Psionic Storm on the target.  This effect has a 20 second cooldown that decays twice as fast while Resonance Beam is fully charged.
7.longDescription: When Resonance Beam is fully charged, Tassadar's Basic Attack range is increased by 1 and its next instance of damage also creates a Psionic Storm on the target.  This effect has a 20 second cooldown that decays twice as fast while Resonance Beam is fully charged.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to 25% of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for 12 seconds.  Resonance Beam: Deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the target and splashes 70 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by 20 for 2 seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.
10.longDescription: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to 25% of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for 12 seconds.  Resonance Beam: Deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the target and splashes 70 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by 20 for 2 seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.

10.name: Black Hole
10.description: After a 0.5 second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns the target for 1.25 seconds.
10.longDescription: After a 0.5 second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns the target for 1.25 seconds.

13.name: Feedback
13.description: When an enemy Hero is affected by Psionic Storm, Resonance Beam's Slow is increased to 50% and it reduces Physical Armor by 25.
13.longDescription: When an enemy Hero is affected by Psionic Storm, Resonance Beam's Slow is increased to 50% and it reduces Physical Armor by 25.

13.name: Shadow Walk
13.description: Tassadar becomes Stealthed and Unrevealable, but cannot attack or use Abilities for 1.5 seconds. While this effect is active, gain 40% increased Movement Speed and 35 Armor.  Can be cast while Channeling Shock Ray.
13.longDescription: Tassadar becomes Stealthed and Unrevealable, but cannot attack or use Abilities for 1.5 seconds. While this effect is active, gain 40% increased Movement Speed and 35 Armor.  Can be cast while Channeling Shock Ray.

13.name: Oracle
13.description: Passive: While stationary, gain 30 Spell Armor for 0.75 seconds and restore 12 (+4% per level) Health a second.  Activate to Channel for up to 4 seconds, revealing a gradually increasing area anywhere on the map.
13.longDescription: Passive: While stationary, gain 30 Spell Armor for 0.75 seconds and restore 12 (+4% per level) Health a second.  Activate to Channel for up to 4 seconds, revealing a gradually increasing area anywhere on the map.

16.name: Thermal Lance
16.description: Shock Ray deals an additional 8% of maximum Health as damage to the first Hero it hits.
16.longDescription: Shock Ray deals an additional 8% of maximum Health as damage to the first Hero it hits.

16.name: Psychic Shock
16.description: Psionic Storm deals damage 25% faster.
16.longDescription: Psionic Storm deals damage 25% faster.

16.name: Executor's Will
16.description: Activate to gain full Resonance Beam charge, 20% Spell Power, and cause Basic and Heroic Ability cooldowns to regenerate 25% faster. This effect lasts as long as Resonance Beam remains at full charge.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain full Resonance Beam charge, 20% Spell Power, and cause Basic and Heroic Ability cooldowns to regenerate 25% faster. This effect lasts as long as Resonance Beam remains at full charge.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Kugelblitz
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Black Hole's center have their Armor reduced by 20 for 3 seconds and have a Psionic Storm created at their location.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Black Hole's center have their Armor reduced by 20 for 3 seconds and have a Psionic Storm created at their location.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Increase the duration of Force Wall by 0.5 seconds, its range by 50%, and reduce its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Force Wall by 0.5 seconds, its range by 50%, and reduce its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Khala's Gift
20.description: Gain 4% Spell Power for yourself and each nearby ally Hero, up to 20% total Spell Power. Your total bonus is shared with all contributing allies.
20.longDescription: Gain 4% Spell Power for yourself and each nearby ally Hero, up to 20% total Spell Power. Your total bonus is shared with all contributing allies.

abilities.name: Resonance Beam
abilities.description: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Channeled beam that Slows by 15%. While Channeling, your Basic Attack damage and Mana Regeneration increase by 25% a second, to a maximum of 100%. While at full charge, gain an additional 3 Mana per second.This bonus is lost after 6 seconds of not Channeling.Type: Offensive damage modifier / Crowd controlAffects: Self / EnemiesProperties: Attack Modifier, SlowSlow duration: 0.3125 secondsEach tick grants 6.25% Resonance Beam charge.Gaining charge in any way resets the duration.Damage bonus stacks additively with itself and other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Tassadar's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Shock Ray
abilities.description: Channel a beam of Psionic energy, dealing 280 damage and Slowing enemies in a line by 30% for 2 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), Slow, Stationary channelCast time: 0.375 (ch) + CH + 0.0625 secondsRange: 13.5Hitbox: 2.0 x 1.25Missile speed: 20Channel time: 0.6875 secondsTassadar can start moving after the channel although there is an additional 0.0625s delay (noted above) before the beam appears from its cast location.Interrupting the Ability during its windup puts it on a 0.5 second cooldown.Cooldown does not start until the channel completely finishes.

abilities.name: Psionic Storm
abilities.description: Create a Psionic Storm at the targeted location for 3 seconds. While in a storm, enemies take 38 damage every 0.5 seconds, increasing by 20% for each consecutive instance of damage up to 100%.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.1 + 0 secondsRange: 8.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.75Tickrate: - Damage: 2.0 per second (x6)- Target search: 4.0 per second (x11)Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time. This also applies in the event there are multiple Tassadars in a team.Damage bonus tracks each target separately and can carry over to another cast of Psionic Storm, if it damages the target within 0.4 seconds of the last damage instance. This also applies to Psionic Storms cast by different Tassadars.A target with no existing stacks that is hit by a full-duration Storm will take 342 damage (excluding scaling and other damage modifiers).Damage bonus stacks additively with itself and offensive damage modifiers.

abilities.name: Force Wall
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.Type: Pathing blockerScaling: 4.00%Affects: All unitsTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.0625 + 0 secondsRange: 9.0Area of Effect: Rectangle (1Width: 6.125Height: 2.1251) Area consists of four overlapping circular blocking units with 1.0625 radius.Force Wall can be reactivated 0.5 seconds after it has spawned to end its effect early.Force Wall grants vision in 6 radius.

abilities.name: Archon
abilities.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to 25% of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for 12 seconds.Resonance Beam: Deals 140 damage to the target and splashes 70 damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by 20 for 2 seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.Type: Physical Damage, Defensive damage modifier / ShieldScaling: 4.00% (damage) / - (Shield)Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack Modifier, Spell Armor reduction, SplashCast time: InstantArea of Effect: Circle (splash)Radius: 2.5 (splash)Archon Attack Speed: 1.00Tassadar cannot Mount while in this form.Cooldown starts when the transformation ends.Archon benefits from Resonance Beam's Slow and Mana regeneration bonuses, but not from the damage bonus.Archon attacks benefit from all talents enhancing Resonance Beam, except Khaydarin Amulet.Spell Armor reduction is applied even if the Basic Attack misses due to being Blinded or the target Evading.Spell Armor debuff is not cleansed by Stasis.Does not stack with itself or other negative Spell Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second cast, launch a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled toward its center. Touching the center deals 310 damage and Stuns for 1.25 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), Displacement, StunCast time: 0.5 (ch) + 0.125 secondsRange: 24Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Inner: 0.75- Outer: 3.25Missile speed: - Min: 1.0- Max: 5.5Pull speed: 1.8Interrupting the cast during its windup puts the Ability on a 10 second cooldown.Pull from Black Hole does not apply Daze, allowing the target to control their Hero's movement and actions as normal and causing it to be unable to interrupt channels (without getting hit by its center).Heroes hit by the center continue to be pulled until they leave Black Hole's area, but cannot be hit by the center again unless they were first hit at the very end of the Ability's range, in which case they will take its damage twice.

1.name: Puncturing Arrow
1.description: Increase the number of Hungering Arrow bounces by 1.  Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow refunds 40 Mana and permanently increases the damage of its initial impact by 7.
1.longDescription: Increase the number of Hungering Arrow bounces by 1.  Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow refunds 40 Mana and permanently increases the damage of its initial impact by 7.

1.name: Fire At Will
1.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Multishot grants 2 Hatred and permanently increases its damage by 2.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Multishot, increase its damage by 40.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Multishot grants 2 Hatred and permanently increases its damage by 2.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Multishot, increase its damage by 40.

1.name: Creed of the Hunter
1.description: Quest: Every 50 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Hatred's damage bonus per stack by 1%, up to 5%.  Gambit: Gain 20% bonus Attack Speed. Every death reduces this bonus by 5%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 50 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Hatred's damage bonus per stack by 1%, up to 5%.  Gambit: Gain 20% bonus Attack Speed. Every death reduces this bonus by 5%.

4.name: Arsenal
4.description: Increase the range of Multishot by 20%. Multishot also fires 3 grenades that deal 100 (+4% per level) damage and refund 25 Mana after hitting enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Multishot by 20%. Multishot also fires 3 grenades that deal 100 (+4% per level) damage and refund 25 Mana after hitting enemy Heroes.

4.name: Death Dealer
4.description: Increase Vaults Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 15% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim within 1.5 seconds, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Vault by 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Vaults Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 15% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim within 1.5 seconds, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Vault by 5 seconds.

4.name: Repeating Arrow
4.description: Vault no longer has a Mana cost. Casting Vault resets the cooldown of Hungering Arrow.
4.longDescription: Vault no longer has a Mana cost. Casting Vault resets the cooldown of Hungering Arrow.

7.name: Monster Hunter
7.description: Hungering Arrow deals 150% additional damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
7.longDescription: Hungering Arrow deals 150% additional damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: Frost Shot
7.description: Multishot Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Hungering Arrows deals 25% more damage to Slowed enemies.
7.longDescription: Multishot Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Hungering Arrows deals 25% more damage to Slowed enemies.

7.name: Hot Pursuit
7.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of each stack of Hatred to 2%.
7.longDescription: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of each stack of Hatred to 2%.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Siphoning Arrows
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Hungering Arrow heals Valla for 4% of her maximum Health, and Multishot heals for 2%.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Hungering Arrow heals Valla for 4% of her maximum Health, and Multishot heals for 2%.

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 10% of the damage dealt, increased by 2% per Hatred stack.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 10% of the damage dealt, increased by 2% per Hatred stack.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 15 Spell Armor, and each stack of Hatred heals for 1.2 (+4% per level) Health per second.
13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 15 Spell Armor, and each stack of Hatred heals for 1.2 (+4% per level) Health per second.

16.name: Punishment
16.description: While at max Hatred, Multishot's cooldown recharges 50% faster.
16.longDescription: While at max Hatred, Multishot's cooldown recharges 50% faster.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: While at max Hatred, increase all damage dealt by 10%.
16.longDescription: While at max Hatred, increase all damage dealt by 10%.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Hero deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Hero deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Strafe increases its duration by 0.125 seconds. Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Strafe increases its duration by 0.125 seconds. Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.  Passive: Each stack of Hatred increases your Attack Speed by 2%. While at max Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.  Passive: Each stack of Hatred increases your Attack Speed by 2%. While at max Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Acrobat
20.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Vault. Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting that deal 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Vault. Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting that deal 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Gain 20% Basic Attack range. While at max Hatred, gain an additional 30% Basic Attack range.
20.longDescription: Gain 20% Basic Attack range. While at max Hatred, gain an additional 30% Basic Attack range.

1.name: Overwhelming Power
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 40% Attack Speed and causes Basic Attacks to heal for 50% of the damage dealt for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 40% Attack Speed and causes Basic Attacks to heal for 50% of the damage dealt for 4 seconds.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 80% Health.
1.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 80% Health.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.
1.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Negatively Charged
4.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 175%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 175%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 61 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 61 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

7.name: Dissonance
7.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 30% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 30% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.
7.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
10.longDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.  This bonus is doubled against enemy Heroes who are Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.  This bonus is doubled against enemy Heroes who are Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted.

20.name: Counter-Strike
20.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.
20.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

20.name: Deadly Charge
20.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
20.longDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

20.name: Last Laugh
20.description: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

20.name: Hasty Bargain
20.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Sadism (Trait)
abilities.description: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.❢ Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.Type: Offensive damage modifier, Healing dealt modifierAffects: AbilitiesMax total Sadism: 1000%Benefits all flat Spell Damage and healing instances and bonuses from Alarak's Basic and Heroic Abilities and Talents. Spell Damage and healing from other sources will not be amplified.Sadism stacks additively with itself and other damage modifiers affecting Alarak's Ability damage.Sadism stacks additively with healing modifiers that increase healing dealt and multiplicatively with modifiers that affect healing received.

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 62 damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. abilities.name: Deadly Charge
abilities.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No target / Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Weak Channel (stationary)Cast time: InstantRange: - Min: 3- Max: 18.25Hitbox: 3.0 x 1.0Missile speed: 42Interrupting the channel in any way does not put the Ability on cooldown.Mana cost is not consumed until the Ability has been fully cast, but can't be initiated if Alarak has insufficient Mana.Range increases by 0.6354 for every 0.0625 seconds channeled.Ability can be channeled indefinitely, but distance will no longer increase after reaching maximum distance at the 1.5 second mark.

abilities.name: Counter-Strike
abilities.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. 1.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
1.description: Passive: While over 80% Health, gain 25% bonus Attack Speed and 10% bonus Movement Speed.  Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Passive: While over 80% Health, gain 25% bonus Attack Speed and 10% bonus Movement Speed.  Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

1.name: Endurance Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 590 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.  When taking damage while below 30% maximum Health, Endurance Stimpack will automatically be cast if it is not on cooldown.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 590 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.  When taking damage while below 30% maximum Health, Endurance Stimpack will automatically be cast if it is not on cooldown.

1.name: Neural Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 40 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 40 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

1.name: New Habits
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 6 seconds.  Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 6 seconds.  Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

4.name: Oil Dispersal
4.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20%. Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 0.75 seconds and refunds 5 Mana.
4.longDescription: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20%. Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 0.75 seconds and refunds 5 Mana.

4.name: Meltdown
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 8% for 2.5 seconds, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 8% for 2.5 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
4.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 50%.
4.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 50%.

7.name: Suppressive Fire
7.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 25% for 4 seconds, up to 50%.
7.longDescription: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 25% for 4 seconds, up to 50%.

7.name: Nanomachine Coating
7.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Fuel Leak
7.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.
7.longDescription: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

10.name: Bunker Drop
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

10.name: Combustion
10.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

13.name: Grill and Kill
13.description: Increase Ignited Oil Spill damage by 45%.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 30 times.  Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Ignited Oil Spill damage by 45%.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 30 times.  Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Adhesive Petroleum
13.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 40% and take 35% more Basic Attack damage from Blaze for 3 seconds. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.
13.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 40% and take 35% more Basic Attack damage from Blaze for 3 seconds. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

13.name: Collision Course
13.description: Jet Propulsion's collision deals 275 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Jet Propulsion's collision deals 275 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Thermal Protection
16.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Heat Treatment
16.description: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.
16.longDescription: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

16.name: Juggernaut Plating
16.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

20.name: Fortified Bunker
20.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

20.name: Flash Fire
20.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.
20.longDescription: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.

20.name: Burn Notice
20.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
