1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.
1.longDescription: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.
1.longDescription: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: Every 10 seconds, Fenix's next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb active Slows all enemies hit by 60%, decaying in strength over 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, Fenix's next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb active Slows all enemies hit by 60%, decaying in strength over 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: While Fenix has shields from Shield Capacitor, he gains 10% Movement Speed.  This bonus is increased to 15% when Fenix loses shields from Shield Capacitor.
4.longDescription: While Fenix has shields from Shield Capacitor, he gains 10% Movement Speed.  This bonus is increased to 15% when Fenix loses shields from Shield Capacitor.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.
7.longDescription: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.
7.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
10.longDescription: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 30 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
13.longDescription: Fenix gains 30 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: The time before Shield Capacitor begins regenerating after taking damage is reduced by 2 seconds. Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.
13.longDescription: The time before Shield Capacitor begins regenerating after taking damage is reduced by 2 seconds. Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 20% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
16.longDescription: Fenix deals 20% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Basic Attacks with Repeater Cannon reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Basic Attacks with Phase Bomb active reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds per Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks with Repeater Cannon reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Basic Attacks with Phase Bomb active reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds per Hero hit.

20.name: Armageddon Beam
20.description: Planet Cracker's width increases by 100% over 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Reduce Planet Cracker's cooldown by 40 seconds.
20.longDescription: Planet Cracker's width increases by 100% over 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Reduce Planet Cracker's cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.
20.longDescription: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Shield Capacitor
abilities.description: Fenix has a permanent 760 Shield which regenerates at 10% per second after not taking damage for 5 seconds.Type: ShieldScaling: 4.00%Affects: SelfTickrate: 1.0 per second

abilities.name: Plasma Cutter
abilities.description: Create a laser beam at the target point that circles around Fenix twice, dealing 135 damage to enemies hit and Slowing them by 25% for 4 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SlowCast time: InstantRange: - Minimum: 1.5- Maximum: 6.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 0.7Cycle duration: 1.5 secondsEnemies can be hit by Plasma Cutter multiple times within the same cast, but not more often than once every 0.5 seconds.Damage is dealt before any additional effects of Plasma Cutter or associated Talents are applied.

abilities.name: Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon
abilities.description: Basic Attack speed increased by 150%.Activate to change to Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb, increasing Basic Attack range and damage, and causing Basic Attacks to splash.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No target (toggle)Properties: Attack Modifier, Attack SpeedCast time: InstantRepeater Cannon's single-target DPS is twice that of Phase Bomb.Switching weapon modes does not dismount nor does it interrupt mounting, hearthing or channeling objectives.Attack Speed stacks additively with other effects that can affect Fenix's Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Weapon Mode: Phase Bomb
abilities.description: Basic Attacks have 1.25 increased range, deal 25% more damage, and splash to nearby enemies.Activate to change to Weapon Mode: Repeater Cannon, increasing Basic Attack Speed.Type: Bonus damage / Physical DamageScaling: -Affects: Self / EnemiesTargeting: No target (toggle)Properties: Attack Modifier, SplashCast time: InstantSplash radius: 3.0Damage bonus is implemented as a direct base damage increase, causing it to stack multiplicatively with offensive damage modifiers.Switching weapon modes does not reset Fenix's auto-attack timer. The auto-attack timer ticks from its current completion percentage according to the weapon mode currently selected. Therefore, by attacking exclusively with Phase Bomb and quickly switching to Repeater Cannon and back just between auto-attacks (ideally staying in Repeater Cannon mode for all of the auto-attack downtime), Fenix can benefit from the bonus range, damage, and splash damage of Phase Bomb as well as the bonus attack speed of Repeater Cannon.

abilities.name: Warp

1.name: Greater Cleave
1.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.
1.longDescription: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

1.name: Shadow Hunter

1.longDescription: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 1 second. Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

4.longDescription: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Darkness Descends

10.longDescription: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

10.longDescription: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities and having 3996 Health that burns away over 18 seconds.Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.Type: TransformationScaling: 4.00% (Health & decay)Affects: Allied or destroyed Forts & KeepsTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Channeled cast, Heroic Target, StasisCast time: 2.0(ch) + 0 secondsRange: 5.75Health decay: 222 per secondInterrupting Molten Core during its cast puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Entering Molten Core puts real Ragnaros in a special Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage until Molten Core ends.Ragnaros can exit Molten Core after a 1 second channel by reactivating the Trait. Exiting can be canceled by pressing the Trait button again before the channel is complete.Ragnaros cannot be targeted by friendly Abilities during Molten Core, but buffs and HoTs applied before hand persist for their duration.Molten Core Ragnaros cannot be targeted or affected by Abathur's Ultimate Evolution, Sylvanas's Black Arrow disable or Zagara's Devouring Maw.

abilities.name: Lava Wave
abilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.Type: Spell Damage / Instant killScaling: 4.00%Affects: Non-Structure Enemies / Enemy MinionsTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: InstantRange: GlobalArea of Effect: LineWidth: 12Missile speed: 11Tickrate: 4.0 per secondDamage per tick: 60Also picks up any Experience Globes along the Wave's path.

1.name: Full Metal
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 10% increased Health and its Fusion Cannons heal for 16% of the damage dealt to enemies in its bonus area.
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 10% increased Health and its Fusion Cannons heal for 16% of the damage dealt to enemies in its bonus area.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed and 2 Armor every time it takes damage, stacking up to 15 times. Stacks of this effect decay every 0.5 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes in Pilot Mode reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 1 additional second.
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed and 2 Armor every time it takes damage, stacking up to 15 times. Stacks of this effect decay every 0.5 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes in Pilot Mode reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 1 additional second.

1.name: Liquid Cooling
1.description: Activate to gain the effects of Healing Fountain. Requires Mech Mode.  Passive: While in Mech Mode, Healing Fountain's cooldown is reduced to 50 seconds and its effects last 35% longer.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain the effects of Healing Fountain. Requires Mech Mode.  Passive: While in Mech Mode, Healing Fountain's cooldown is reduced to 50 seconds and its effects last 35% longer.

4.name: Rush-down
4.description: Boosters deals an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes and heals D.Va's Mech for the damage dealt. Boosters deals 50% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.
4.longDescription: Boosters deals an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes and heals D.Va's Mech for the damage dealt. Boosters deals 50% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

4.name: Aggression Matrix
4.description: Enemy Heroes within your Defense Matrix receive 35% less healing.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.1875 seconds.
4.longDescription: Enemy Heroes within your Defense Matrix receive 35% less healing.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.1875 seconds.

4.name: Nuclear Option
4.description: Hitting your self-destructing Mech with Big Shot causes it to self-destruct 40% faster.  Passive: When Fusion Cannons deal bonus damage to an enemy Hero, gain 0.25 Self-Destruct Charge.
4.longDescription: Hitting your self-destructing Mech with Big Shot causes it to self-destruct 40% faster.  Passive: When Fusion Cannons deal bonus damage to an enemy Hero, gain 0.25 Self-Destruct Charge.

7.name: Get On The Point!
7.description: Casting Boosters grants nearby allies 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Passive: If D.Va has not taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Boosters' cooldown refreshes 100% faster.
7.longDescription: Casting Boosters grants nearby allies 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Passive: If D.Va has not taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Boosters' cooldown refreshes 100% faster.

7.name: Hit The Nitrous
7.description: The initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 300%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters Stuns for 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: The initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 300%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters Stuns for 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Fusion Generator
7.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 20% Charge gained per use.  Passive: While at full Self-Destruct charge, Fusion Cannons' bonus damage is increased to 100%.
7.longDescription: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 20% Charge gained per use.  Passive: While at full Self-Destruct charge, Fusion Cannons' bonus damage is increased to 100%.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage in a large area. Every 4th consecutive hit on a Hero deals 100% more damage and Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.  Lasts for 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.
10.longDescription: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage in a large area. Every 4th consecutive hit on a Hero deals 100% more damage and Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.  Lasts for 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Micro Missiles
10.description: After .375 seconds, Channel to launch a volley of 12 missiles in a target direction. Each missile impacts the first enemy in its path, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and Slowing by 30% for 2 seconds.  Stores 2 charges with a 5 second cooldown between each use.  Requires Mech Mode.
10.longDescription: After .375 seconds, Channel to launch a volley of 12 missiles in a target direction. Each missile impacts the first enemy in its path, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and Slowing by 30% for 2 seconds.  Stores 2 charges with a 5 second cooldown between each use.  Requires Mech Mode.

13.name: Target Locked
13.description: Enemy Heroes that remain in your Defense Matrix for 1 seconds have their Armor reduced by 15 and their Movement Speed reduced by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that remain in your Defense Matrix for 1 seconds have their Armor reduced by 15 and their Movement Speed reduced by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Good To Go
13.description: Pilot Mode: Unlocks the Torpedo Dash and Concussive Pulse abilities.  Torpedo Dash: Dash a short distance. 10 second cooldown.  Concussive Pulse: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. 10 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: Pilot Mode: Unlocks the Torpedo Dash and Concussive Pulse abilities.  Torpedo Dash: Dash a short distance. 10 second cooldown.  Concussive Pulse: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. 10 second cooldown.

13.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
13.description: Pilot Mode: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 75% damage.
13.longDescription: Pilot Mode: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 75% damage.

16.name: In For The Kill
16.description: Casting Boosters grants a Shield equal to 10% of maximum life for 2.5 seconds. Each Enemy Hero hit by Boosters increases D.Va's Mech's Basic Attack damage by 10% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Casting Boosters grants a Shield equal to 10% of maximum life for 2.5 seconds. Each Enemy Hero hit by Boosters increases D.Va's Mech's Basic Attack damage by 10% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

16.name: Diverting Power
16.description: Defense Matrix's area grows drastically in size and each time it reduces damage dealt to Heroes D.Va's Mech is healed for 35 (+4% per level) Health.
16.longDescription: Defense Matrix's area grows drastically in size and each time it reduces damage dealt to Heroes D.Va's Mech is healed for 35 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Emergency Shielding
16.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 280 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.
16.longDescription: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 280 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Increase Bunny Hop's duration by 4 seconds, and it does not decay while D.Va's Mech is stationary.
20.longDescription: Increase Bunny Hop's duration by 4 seconds, and it does not decay while D.Va's Mech is stationary.

20.name: Timing Attack
20.description: Micro Missiles gains an additional charge. Each time Micro Missiles hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds and charge cooldown by 0.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Micro Missiles gains an additional charge. Each time Micro Missiles hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds and charge cooldown by 0.25 seconds.

20.name: Headshot!
20.description: Pilot Mode: Increase Big Shot's damage by 75% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Pilot Mode: Increase Big Shot's damage by 75% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

20.name: Ablative Armor
20.description: 45% of Spell damage dealt to D.Va's Mech is returned as healing over 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: 45% of Spell damage dealt to D.Va's Mech is returned as healing over 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech dies, she is ejected out after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight. D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon dying.Type: TransformationAffects: SelfD.Va's Mech still awards full Takedown credit.While in Mech Mode D.Va's Mount is replaced with Mechanized Walker.Fusion CannonsD.Va's Mech Basic Attacks deal 23 damage in a large area every 0.25 seconds. Deals 40% bonus damage against enemies very close to the Mech.Type: Physical damageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesProperties: Area of Effect, Attack ModifierRange: 3.75 (1Area of Effect: RectangleWidth: 2.0Height: 5.0 (1Bonus damage range: 1.751) Primary target must be within 3.75 range while secondary targets can be hit up to 5.0 range.Upon issuing an attack command on an enemy unit, D.Va attempts to move to a range where the target enemy can be hit by bonus damage.D.Va's Basic Attacks can hit secondary targets even if the primary target is Evading.Bonus damage stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect D.Va's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: Increases D.Va's Movement Speed by 115% for 1.75 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away.D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.Type: Spell damage, Crowd control / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Movement speed, Mobile channel, KnockbackCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 1.375Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsKnockback speed: 12Boosters cannot be activated while Rooted.The Ability can be reactivated after 0.5 seconds to end its effect early.Not affected by cooldown reduction granted by allies (e.g. Nano Boost, Blessing of the Bronze).

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Project a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 50%.Activate again to change the angle of the projection.Damage dealt to the Mech from enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.Type: Offensive damage modifierAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Mobile channelCast time: 0.125 + CH + 0 secondsRange: 0.5 (1Area of Effect: TrapezoidWidth: - Inner: 2.0- Outer: 6.0Height: 6.5Tickrate: 16 per secondDebuff duration: 0.3125 secondsRetarget cooldown: 0.5 seconds1) Offset to the start of the area.Defense Matrix can be canceled using the trait button to end its effect early.Damage reduction from Defense Matrix stacks multiplicatively with other offensive damage modifiers affecting the target Heroes' damage output.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1100 damage in a large area, depending on distance from center. Deals 50% damage against Structures.Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent Basic Attacking, and 25% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.Type: Spell damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, KnockbackCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 10Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsKnockback speed: 16Each Basic Attack grants 0.125% Self-Destruct Charge (even if the attack misses due to being Blinded or the target Evading). Hitting multiple enemies does not increase the Charge gained.Charge gained from damage taken is calculated after all damage modifications, excluding Defense Matrix.Self-Destruct can be activated while Boosters are active, and Boosters can be deactivated after leaving the Mech to stop it in its place.If Mech has taken fatal damage Self-Destruct cannot be used, unless Boosters are active.Upon cast D.Va is ejected from the back of the Mech and the Mech itself becomes Unkillable and turns into a Heroic Pet, allowing it to be hit by Abilities that can target Heroes.Exploding Mech can be afflicted and moved with crowd control and Stasis effects, like Stitches's Gorge, but these effects cannot suppress the Mech's explosion. Explosion can only be delayed by placing the Mech in Time Stop.Using Self-Destruct to eject from the Mech awards no experience or Takedown credit to enemies.If the Mech is Rooted prior to D.Va ejecting and the root expires before it explodes, it will move toward the location of the last move order issued while D.Va was in the Mech.Sometimes explodes prematurely when hit by Malthael's Throwing Shade.Can sometimes die twice (awarding double its normal experience) from certain Abilities.

abilities.name: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 70 damage in a large area. Every 4th consecutive hit on a Hero deals 100% more damage and Stuns them for 0.5 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds.Requires Mech Mode.Type: Spell damage / Crowd control / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, Stun, UnstoppableCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 4.5Tickrate: 2.0 per second (x8)Bunny Hop can be canceled after 1 second to end its effect early.

abilities.name: Micro Missiles
abilities.description: After 0.375 seconds Channel to launch a volley of 12 missiles in a target direction. Each missile impacts the first enemy in its path, dealing 40 damage in a small area and Slowing by 30% for 2 seconds.Stores 2 charges with a 5 second cooldown between each use.Requires Mech Mode.Type: Spell damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Mobile channel, Skillshot, Splash, SlowCast time: 0.0625 + CH + 0 secondsRange: 12Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 1.25Hitbox: 1.0 x 1.0Tickrate: 5.33 per second (x6)Initial delay: 0.3125 secondsThe launch location of left and right missile are each chosen at random from three possible horizontal offsets from the center: x=[±0.2, ±0.95, ±1.2].Missiles splash in an area upon hitting a target or upon reaching the end location.

abilities.name: Mechanized Walker
abilities.description: D.Va's Mech can shoot while moving. While shooting or channeling an Ability the Mech's Movement Speed is quickly reduced by 25%.Tickrate: 8.0 per second (x4)Movement speed per tick: 0.2968 (6.25%)Mechanized Walker directly affects D.Va's base Movement Speed, causing the reduction to stack multiplicatively with Slows and Movement Speed buffs.D.Va does not suffer the Movement Speed penalty from Mechanized Walker while using Boosters. Activating Boosters also immediately removes the reduction.

abilities.name: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon dying.Properties: Attack ModifierD.Va can Mount normally while in Pilot Mode

abilities.name: Torpedo Dash
abilities.description: Dash toward the target location, passing through enemies along the way.This Ability becomes available with the Good To Go talent at level 13Type: Movement: DashAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 4.5Missile speed: 14Torpedo Dash has a 0.75 second coolup after exiting Mech.D.Va's Basic Attack is placed on a 0.25 second cooldown when Torpedo Dash ends. Abilities can be used immediately.

abilities.name: Concussive Pulse
abilities.description: Deal 120 damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.This Ability becomes available with the Good To Go talent at level 13Type: Spell damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, KnockbackCast time: 0.0625 + 0.4375 secondsArea of Effect: RadialRadius: 6.0Arc: 60 degreesKnockback duration: 0.1875 seconds (1Knockback speed: 141) Knockback happens in three 0.0625 second long pulses.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. Basic Attacks lower this cooldown by 0.5 seconds each.Type: TransformationAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 0.5 (ch) + 0 secondsThis Ability has no cooldown if Self-Destruct was used to enter Pilot Mode. However, it remains disabled until the Mech has exploded.Entering the Mech successfully fully heals D.Va's pilot form and removes most debuffs.Interrupting Call Mech during its cast puts it on a 4 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Big Shot
abilities.description: Deal 150 damage to all enemies in a line. Heroes hit have their Movement Speed reduced by 25% for 1.5 seconds. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 5 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.Requires Pilot Mode.Type: Spell damage / Crowd contrlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), ClampingCast time: 0.5 (ch) + 0 secondsArea of Effect: RectangleWidth: 1.5Height: 15This Ability occupies the Heroic Ability slot in Pilot Mode, but is available from the start of the game.Interrupting Big Shot during its windup puts it on full cooldown.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.
1.longDescription: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.
1.longDescription: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Eyes in the Dark
4.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.
4.longDescription: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.
7.longDescription: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

7.name: Incendiary Elixir
7.description: Quest: Reduce the cooldown of Gilnean Cocktail by 2 seconds. Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Quest: Reduce the cooldown of Gilnean Cocktail by 2 seconds. Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.description: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.
7.longDescription: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.
10.longDescription: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.name: Cursed Bullet
10.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.
10.longDescription: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.
13.longDescription: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

13.name: On the Prowl
13.description: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

16.name: Eager Wolf
16.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: Passive: Go For The Throat's damage is increased by 25%.  If Go for the Throat kills its target, refund its Mana cost and reset the cooldowns of Greymane's Abilities.
20.longDescription: Passive: Go For The Throat's damage is increased by 25%.  If Go for the Throat kills its target, refund its Mana cost and reset the cooldowns of Greymane's Abilities.

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: Cursed Bullet's damage is reduced to 30% of current health but its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Cursed Bullet's damage is reduced to 30% of current health but its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
20.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.
20.longDescription: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage. Increase Razor Swipe's damage by 100%.
20.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage. Increase Razor Swipe's damage by 100%.

abilities.name: Curse of the Worgen (Trait)
abilities.description: Greymane can use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.While Human, Greymane's Basic Attacks are ranged.While Worgen, Greymane gains 10 Armor, and his Basic Attacks become melee, but deal 40% more damage.Type: Defensive damage modifier, Bonus damageScaling: -Affects: SelfProperties: ArmorSuccessfully mounting in the Worgen form shapeshifts Greymane back into Human, placing Darkflight on cooldown.Worgen bonus damage is a base damage increase, causing the given percentage to stack multiplicatively with other offensive damage modifiers affecting Greymane's Basic Attack damage.Does not stack with other positive Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 55 damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 damage to enemies in a cone behind them.Worgen: Razor SwipeSwipe forward, damaging enemies hit.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Skillshot, SplashCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 8.5Area of Effect: RadialRadius: 6.0 (1Arc: 65 degreesHitbox: 0.75 x 1.25 (initial)Missile speed: 27.51) Splash radius grows from 1.5 to 6.0 over 0.3125 seconds in increments of 1.125.Enemies who are immune to skillshots can be hit by the splash, but not by the initial projectile, as long as they are not also immune to AoE.

abilities.name: Razor Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe in the targeted direction, dealing 126 damage to enemies hit.Human: Gilnean CocktailDamage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Area of EffectCast time: InstantRange: 2.5(1Area of Effect: - Dash: Rectangle- End: RadialRadius: 2.5 (end)Arc: 180 degrees (end)Width: 5.0 (dash)Height: 2.5 (dash)Missile speed: 121) After dashing, Greymane swipes a half circle shaped area in front of him.Greymane can move through units during Razor Swipe.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack Modifier (cdr), Attack SpeedCast time: InstantCooldown starts when the effect ends.Stacks additively with other effects that can affect Greymane's Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy, dealing 88 damage.Worgen: DisengageRoll away and shapeshift into a Human.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Unit targetCast time: InstantRange: 6.0Missile speed: 30Cooldown is shared with Disengage.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.Human: DarkflightShapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy.Type: Movement: DashAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 6.0Missile speed: 19Cooldown is shared with Darkflight.

abilities.name: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Unstoppable (1Cast time: InstantRange: 5.5Missile speed: 50.51) Greymane is Unstoppable during the leap until he reaches the target.Enemy Heroes low enough on Health to be killed by Go for the Throat are indicated to the player by a red skull above the unit when the Ability is not on cooldown.Go for the Throat places Disengage on cooldown if it was cast from Human form.The Ability is interrupted if the target moves 8.5 units past its range.

abilities.name: Cursed Bullet
abilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.Does not affect Vehicles.Type: Spell DamageScaling: -Affects: Non-Vehicle enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Percent Damage, SkillshotCast time: 0.1 + 0 secondsRange: 12Hitbox: 1.0 x 1.97Missile speed: 26Casting Cursed Bullet from either form does not affect the cooldown of Darkflight or Disengage.

1.name: Furious Blow
1.description: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 40% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.
1.longDescription: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 40% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

1.name: War Paint
1.description: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.
1.longDescription: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.

1.name: Tough As Nails
1.description: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.
1.longDescription: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.description: Increase Seismic Slam's splash damage by 250%. Targeting a Hero with Seismic Slam further increases its splash damage by 250%, while targeting other enemies increases the length of its splash by 66%.
4.longDescription: Increase Seismic Slam's splash damage by 250%. Targeting a Hero with Seismic Slam further increases its splash damage by 250%, while targeting other enemies increases the length of its splash by 66%.

4.name: Hurricane
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

4.name: Shot Of Fury
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

7.name: Life Funnel
7.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.

7.name: Battle Rage
7.description: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.
7.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

10.name: Leap
10.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
10.longDescription: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.
10.longDescription: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.name: Ruthless
13.description: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 50% Health. Does not generate additional healing.
13.longDescription: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 50% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

13.name: No Escape
13.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.
13.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

16.name: Giant Slammer
16.description: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.5% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for 60% of the damage dealt.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.5% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for 60% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Rampage
16.description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Striding Giant
20.description: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

20.name: Composite Spear
20.description: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.name: Ignore Pain
20.description: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.Type: Resource, Status effectAffects: SelfProperties: Movement SpeedSonya starts at 0 Fury when she respawns.Basic Attacks generate 6 Fury each and every instance of damage Sonya takes generates 2 Fury.Movement Speed bonus does not stack, but instead refreshes the duration.

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 damage and briefly Stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Skillshot, StunCast time: 0.15 + 0 secondsRange: 6.5Hitbox: 1.25 x 2.25Missile speed: - Initial: 25 (spear & leap)- Minimum: 5.0- Acceleration: -5.0Ancient Spear can be used while Rooted, damaging the enemy and stunning them upon hit, but it will not cause Sonya to be pulled to them.Ancient Spear's Stun has variable duration and lasts until Sonya reaches her target (5 server ticks, or .3125s, at max range. 1 server tick, or .0625s, at point blank.)If the enemy dies from the impact or while Sonya is being pulled to them, the pull will continue until Sonya reaches their location.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 176 damage to the target enemy and 44 to enemies behind the target.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: SplashCast time: 0.15 + 0 secondsRange: 2.25Area of Effect: Rectangle (1Width: 3.0Height: 6.01) Splash search is done in three 3x2 areas, impacting at 0.15 intervals behind the target. The first search takes place at the same time as the initial impact.Primary target cannot be hit by the splash damage of the same cast.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 138 damage a second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds, healing for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.Type: Spell Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Lifesteal, Mobile channelCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.5Tickrate: 2.0 per second (x6)Damage per tick: 69Whirlwind can be reactivated after 0.75 seconds to end its effect early.Lifesteal value against Heroes is set to 75% of damage dealt.Sonya ignores collision with Heroes, Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters while Whirlwinding.While Whirlwinding, Sonya attempts to closely follow behind the target of the last attack command issued to her.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status EffectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Stun, UnstoppableCast time: InstantRange: 10Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.0 (1Missile speed: 301) Extended by Sonya's unit radius.Sonya becomes Unstoppable while in the air.Targeting Leap less than 0.65 units from Sonya's location causes her to land in place after 0.2 seconds' delay, and without granting Sonya Unstoppable.Regardless, Leap is a Movement Ability and cannot be cast while Rooted.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
abilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.Type: Offensive damage modifier, Crowd control reductionAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantCooldown starts when the Ability is cast.Does not stack with itself.Damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers affecting Sonya's damage output.

1.name: Journeyman Cooking
1.description: Each Hero hit by Ez-Thro Dynamite heals you for 8% of maximum Health.  Quest: Hitting Heroes with Ez-Thro Dynamite permanently increases your maximum Health by 10, to a maximum of 750 bonus Health.
1.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Ez-Thro Dynamite heals you for 8% of maximum Health.  Quest: Hitting Heroes with Ez-Thro Dynamite permanently increases your maximum Health by 10, to a maximum of 750 bonus Health.

1.name: Bones to Gnaw
1.description: Loot Hoard creates a chunk of Meat when it lands. While under the effects of Meat, gain 10 Armor.
1.longDescription: Loot Hoard creates a chunk of Meat when it lands. While under the effects of Meat, gain 10 Armor.

1.name: On The Prowl
1.description: Activate to gain 30 Rage over 8 seconds.  Passive: You heal for 8 (+4% per level) Health every second, increased by 2% per point of Rage.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 30 Rage over 8 seconds.  Passive: You heal for 8 (+4% per level) Health every second, increased by 2% per point of Rage.

4.name: Brute Force
4.description: Increase the range of Loot Hoard by 20% and its damage by 50%.  Quest: Hitting Heroes with Staggering Blow permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 2, to a maximum of 150 bonus damage. Enemy Heroes that hit terrain grant an additional 8 damage.
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Loot Hoard by 20% and its damage by 50%.  Quest: Hitting Heroes with Staggering Blow permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 2, to a maximum of 150 bonus damage. Enemy Heroes that hit terrain grant an additional 8 damage.

4.name: Aggro Range
4.description: Increase Hogg Wild's radius by 20% and each enemy hit generates 0.5 Rage, increased to 2 against Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increase Hogg Wild's radius by 20% and each enemy hit generates 0.5 Rage, increased to 2 against Heroes.

4.name: Hogger's Joggers
4.description: While above 30 Rage, gain 10% increased Movement Speed and healing received.  When at or above 50 Rage, increase these bonuses to 15%.
4.longDescription: While above 30 Rage, gain 10% increased Movement Speed and healing received.  When at or above 50 Rage, increase these bonuses to 15%.

7.name: Seeing Red
7.description: While above 50 Rage, gain 35% Attack Speed and the cooldowns of Staggering Blow and Hogg Wild refresh 30% faster.
7.longDescription: While above 50 Rage, gain 35% Attack Speed and the cooldowns of Staggering Blow and Hogg Wild refresh 30% faster.

7.name: Dense Blasting Powder
7.description: Instant detonations of Ez-Thro Dynamite creates an additional dynamite behind the Hero hit.  Hitting the bundle of Ez-Thro Dynamite with Staggering Blow breaks it into three sticks and launches them forward in an arc.
7.longDescription: Instant detonations of Ez-Thro Dynamite creates an additional dynamite behind the Hero hit.  Hitting the bundle of Ez-Thro Dynamite with Staggering Blow breaks it into three sticks and launches them forward in an arc.

7.name: Garbage Fire
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Loot Hoard by 2 seconds.  Every 0.5 seconds, enemies in a large area around Loot Hoard take 23 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 20%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Loot Hoard by 2 seconds.  Every 0.5 seconds, enemies in a large area around Loot Hoard take 23 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 20%.

10.name: Hoardapult
10.description: Launch an empowered Loot Hoard with Hogger attached, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 50% for 2 seconds.  Hoardapult's Loot Hoard lasts for up to 20 seconds, decaying rapidly while not nearby. Every 10 seconds Hogger can take a chunk of Meat from the Loot Hoard.
10.longDescription: Launch an empowered Loot Hoard with Hogger attached, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 50% for 2 seconds.  Hoardapult's Loot Hoard lasts for up to 20 seconds, decaying rapidly while not nearby. Every 10 seconds Hogger can take a chunk of Meat from the Loot Hoard.

10.name: Shockwave
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, slam the ground, sending out a shockwave that travels in a long line. Enemies hit by the initial slam take 335 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 1.5 seconds. Enemies only hit by the shockwave take 230 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, slam the ground, sending out a shockwave that travels in a long line. Enemies hit by the initial slam take 335 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 1.5 seconds. Enemies only hit by the shockwave take 230 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dust Devil
13.description: Gain 20 Armor while Hogg Wild is active and for 3 seconds after. When at or above 50 Rage, increase this Armor to 40.
13.longDescription: Gain 20 Armor while Hogg Wild is active and for 3 seconds after. When at or above 50 Rage, increase this Armor to 40.

13.name: Pummel
13.description: Enemies hit by Hogg Wild are Slowed by 10% for 2 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.  Heroes hit have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by Hogg Wild are Slowed by 10% for 2 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.  Heroes hit have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Bloodthirst
13.description: Damaging Heroes with Basic Attacks, Staggering Blow, or Hogg Wild heals you for 33% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Damaging Heroes with Basic Attacks, Staggering Blow, or Hogg Wild heals you for 33% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Headbanger
16.description: Enemy Heroes Stunned by Staggering Blow take an additional 8% of their maximum Health as damage and are Stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes Stunned by Staggering Blow take an additional 8% of their maximum Health as damage and are Stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Kablooie!
16.description: Instant Ez-Thro Dynamite detonations deal 50% more damage, reduce its cooldown by 1.5 seconds, and increase its Slow amount to 50%.  Passive: Increase Ez-Thro Dynamite's range by 25%.
16.longDescription: Instant Ez-Thro Dynamite detonations deal 50% more damage, reduce its cooldown by 1.5 seconds, and increase its Slow amount to 50%.  Passive: Increase Ez-Thro Dynamite's range by 25%.

16.name: Furzerker
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Staggering Blow or Ez-Thro Dynamite increases the damage of the next Basic Attack within 8 seconds by 50%, stacking up to 2 times.  When Hogg Wild ends, gain 30% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Staggering Blow or Ez-Thro Dynamite increases the damage of the next Basic Attack within 8 seconds by 50%, stacking up to 2 times.  When Hogg Wild ends, gain 30% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

20.name: Secret Stash
20.description: Every 2 seconds, Hoardapults' Loot Hoard randomly launches Ez-Thro Dynamite, prioritizing nearby enemy Heroes.  Every 5 seconds, it also launches a chunk of Meat towards Hogger.
20.longDescription: Every 2 seconds, Hoardapults' Loot Hoard randomly launches Ez-Thro Dynamite, prioritizing nearby enemy Heroes.  Every 5 seconds, it also launches a chunk of Meat towards Hogger.

20.name: Power Spike
20.description: Hitting Heroes with Shockwave reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds and grants 20 Rage.  Passive: Rage's cooldown reduction affects Shockwave's cooldown.
20.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Shockwave reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds and grants 20 Rage.  Passive: Rage's cooldown reduction affects Shockwave's cooldown.

20.name: No Control
20.description: Activate to cast an untalented Hogg Wild and begin chasing an enemy Hero. After reaching the Hero, bounce to a random nearby enemy Hero. Lasts up to 5 seconds, rapidly decaying if there are no other enemy Heroes nearby.  Cannot be cancelled.
20.longDescription: Activate to cast an untalented Hogg Wild and begin chasing an enemy Hero. After reaching the Hero, bounce to a random nearby enemy Hero. Lasts up to 5 seconds, rapidly decaying if there are no other enemy Heroes nearby.  Cannot be cancelled.

20.name: Anger Management
20.description: Increase maximum Rage by 50, raising the maximum bonuses for its cooldown refresh rate to 75% and Hogg Wild's Hero damage to 75%.  Passive: Basic Attacks grant 5 additional Rage.
20.longDescription: Increase maximum Rage by 50, raising the maximum bonuses for its cooldown refresh rate to 75% and Hogg Wild's Hero damage to 75%.  Passive: Basic Attacks grant 5 additional Rage.

abilities.name: Loot Hoard
abilities.description: Throw a pile of junk onto the battlefield, dealing 102 damage in a small area, knocking enemies away and acting as terrain for up to 5 seconds. When the Loot Hoard expires or is destroyed, a chunk of Meat is falls out that can be picked up to restore 3% of maximum Health every second for 4 seconds. Reactivate to destroy Loot Hoard.Type: Terrain / Spell Damage, Crowd control / HealingScaling: 4.00% (damage)Affects: All units / Enemies / SelfProperties: Area of Effect, Heal over Time, Knockback, Self-castableCast time: 0.125 + 0.0625 secondsRange: 8.0Area of Effect: - Terrain: Square- Impact: CircleRadius: 2.5 (impact)Width: 2.0 (terrain)Height: 2.0 (terrain)Missile speed: 40Tickrate: 1.0 per second (x5)Meat pickup radius: 2.0Knockback duration: 0.0625 secondsKnockback speed: 12Loot Hoard can be reactivated 0.5 seconds after it has spawned to end its effect early. This still spawns Meat.Loot Hoard is aligned with the map grid and must be placed on a location, where it does not collide with Hogger's unit radius and its center does not collide with existing terrain.Picking up Meat while under its effects adds to its total duration.Meat stays on the ground for up to 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Rage is gained by taking damage or dealing Basic Attack damage. Hogger’s Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 1% faster for every 2 points of Rage. After 3 seconds of not gaining Rage, it begins to quickly decay.Affects: SelfProperties: Attack ModifierHogger gains 5 Rage when landing a Basic Attack and 1 Rage each time he takes damage.

abilities.name: Staggering Blow
abilities.description: Swing your chain in a wide arc, dealing 140 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. If an enemy collides with terrain, deal an additional 150 damage, Stun for 0.75 seconds, and gain 15 Rage.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping,  Knockback, Stationary channel (1, StunCast time: 0.125 + 0.125 secondsArea of Effect: RadialRadius: 5.75Arc: 120 degrees (1Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsKnockback speed: 171) The swing is channeled and the search is split in three 40 degree sections, rotating counter-clockwise over 0.1875 seconds.Enemies are knocked away radially from Hogger.Damage from terrain hit is dealt in a separate instance.Hogger's Basic Attack is placed on a 0.375 second cooldown when Staggering Blow finishes casting.

abilities.name: Ez-Thro Dynamite
abilities.description: Toss a bundle of Dynamite with a 1.5 second fuse. Upon detonation, enemies take 180 damage and are Slowed by 30% for 2 seconds. The Dynamite instantly detonates when landing directly on an enemy Hero and grants Hogger 10 Rage.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Self-castable, SlowCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 6.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Timed: 3.0- Instant: 0.875Dynamite bundle takes 0.5 seconds to reach its end location regardless of distance.Instant detonation only triggers on the enemy Hero closest to the dynamite's center, causing the Rage gain and talent bonuses only to be applied once per dynamite regardless of how many Heroes were hit.Dynamite bundle grants vision over its area before detonating.

abilities.name: Hogg Wild
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, become Unstoppable and uncontrollably spin towards the target direction, ricocheting off terrain. Ricocheting off terrain refreshes the duration.Every 0.125 seconds, deal 44 damage to nearby non-Structure enemies. Damage against Heroes is increased by 0.5% for each point of Rage.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: Dash, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: non-Structure enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Self-castable, UnstoppableCast time: 0.25 + 0 secondsArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.625Missile speed: - Initial: 0.2Maximum: 13.5- Acceleration: 13Tickrate: 8.0 per secondDamage per tick: 36Duration: - Initial: 1.5625 seconds- Bounces: 1.375 secondsHogg Wild can be reactivated after 0.5 seconds to end its effect early.Bouncing off terrain instantly sets the speed to 14.5.During Hogg Wild Hogger also bounces off of Structure units and his Loot Hoard, but ignores collision with any other units, including pathing blockers like Tassadar's Force Wall.Contact with terrain is checked from the centerpoint of Hogger's hitbox.Cooldown starts when the Ability ends.Rage damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Hogg Wild's damage.

abilities.name: Hoardapult
abilities.description: Launch an empowered Loot Hoard with Hogger attached, dealing 100 damage and Slowing enemies by 50% for 2 seconds. Hoardapult’s Loot Hoard lasts for up to 20 seconds, decaying rapidly while not nearby. Every 10 seconds Hogger can take a chunk of Meat from the Loot Hoard.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies, SelfTargeting: Vector targetingProperties: Area of Effect, Self-castable, Slow, UnstoppableCast time: 0.375 + 0.0625 secondsRange: 15Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.5Missile speed: 40Meat pickup radius: 4.5Decay radius: 14Hoardapult can be canceled after 0.75 seconds to end its effect early.The initial point of vector targeting determines the location of the Loot Hoard unit and the second which direction Hogger will be positioned next to it.Hoardapult can exceptionally be cast while Rooted.Hogger is Unstoppable while in the air.In addition to Hoardapult's damage, enemies also take damage from Loot Hoard's impact.Loot Hoards created by Hoardapult and Meat dropped by them have the same properties as their base version and interact with Talents affecting them, except the initial Meat drop from Bones to Gnaw.Hogger automatically consumes Meat if he is within the pickup radius and not at maximum Health. The first Meat can be collected instantly.If Hogger is not within the decay radius, Hoardapult's duration is reduced by 0.5 seconds every 0.0625 seconds.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, slam the ground, sending out a shockwave that travels in a long line. Enemies hit by the initial slam take 335 damage and are Stunned for 1.5 seconds. Enemies only hit by the shockwave take 230 damage and are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), Clamping, Piercing Skillshot, StunCast time: 0.5 (ch) + 0.25 secondsRange: - Slam: 2.5- Shockwave: 17Area of Effect: - Slam: Circle- Shockwave: RectangleRadius: 2.5 (slam)Hitbox: 2.5 x 1.5 (shockwave)Missile speed: 22Interrupting Shockwave during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Enemies hit by the initial slam cannot be affected by the shockwave.

1.name: Warbreaker
1.description: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.  Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.  Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.  Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.  Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Unrivaled Strength
1.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.
1.longDescription: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.

1.name: Body Check
1.description: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.

4.name: In for the Kill
4.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.
4.longDescription: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

4.name: Thirst for Battle
4.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

4.name: Indomitable
4.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Intimidation
7.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 30% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Oppressor
7.description: Basic Attacks and Bloodthirst against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks and Bloodthirst against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Lok-tar Ogar!
7.description: Increase Into the Fray's Armor by 20. Hitting enemy Heroes with Into the Fray reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Into the Fray's Armor by 20. Hitting enemy Heroes with Into the Fray reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

10.name: Warlord's Challenge
10.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

10.name: Decimate
10.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.
10.longDescription: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

13.name: Defensive Measures
13.description: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

13.name: Bloodcraze
13.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Up
13.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Mortal Combo
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.
16.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.

16.name: Earthshaker
16.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Seasoned Soldier
16.description: Gain 5% maximum Health, increase Groundbreaker's Slow duration by 1 second, and Bloodthirst gains an additional charge.
16.longDescription: Gain 5% maximum Health, increase Groundbreaker's Slow duration by 1 second, and Bloodthirst gains an additional charge.

20.name: Death Wish
20.description: Increase the duration of Warlord's Challenge by 0.5 seconds.  If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Warlord's Challenge by 0.5 seconds.  If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

20.name: Deadly Calm
20.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titanic Might
20.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.
20.longDescription: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

20.name: Inner Rage
20.description: Body Check gains an additional charge and its healing reduction is increased by an additional 45%.
20.longDescription: Body Check gains an additional charge and its healing reduction is increased by an additional 45%.

abilities.name: Armor Up

abilities.name: Groundbreaker

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.Type: Spell damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies (impact) / Enemy Heroes, Minions & Mercenaries (throw)Targeting: Point target (impact) / Automatic (throw)Properties: ClampingImpact - Area of Effect, SlowThrow - Displacement, Daze, StunCast time: InstantRange: 5.5Throw search radius: 2.5Impact radius: 2.5Throw duration: 0.3125 secondsAutomatically selects the enemy closest to Garrosh to be thrown, indicated by a red marker above the unit. Does not prioritize Heroes.Enemy Structures and Summons (that are not Heroic Pets) and Monsters can be damaged, but not thrown.The thrown enemy is briefly Stunned, interrupting channeled abilities, and then Dazed for the remainder of the flight.The thrown enemy also receives the impact effects upon landing.

abilities.name: Warlord's Challenge

abilities.name: Into the Fray
abilities.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 20 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.Type: Spell damage, Crowd control (impact) / Crowd control, Defensive damage modifier, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies (impact) / Allied Heroes, Minions & Mercenaries (throw)Targeting: Point target (impact) / Automatic (throw)Properties: ClampingImpact - Area of Effect, SlowThrow - Armor, Displacement, Daze, UnstoppableCast time: InstantRange: 8.0Throw search radius: 2.5Impact radius: 2.5Throw duration: 0.3125 secondsAutomatically selects the ally closest to Garrosh to be thrown, indicated by a blue marker above the unit. Does not prioritize Heroes.The thrown ally is Dazed during the flight, interrupting stationary channeled abilities.Into the Fray cannot target Unstoppable or Invulnerable allies, Structures or Summons that are not Heroic Pets.Into the Fray does not benefit from any Talents affecting Wrecking Ball.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 0.5% and refund 6 Mana.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Hammerang, increase its damage by 15%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 0.5% and refund 6 Mana.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Hammerang, increase its damage by 15%.

1.name: Dishonorable Discharge
1.description: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 2 seconds.  Quest: After 3 Lightning Rod strikes, subsequent strikes on enemy Heroes increases its damage by 0.75%, up to 75%.  Reward: After 30 subsequent strikes, further reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 2 seconds.  Reward:After 100 subsequent strikes, Takedowns reset Lightning Rod's cooldown.
1.longDescription: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 2 seconds.  Quest: After 3 Lightning Rod strikes, subsequent strikes on enemy Heroes increases its damage by 0.75%, up to 75%.  Reward: After 30 subsequent strikes, further reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 2 seconds.  Reward:After 100 subsequent strikes, Takedowns reset Lightning Rod's cooldown.

1.name: Frequent Flyer

1.longDescription: Activate Frequent Flyer to gain 40% Attack Speed and Tailwind for 4 seconds.  Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 0.5 Basic Attack Damage.

4.longDescription: Lightning Rod strikes grant a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health, up to 28%, for 4 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increases Barrel Roll's range by 40% and Shield amount by 70%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

4.name: Hammer Gains

4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon

7.longDescription: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 75% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.longDescription: Hammerang's explosion deals 100% additional damage, and hitting enemy Heroes reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.description: Lightning Rod deals 25% more damage each subsequent strike.
13.longDescription: Lightning Rod deals 25% more damage each subsequent strike.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.
13.longDescription: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Sustained Winds
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health, increased to 2% while Tailwind is active.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health, increased to 2% while Tailwind is active.

16.name: Crippling Hammer
16.description: Increase Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 50%, and Hammerang's explosion also Slows.
16.longDescription: Increase Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 50%, and Hammerang's explosion also Slows.

16.name: Aerie Gusts

16.longDescription: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.
20.longDescription: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel

20.longDescription: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.
20.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 50 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 50 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

Target momentarily leaving the active radius or becoming untargetable does not end the Ability, as long as they are valid for the next check.Only one Lightning Rod may be active at a time. Recasting Lightning Rod on another Hero while it is still active causes only the initial damage to be dealt. Recasting Lightning Rod on the same Hero resets its duration.Damage bonus to Minions and Mercenaries stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers affecting Lightning Rod's damage.
