1.name: Tricky Shuffles
1.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.
1.longDescription: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.description: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 120% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.
1.longDescription: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 120% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Blow 'Em Up!
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.

4.name: BOOM POW
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

4.name: Chattering Teeth
4.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

7.name: Bogged Down
7.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.
7.longDescription: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.

7.name: Big As
7.description: Steel Trap now only hits Heroes, and Heroes hit have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds. Increases Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.
7.longDescription: Steel Trap now only hits Heroes, and Heroes hit have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds. Increases Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2 seconds.

7.name: Dirty Trickster
7.description: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.
7.longDescription: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.
10.longDescription: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 935 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 935 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Bombs Away
13.description: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 30% bonus damage.
13.longDescription: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 30% bonus damage.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.
13.longDescription: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
13.description: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.
13.longDescription: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.
16.longDescription: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.
16.longDescription: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.
20.longDescription: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.
20.longDescription: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

20.name: I Hate Waiting!
20.description: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 8 seconds.
20.longDescription: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem

abilities.name: Detonate Mine
abilities.description: Detonate the planted Concussion Mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantRange: GlobalRequires an active Concussion Mine.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 124 damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SkillshotCast time: InstantRange: - Launch (max): 10- Roll: 12.25Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Hitbox: 0.5- Explosion: 2.0Missile speed: 16 (launch)If the grenade lands on unpathable terrain, it explodes immediately without bouncing.Enemies that are immune to skillshots cannot trigger the grenades, but can be damaged by the explosion.Depending on the distance, launched grenades have a flight time of up to 0.625 seconds.Grenades have a set rolling distance regardless of launch distance.Rolling speed gradually decelerates over the distance down to 1.75.Will explode on Invulnerable targets (dealing no damage).

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.Limit 1 active mine.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies, SelfProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Summon figment, Displacement, DazeCast time: InstantRange: 10.5Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.5Displacement duration: - Min: 0.75- Max: 1.0Displacement distance: - Min: 8.0 - Max: 14.0Concussion Mine takes 0.125-0.75 seconds to reach the target location, based on distance to target point.The mine is Invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until detonation or placing another one.Concussion Mine provides vision in 3 radius.The area of effect is visible to enemies.Targets launched by Concussion Mine detonation (including Junkrat himself) are Dazed and can travel over unpathable terrain.Distance and duration of the displacement depend on how far the target is hit from the center of the Mine, with the longest being the farthest.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 to enemies on the edge.Type: SummonTargeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Stationary channelCast time: 1.0 (ch) + CH + 0 secondsRIP-TireType: ActiveScaling: 4.00% (Health)Targeting: Direct controlHealth: 530Basic Attack damage: -Movement Speed: 6.5Sight radius: 8.0Leash radius: -Unit radius: 0.75Interrupting the ability during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.While controlling RIP-Tire, Junkrat has access to Jump and Detonate RIP-Tire abilities.RIP-Tire does not detonate if it is destroyed or has expired.If Junkrat's channel gets interrupted, RIP-Tire instantly expires without detonating.The durations of crowd control effects against RIP-Tire are reduced by 75%.

abilities.name: Rocket Ride
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 935 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: Teleport, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), Clamping, StasisCast time: 1.25 (ch) + 5.0 secondsRange: 10Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.0Movement Speed in air: 6.0Sight radius in air: 5.0Interrupting the Ability during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Junkrat is put in a special Stasis state for the duration of Rocket Ride, removing most debuffs and making him immune to damage.

1.name: Lion's Maw
1.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 6, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 6, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.name: Overpower
1.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 40% more damage.
1.longDescription: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 40% more damage.

1.name: High King's Quest
1.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

4.name: Taunt
4.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.
4.longDescription: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

4.name: Colossus Smash
4.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.
4.longDescription: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

7.name: Lionheart
7.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 75%.
7.longDescription: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 75%.

7.name: Second Wind
7.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Victory Rush
7.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

10.name: Shield Wall
10.description: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.
10.longDescription: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

10.name: Warbringer
10.description: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.
10.longDescription: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

13.name: Juggernaut
13.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Mortal Strike
13.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shattering Throw
13.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.
13.longDescription: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

16.name: Banner of Stormwind
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Ironforge
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Dalaran
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

20.name: Vigilance
20.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.

20.name: Master at Arms
20.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy
20.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Heroic Strike damage by an additional 25%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.
20.longDescription: Twin Blades of Fury increases Heroic Strike damage by an additional 25%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

20.name: Glory to the Alliance
20.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 50%.
20.longDescription: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

20.name: Demoralizing Shout
20.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Heroic Strike
abilities.description: Every 18 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack deals 125 bonus Spell Damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesProperties: Attack ModifierThis damage will also miss and set the Trait back on full cooldown if a Basic Attack misses while this effect is available (because of Varian being Blinded or the target Evading).However, the cooldown is still reduced (if on cooldown) by Basic Attacks which so miss.

abilities.name: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35, increased to 140 against Heroes.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Piercing Skillshot, SlowCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 10Hitbox: 0.875 x 2.4Missile speed: 18

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge to the target enemy, dealing 50 damage and Slowing them by 75% for 1 second.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: SlowCast time: InstantRange: 5.0Missile speed: 18If there is an unpathable area between Varian and the target, Varian will try to dash around it until Charge reaches its maximum duration of 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.Type: Crowd control / Health modifierScaling: -Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: TauntCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.0The effect ends immediately if Varian dies.Cannot be cast on enemy Heroes who are immune to crowd control.

abilities.name: Colossus Smash
abilities.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%.Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.Type: Spell Damage, Defensive damage modifier / Movement: Launch, Offensive damage modifier, Health modifierScaling: 4.00%Affects: Non-Structure enemies / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Armor reductionCast time: InstantRange: 5.0Missile speed: 8.0Cast is interrupted if the target moves more than 7 units beyond the Ability's cast range.Armor reduction does not stack with other negative Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.Attack damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can attack Varian's Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Twin Blades of Fury
abilities.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.Type: Status effect, Offensive damage modifierAffects: SelfTargeting: SelfProperties: Attack Speed, Movement speedAttack Speed increase is to Varian's base Attack Speed, and therefore stacks multiplicatively with any other Attack Speed modifiers.Damage penalty stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Varian's Basic Attack damage.

1.name: Perfect Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Muradin hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase Storm Bolt's damage by 0.75. If an enemy Hero is killed within 3 seconds of being hit by a Storm Bolt increase its damage by an additional 10.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Muradin hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase Storm Bolt's damage by 0.75. If an enemy Hero is killed within 3 seconds of being hit by a Storm Bolt increase its damage by an additional 10.

1.name: Dwarf Block
1.description: Casting Dwarf Toss grants 4 charges of Block. Each Block charge grants 75 Physical Armor against a single enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.
1.longDescription: Casting Dwarf Toss grants 4 charges of Block. Each Block charge grants 75 Physical Armor against a single enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

1.name: Third Wind
1.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 90 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 180 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.
1.longDescription: Increases Health Restoration rate to 90 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 180 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

4.name: Sledgehammer
4.description: Stormbolt deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Increase Storm Bolt's cooldown reduction from 1 second to 1.25 seconds per Basic Attack.
4.longDescription: Stormbolt deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Increase Storm Bolt's cooldown reduction from 1 second to 1.25 seconds per Basic Attack.

4.name: Reverberation
4.description: Increases the Attack Speed Slow of Thunder Clap from 30% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.
4.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed Slow of Thunder Clap from 30% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.

4.name: Thunder Burn
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 75% damage.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 75% damage.

7.name: Heavy Impact
7.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are Slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are Slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Give 'em the Axe!
7.description: Attacking a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Skullcracker
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 90% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 90% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Avatar
10.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1000 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1000 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Haymaker
10.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.
10.longDescription: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

13.name: Bronzebeard Rage
13.description: Deal 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt. Hitting an enemy Hero with Storm Bolt increase this damage by 200% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Deal 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt. Hitting an enemy Hero with Storm Bolt increase this damage by 200% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Healing Static
13.description: Muradin heals for 5% of his maximum Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.
13.longDescription: Muradin heals for 5% of his maximum Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

13.name: Thunder Strike
13.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.  Passive: Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.  Passive: Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by 2 seconds.

16.name: Dwarf Launch
16.description: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Stoneform
16.description: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.
16.longDescription: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Grand Slam
20.description: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.
20.longDescription: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

1.name: Evenhanded Blessings
1.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by 15% and refund 40% of its cooldown.
1.longDescription: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by 15% and refund 40% of its cooldown.

1.name: Power Word: Shield
1.description: While Divine Star is traveling out, allies in its path gain a Shield that absorbs 128 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.  If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, Anduin gains a Shield that absorbs 185 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Divine Star is traveling out, allies in its path gain a Shield that absorbs 128 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.  If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, Anduin gains a Shield that absorbs 185 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

1.name: Lightwell
1.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 50 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 15 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.
1.longDescription: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 50 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 15 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

4.name: Moral Compass
4.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at Heroes close to its apex.  Passive: Increase Attack Range by 1.1.
4.longDescription: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at Heroes close to its apex.  Passive: Increase Attack Range by 1.1.

4.name: Surge of Light
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Chastise by 0.75 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes Rooted by Chastise launch an additional Basic Attack and restore 25 Mana.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Chastise by 0.75 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes Rooted by Chastise launch an additional Basic Attack and restore 25 Mana.

4.name: Piercing Light
4.description: Chastise pierces to hit an additional Hero.  Quest: Hitting two Heroes with a single Chastise permanently increases Spell Power by 1, to a maximum of 10.
4.longDescription: Chastise pierces to hit an additional Hero.  Quest: Hitting two Heroes with a single Chastise permanently increases Spell Power by 1, to a maximum of 10.

7.name: Binding Heal
7.description: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 135 (+4% per level).
7.longDescription: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 135 (+4% per level).

7.name: Blessed Recovery
7.description: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)
7.longDescription: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)

7.name: Desperate Prayer
7.description: Activate to instantly heal an allied Hero for 375 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.
7.longDescription: Activate to instantly heal an allied Hero for 375 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.

10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 30% of their max Health and are Protected.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 30% of their max Health and are Protected.

10.name: Lightbomb
10.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: Speed of the Pious
13.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.  Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by 1 second.
13.longDescription: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.  Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Push Forward!
13.description: Damaging an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 2.5% and the amount healed by Pursued By Grace by 5% for 6 seconds. These effects stack up to 8 times.
13.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 2.5% and the amount healed by Pursued By Grace by 5% for 6 seconds. These effects stack up to 8 times.

13.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available. Allies pulled by Leap of Faith are healed for 280 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available. Allies pulled by Leap of Faith are healed for 280 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

16.name: Renew
16.description: Flash Heal heals an additional 180 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds. The duration of this heal is refreshed each time Anduin hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack.
16.longDescription: Flash Heal heals an additional 180 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds. The duration of this heal is refreshed each time Anduin hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack.

16.name: Holy Nova
16.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 150 (+4% per level).
16.longDescription: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 150 (+4% per level).

16.name: Glyph of Faith
16.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.
16.longDescription: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

16.name: Inner Focus
16.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 25% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes reduces this cooldown by 1 second.
16.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 25% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

20.name: Light of Stormwind
20.description: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin.  Channeling Holy Word: Salvation for its full duration reduces its cooldown by 60 seconds.
20.longDescription: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin.  Channeling Holy Word: Salvation for its full duration reduces its cooldown by 60 seconds.

20.name: Inner Fire
20.description: The target of Light Bomb gains 40% Move Speed and 50 Armor for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: The target of Light Bomb gains 40% Move Speed and 50 Armor for 3 seconds.

20.name: Censure
20.description: Chastise Stuns for 0.75 seconds and its Root duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Chastise Stuns for 0.75 seconds and its Root duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Varian's Legacy
20.description: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

1.name: Thunderstroke
1.description: Increase the damage of Lightning Fury by 15.  Quest: Lightning Fury's damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.
1.longDescription: Increase the damage of Lightning Fury by 15.  Quest: Lightning Fury's damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.

1.name: Impale
1.description: Increase Fend's cast range and area of effect by 25%. It deals an additional 50% damage to enemies below 50% Health.
1.longDescription: Increase Fend's cast range and area of effect by 25%. It deals an additional 50% damage to enemies below 50% Health.

1.name: Charged Strikes
1.description: Gain 15% Attack Speed. Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 15% bonus damage and bounces to nearby enemy Heroes.
1.longDescription: Gain 15% Attack Speed. Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 15% bonus damage and bounces to nearby enemy Heroes.

4.name: Plate of the Whale
4.description: Regenerate 6 (+4% per level) Health per second while Avoidance is active. If fully charged, gain an additional 12 (+4% per level) Health per second.
4.longDescription: Regenerate 6 (+4% per level) Health per second while Avoidance is active. If fully charged, gain an additional 12 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: Ring of the Leech
4.description: Basic Attacks against your primary target heal for 15% of their damage. If an enemy is Blinded, this also affects Lightning Fury and Fend.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against your primary target heal for 15% of their damage. If an enemy is Blinded, this also affects Lightning Fury and Fend.

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health over 5 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit with Lightning Fury lower the cooldown of this ability by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health over 5 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit with Lightning Fury lower the cooldown of this ability by 10 seconds.

7.name: Grounding Rod
7.description: Enemies hit by Lightning Fury or Fend are Slowed by 20% for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Lightning Fury or Fend are Slowed by 20% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Seraph's Hymn
7.description: Basic Attacks against your primary enemy Hero grant 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Increase the passive damage bonus of Blinding Light from 15% to 30%.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against your primary enemy Hero grant 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Increase the passive damage bonus of Blinding Light from 15% to 30%.

7.name: Surge of Light
7.description: After taking 650 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 220 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.
7.longDescription: After taking 650 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 220 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.
10.longDescription: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.
10.longDescription: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: War Matron
13.description: Cassia becomes Protected while Channeling Fend and for an additional 1 second if the Channel is completed.
13.longDescription: Cassia becomes Protected while Channeling Fend and for an additional 1 second if the Channel is completed.

13.name: War Traveler
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed and Mounting is instant.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed and Mounting is instant.

13.name: Gloves of Alacrity
13.description: Gain 1 Basic Attack range. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 1 Basic Attack range.
13.longDescription: Gain 1 Basic Attack range. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Power Strike
16.description: Lightning Fury pierces but only splits on Heroes. Enemy Heroes hit reduce its cooldown by 1 second and become marked for 15 seconds. Upon reaching 3 marks, remove them and cast a Blinding Light at their feet.
16.longDescription: Lightning Fury pierces but only splits on Heroes. Enemy Heroes hit reduce its cooldown by 1 second and become marked for 15 seconds. Upon reaching 3 marks, remove them and cast a Blinding Light at their feet.

16.name: Static Electricity
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Lightning Fury. Fend's impact launches a lightning bolt towards each nearby enemy Hero.
16.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Lightning Fury. Fend's impact launches a lightning bolt towards each nearby enemy Hero.

16.name: Martial Law
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Increase this to 3% if they are Stunned, Rooted or Slowed.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Increase this to 3% if they are Stunned, Rooted or Slowed.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely. Every bounce reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely. Every bounce reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling an enemy Hero, they are Blinded for 5 seconds and Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. This wave Silences and Roots them for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon impaling an enemy Hero, they are Blinded for 5 seconds and Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. This wave Silences and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor and while Avoidance is fully charged, they deal an additional 20% bonus damage.
20.longDescription: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor and while Avoidance is fully charged, they deal an additional 20% bonus damage.

20.name: Rockstopper
20.description: Activate to fully charge Avoidance and increase its Armor value to 60 for 4 seconds.   Losing Avoidance removes this bonus.
20.longDescription: Activate to fully charge Avoidance and increase its Armor value to 60 for 4 seconds.   Losing Avoidance removes this bonus.

abilities.name: Avoidance
abilities.description: While moving, Cassia gradually gains up to 30 Armor over 3 seconds. After remaining stationary for 0.75 seconds the Armor is rapidly lost over 0.5 seconds.Avoidance remains charged while Fending.Type: Defensive damage modifierAffects: SelfProperties: ArmorTickrate: 16 per secondDuration: 0.6875 secondsGrants one stack of Avoidance every 0.0625 seconds, increasing Cassia's Armor by 0.625. While stationary, Cassia loses 6 stacks every 0.0625 seconds.Does not stack with other positive Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

Otherwise, they have the same on-hit properties as the initial missile and interact with all talents affecting Lightning Fury.Primary target cannot be hit by the splitting secondary bolts.

abilities.name: Blinding Light

abilities.name: Fend

1.name: Exterminator
1.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 125% while Inspire is active.  Passive: Inspire does not expire on friendly Minions and Mercenaries.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 125% while Inspire is active.  Passive: Inspire does not expire on friendly Minions and Mercenaries.

1.name: Veteran Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.  Gambit: Gain 60% bonus Give 'Em Some Pepper damage. Every death reduces this bonus by 15%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.  Gambit: Gain 60% bonus Give 'Em Some Pepper damage. Every death reduces this bonus by 15%.

1.name: Ace in the Hole
1.description: Deal 10% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.  Enemy Heroes hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Deal 10% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.  Enemy Heroes hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Fight or Flight
4.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Sustaining Rounds
4.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.
4.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

4.name: Behemoth Armor
4.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 8 maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 8 maximum Health.

7.name: Heavy Slugs
7.description: Increase Penetrating Round's Slow by 15% and its duration by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Penetrating Round's Slow by 15% and its duration by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Fuel the Rush
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 45. While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 300%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 45. While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 300%.

7.name: Unstable Compound
7.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%. Each enemy Hero hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper grants Raynor 10 Mana and reduces the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%. Each enemy Hero hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper grants Raynor 10 Mana and reduces the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Raynor's Raider
10.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.name: Line 'Em Up
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. Penetrating Round hitting two or more enemy Heroes reduces its cooldown by an additional 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. Penetrating Round hitting two or more enemy Heroes reduces its cooldown by an additional 3 seconds.

13.name: Giddy-Up
13.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 10% more Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: Gain 10% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 10% more Movement Speed.

13.name: Give Me More!
13.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.
13.longDescription: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Paint Them Red
16.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage Penetrating Round deals to Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage Penetrating Round deals to Heroes.

16.name: Rallying Cry
16.description: Increase the Attack Speed bonus of Inspire by 20%.  Passive: After every 12 Basic Attacks, cast Inspire for free.
16.longDescription: Increase the Attack Speed bonus of Inspire by 20%.  Passive: After every 12 Basic Attacks, cast Inspire for free.

16.name: Bounty Hunter
16.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.
16.longDescription: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

20.name: Cavalry's Arrived
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. These Heroes are targeted by the Hyperion for 100% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. These Heroes are targeted by the Hyperion for 100% increased damage.

20.name: Dusk Wing
20.description: Increase the Health and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. Its Basic Attack lowers enemy Hero Armor by 2 for 1 second, stacking up to 25.
20.longDescription: Increase the Health and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. Its Basic Attack lowers enemy Hero Armor by 2 for 1 second, stacking up to 25.

20.name: Raiders Roll
20.description: Adrenaline Rush grants Unstoppable and continues healing for an additional 2 seconds. The additional duration ends upon reaching 70% Health.
20.longDescription: Adrenaline Rush grants Unstoppable and continues healing for an additional 2 seconds. The additional duration ends upon reaching 70% Health.

20.name: Sergeant Pepper
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper now activates every 3 Basic Attacks.
20.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper now activates every 3 Basic Attacks.

20.name: Execute Orders
20.description: Reduce Raynor's death timer by 35 seconds. Upon death, the Hyperion is cast towards the closest enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Reduce Raynor's death timer by 35 seconds. Upon death, the Hyperion is cast towards the closest enemy Hero.

1.name: Sentinel Wisp
1.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.
1.longDescription: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

1.name: Natural Perspective
1.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.
1.longDescription: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

1.name: Hippity Hop
1.description: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 2 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.
1.longDescription: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 2 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

4.name: Blossom Swell
4.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.  Blossom Swell applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin to enemies hit.
4.longDescription: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.  Blossom Swell applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin to enemies hit.

4.name: Siphoning Toxin
4.description: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.
4.longDescription: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

4.name: Nature's Culling
4.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

7.name: Splintered Spear
7.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.
7.longDescription: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.name: Choking Pollen
7.description: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 200% against enemies with 3 stacks.
7.longDescription: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 200% against enemies with 3 stacks.

7.name: Wild Vigor
7.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 70%.
7.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 70%.

10.name: Thornwood Vine
10.description: Send forth vines that deal 184 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.
10.longDescription: Send forth vines that deal 184 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Leaping Strike
10.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Endless Spores
13.description: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.

13.name: Let Them Wither
13.description: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.
13.longDescription: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

13.name: Greater Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Abolish Magic
13.description: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.
13.longDescription: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

16.name: Accelerated Contamination
16.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 1 enemy Hero is afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 75% faster.
16.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 1 enemy Hero is afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 75% faster.

16.name: Star Wood Spear
16.description: Increase Lunara's Basic Attack range by 0.5.  Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by an additional 2.25 for 6 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Lunara's Basic Attack range by 0.5.  Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by an additional 2.25 for 6 seconds.

16.name: Invigorating Spores
16.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Unfair Advantage
16.description: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.
16.longDescription: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

20.name: Forest's Wrath
20.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.
20.longDescription: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.
20.longDescription: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

20.name: Intensifying Toxin
20.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.
20.longDescription: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

20.name: Galloping Gait
20.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Dryad's Swiftness

1.name: Bonds of Justice
1.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
1.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds and each Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance reduces the cooldown of Umbral Bind by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds. Each Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance reduces the cooldown of Umbral Bind by 1 second.

1.name: Naisha's Memento
1.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.
1.longDescription: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

4.name: Pin Down
4.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

4.name: Blade Dance
4.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.
4.longDescription: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

4.name: Sudden Vengeance
4.description: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Elune's Wrath
7.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.
7.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.

7.name: Bonds of Corruption
7.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 and are Slowed by 20% for 4 seconds
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 and are Slowed by 20% for 4 seconds

7.name: Ruthless Spirit
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

10.name: Containment Disc
10.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.
10.longDescription: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

10.name: Warden's Cage
10.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bladed Armor
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

13.name: Chain Gang
13.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shadow Armor
13.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.
13.longDescription: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Vengeful Knives
16.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Fan of Knives that hits enemy Heroes to deal 1% maximum Health as bonus damage, up to 5%.
16.longDescription: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Fan of Knives that hits enemy Heroes to deal 1% maximum Health as bonus damage, up to 5%.

16.name: Cruel Chain
16.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.
16.longDescription: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

16.name: Armored Assault
16.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.
16.longDescription: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
20.description: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

abilities.name: Vault of the Wardens
abilities.description: Leap into the air, becoming immune to all hostile effects for 0.75 seconds.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Protected, Unstoppable, Untargetable by AoE, Untargetable by SkillshotsCast time: InstantMaiev is able to move normally, but cannot attack or use her Abilities during Vault of the Wardens.Unit targeted Abilities can target and hit Maiev during Vault of the Wardens.Basic Attacks can target Maiev, but will miss on impact due to the Evasion provided by Protected status.

abilities.name: Fan of Knives
abilities.description: Deal 152 damage to enemies in a crescent area. The one drawing the outer edge is centered on the target point and the inner one is offset toward Maiev.

abilities.name: Umbral Bind
abilities.description: Maiev's next Basic Attack cleaves and applies a tether to enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. If a tethered Hero moves too far from Maiev, they are pulled toward her, dealing 110 damage and breaking the tether.Type: Physical Damage (splash) / Spell Damage (pull), Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / Enemy HeroesTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack Modifier, Primed, Pull, Splash, StunCast time: InstantArea of Effect: RadialRadius: - Cleave: 4.25- Tether: 5.125Arc: 220 degrees (cleave)Pull duration: 0.25 secondsPull speed: 35Cleave damages all enemies, but only Heroes are tethered.Affected Heroes are always pulled a set distance upon the tether breaking, regardless of Maiev's position.Pulled Heroes are Stunned for 0.25 seconds after the pull ends.Cooldown starts once the Ability is triggered by attacking an enemy.Activating Umbral Bind immediately resets Maiev's Basic Attack cooldown.

abilities.name: Spirit of Vengeance
