abilities.name: Warden's Cage
abilities.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.Type: Crowd controlAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: No targetProperties: KnockbackCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 5.5Warden avatars have no collision.Affected Heroes are pushed until they are within 0.1 range of the cage's center.

1.name: Maximum Effort
1.description: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Fatal Wounds
1.description: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 30% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 150 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 30% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 150 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.

1.name: Finishing Touch
1.description: Gain 20% Basic Attack damage. When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 20% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Gain 20% Basic Attack damage. When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 20% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Upstage
4.description: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.

4.name: Ensnaring Swing
4.description: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 60% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 60% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Your Pain, My Gain
4.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

7.name: The Thirst
7.description: Carnage heals for 50% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes. Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 15% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.
7.longDescription: Carnage heals for 50% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes. Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 15% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.

7.name: Healmonger
7.description: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.
7.longDescription: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.

7.name: Siphoning Link
7.description: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt.

10.name: Unrelenting Strikes
10.description: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Final Strike
10.description: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

13.name: Chainsaw
13.description: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.
13.longDescription: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

13.name: Pulsing Pain
13.description: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 135 (+4% per level) damage.
13.longDescription: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 135 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: The Hunted
13.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

16.name: Booming Kick
16.description: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.
16.longDescription: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.

16.name: Lingering Ailment
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep or by Grappling Hook have their Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep or by Grappling Hook have their Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Swing Life Away
16.description: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 250% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds after the re-activation impact.
16.longDescription: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 250% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds after the re-activation impact.

20.name: Silent Killer
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Unrelenting Strikes Silences them for 0.5 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Unrelenting Strikes Silences them for 0.5 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

20.name: Unleashed Potential
20.description: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.

20.name: Utility Belt
20.description: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 2 seconds.

20.name: No Sanctuary
20.description: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.
20.longDescription: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook (Trait)
abilities.description: Qhira fires a Grappling Hook that pulls her to terrain it contacts. If an enemy Hero is hit, they take 35 damage and Qhira launches at them, kicking them for an additional 108 damage.Can be used while Revolving Sweep is active.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: SkillshotCast time: InstantRange: 11Hitbox: 1.0 x 1.15Missile speed: 25

abilities.name: Carnage
abilities.description: Unleash your sword in the target direction, continuously dealing 30 damage to enemies caught in its path.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Skillshot, Stationary channelCast time: 0.125 + CH + 0 secondsArea of Effect: RectangleWidth: 1.25Height: 8.5Channel time: 0.5625 secondsThe area grows to its maximum length in 4 ticks over 0.25 seconds, dealing damage every tick. After additional 0.3125 seconds the sword is pulled back dealing an additional tick of damage to all targets.

abilities.name: Blood Rage
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attack and Ability damage cause enemies to bleed for 44 damage over 4 seconds. Stacks 5 times.Active:  Qhira deals 32 damage and heals for 85 Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing are increased by 50% per each additional stack on that Hero.Type: Spell Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Damage over TimeCast time: InstantRange: GlobalTickrate: 1.0 per second (x4)Damage per tick: 11Active component is disabled if no enemies are affected by the passive.Subsequent applications of the DoT add to its damage and refresh its duration.Damage from either Blood Rage's active or passive do not add or refresh any stacks.Damage from both bleed and activation can affect non-Heroes, but do not trigger healing.If Qhira kills an enemy Hero who has a special death state (e.g. Leoric, Uther, Tyrael, Gall with Psychotic Break) with a Basic Attack or Ability except Blood Rage, they remain marked by Blood Rage during their special death state and hence Qhira can still heal with the active from the Ability and benefit from Talents accordingly, as if they were still alive.Damage and healing bonuses from the active component stack additively with itself and multiplicatively with other modifiers.

abilities.name: Revolving Sweep
abilities.description: Attach your sword to the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 96 damage and Stunning them for 0.25 seconds. Once attached, Qhira becomes Immune to all effects, rotating around the target for 2.75 seconds, and dealing 105 damage to any enemies between you and the target.Reactivate to send you to the target's location, knocking them away, dealing 108 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Evasion, Knockback, Skillshot, Stun, UntargetableCast time: 0.125 + 0.75 secondsRange: 8.0Radius: 6.0 (swing)Hitbox: - Initial: 1.0 x 1.15- Swing: 0.75 x 5.5Missile speed: 25 (initial)Knockback duration: 0.1875Knockback speed: 12Rotation is always clockwise and at set distance from the target.While Qhira is swinging, she is Unstoppable and untargetable, nullifies all incoming damage, Evades Basic Attacks and has no collision.Qhira is unable to attack, move or use her abilities other than Grappling Hook and Revolving Sweep's reactivation.Swing behaviour is instantly removed, dropping Qhira at her current location (as long as it's on pathable surface), if:- the target becomes Unstoppable or Invulnerable- the target or Qhira is put in Stasis or Time Stop- the target instantly moves farther than 10 units from Qhira's current location- the target is Falstad during Flight or Ragnaros during Molten Core- Qhira latches on to a Hero or terrain with Grappling Hook.If the ability has not been reactivated or interrupted, swinging stops after completing one full circle and Qhira is placed at range distance from the target.

abilities.name: Unrelenting Strikes
abilities.description: Deal 44 damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, StunCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: - Initial: 1.5 (1- Final: 3.5 (1Tickrate: 2.0 per second (x6)1) Extended by Qhira's unit radius.Qhira can activate Blood Rage, while channeling Unrelenting Strikes without interrupting it. Qhira cannot use any other abilities or attack during the channel.First 2 ticks strike at the initial radius, after which it grows in 0.5 increments.Final damage is dealt in a separate instance on the last tick in addition to the periodic damage.

abilities.name: Final Strike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 395 damage to all enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes below 50% Health.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), ClampingCast time: 1.0 (ch) + 0.5 secondsRange: 20Hitbox: 3.0 x 1.5Missile speed: 36Interrupting the ability during its cast puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Low health damage bonus stacks additively with other damage modifiers affecting Qhira's Spell Damage output.

1.name: Zealous Glare
1.description: Shield Glare gains 1 additional charge.
1.longDescription: Shield Glare gains 1 additional charge.

1.name: Divine Fortress
1.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 8 Physical Armor for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 40.  Gambit: Gain 20% bonus maximum Health. Every death reduces this bonus by 5%
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 8 Physical Armor for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 40.  Gambit: Gain 20% bonus maximum Health. Every death reduces this bonus by 5%

1.name: Laws of Hope
1.description: Activate to heal 20% of Johanna's max Health over 5 seconds.  Quest: Every 10 Regeneration Globes gathered increases this heal amount by 5% of Johanna's max Health.
1.longDescription: Activate to heal 20% of Johanna's max Health over 5 seconds.  Quest: Every 10 Regeneration Globes gathered increases this heal amount by 5% of Johanna's max Health.

4.name: Subdue
4.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80%.
4.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80%.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Mark enemies hit by Condemn for 10 seconds. Johanna's next Basic Attack against them removes the mark, lowering the cooldown of Condemn by 1 second, refunding 10 Mana, and killing Minions.
4.longDescription: Mark enemies hit by Condemn for 10 seconds. Johanna's next Basic Attack against them removes the mark, lowering the cooldown of Condemn by 1 second, refunding 10 Mana, and killing Minions.

4.name: Hold Your Ground
4.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 40% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 40% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

7.name: Sins Exposed
7.description: Punish reduces healing received by 35% for 2 seconds. Basic Attacks against them refresh this duration.
7.longDescription: Punish reduces healing received by 35% for 2 seconds. Basic Attacks against them refresh this duration.

7.name: Conviction
7.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed, increased to 20% while Condemn is charging up.
7.longDescription: Gain 10% Movement Speed, increased to 20% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: Steed Charge
7.description: Activate to instantly Mount for 3 seconds, unhindered by damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Activate to instantly Mount for 3 seconds, unhindered by damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 1 second.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.
10.longDescription: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 (+4% per level) damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Roar
13.description: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.
13.longDescription: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

13.name: Holy Fury
13.description: Deal 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Deal 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Hammer
13.description: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 74 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Damaging enemies with Basic Abilities reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 3 seconds.  Passive: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes releases a hammer.
13.longDescription: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 74 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Damaging enemies with Basic Abilities reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 3 seconds.  Passive: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes releases a hammer.

16.name: Shrinking Vacuum
16.description: Condemn reduces enemy Heroes damage by 25% and Slows by 25% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Condemn reduces enemy Heroes damage by 25% and Slows by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Shield Glare reduce its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and heals for 5% of Johanna's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Shield Glare reduce its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and heals for 5% of Johanna's maximum Health.

16.name: Blessed Momentum
16.description: Basic Attacks grant 10% increased Attack Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 40%. They also reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks grant 10% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (up to 40%) and lower the cooldown of all Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: Falling Sword rains down holy bolts, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, healing allied Heroes for 75 (+4% per level), and reducing its cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Falling Sword rains down holy bolts, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, healing allied Heroes for 75 (+4% per level), and reducing its cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 1.75 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.
20.longDescription: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 1.75 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Blinded By The Light
20.description: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 810 damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.Type: Shield, Status effectScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: UnstoppableCast time: InstantIf the Shield breaks, Johanna loses Unstoppable and any other benefits that come with it.

abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Step forward dealing 113 damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SlowCast time: 0 + 0.125 secondsArea of Effect: RadialRadius: 3.5Arc: 160 degreesUsing Punish causes Johanna to minidash into the target direction. Roots prevent the dash behavior, but do not disable the Ability altogether.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, Stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Pull, StunCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 5.0Pull duration: 0.1875 secondsPull speed: 19Enemies hit by Condemn are in order first pulled, then damaged, and once the pull ends Stunned.Damage bonus to Minions and Mercenaries stacks additively with offensive damage modifiers that can affect Condemn's damage.

abilities.name: Shield Glare
abilities.description: Deal 59 damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Blind, ClampingCast time: 0.125 + 0.125 secondsArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 12Arc: 35 degreesMissile speed: - Initial: 50- Final: 40- Acceleration: -10

abilities.name: Falling Sword
abilities.description: Johanna leaps into the air for 2 seconds and she can steer the landing location by moving. While in the air, allies below Johanna are Unstoppable. Upon landing enemies hit take 225 damage and are Stunned for 0.25 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Teleport, Status effect / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / Self / Allied HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Stasis, Stun, UnstoppableCast time: 0.5 + 0.625 secondsRange: 10Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 4.0The cast is uninterruptible.The initial teleport can be used to cross over terrain or Structures, but the Ability cannot be targeted on top of them or steered into them, except for allied and enemy Gates.Immediately upon activating the Ability and while in the air, Johanna is put in Stasis, making her immune to damage and removing most debuffs.While targeting the landing area, Johanna moves at regular Movement Speed subject to allied and her own Movement Speed buffs applied beforehand.While in the air, Johanna gains vision over the target area.The range indicator for the Ability's initial cast shown in game is incorrect.

abilities.name: Blessed Shield
abilities.description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Bounce, Clamping, SkillshotCast time: 0.1 + 0 secondsRange: 11.0Hitbox: 2.0 x 1.75Missile speed: - Initial: 25- Bounce: 30Bounce search radius: 5.5Bounces prioritize Heroes and then the closest enemy to Johanna.Each bounce originates from the previous target.Enemies that are immune to skillshots cannot be hit by the initial projectile, but can be targeted by bounces as long as they are not also immune to AoE. However, Invulnerable enemies can be hit by the initial projectile and its bounces, they just cannot be damaged or Stunned by any of them (and it can then subsequently bounce off of them as normal also).

1.name: Eye of the Tiger
1.description: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 150%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 2 seconds, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.
1.longDescription: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 150%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 2 seconds, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
1.description: Chen heals for 3.5% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.
1.longDescription: Chen heals for 3.5% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 125% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.
4.longDescription: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 125% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Accumulating Flame
4.description: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Withering Flames
4.description: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 60% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 60% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Gift of the Ox
7.description: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1.5 seconds, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 50% of damage taken.
7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1.5 seconds, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 50% of damage taken.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.
7.longDescription: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Elusive Brawler
7.description: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 40% for 1 second, or by 80% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.
13.longDescription: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 40% for 1 second, or by 80% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Ring of Fire
13.description: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

13.name: Enough to Share
13.description: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).
13.longDescription: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

16.name: Flying Leap
16.description: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.
16.longDescription: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

16.name: Celerity
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 2 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 2 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

16.name: Combo Strikes
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.
20.longDescription: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.
20.longDescription: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

20.name: Purifying Brew
20.description: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Energizing Brew
20.description: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.

Enemies soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 171 additional damage over 3 seconds and adding 1.5 seconds to the duration of the Slow from Keg Smash.After being used or after 6 seconds, this Ability becomes Keg Smash.Keg SmashDamage and Slow enemies.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Damage over Time (Ignited)Cast time: 0.1 + 0.25 secondsArea of Effect: RadialRadius: 7.0Arc: 60 degreesTickrate: 1.0 per second (x3)Damage per tick: 55Igniting enemies also extends the duration of Brew-soaked debuff by 1.5 seconds.The cooldown does not start counting until Breath of Fire has been used or it has expired.

abilities.name: Stagger
abilities.description: Damage taken over the next 3 seconds is prevented. Once this effect ends, Chen receives 75% of the damage taken over 5 seconds. This damage cannot be modified.Type: Status effect / Percent damageScaling: -Affects: Self / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Damage over Time, ProtectedCast time: InstantTickrate: 1.0 per second (x5)Damage over time can still be prevented, absorbed or dispelled through specific Abilities and effects.Chen can die from self-damage, which grants the enemy team the normal amount of XP and takedown credit.Damage taken during Stagger's protective period is calculated and stored after all reductions, causing its damage reduction to stack multiplicatively with other defensive damage modifiers, like Armor, that were active at the same time.

abilities.name: Wandering Keg
abilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Defensive damage modifier, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Non-Structure enemies / SelfProperties: Area of Effect,Knockback, Mobile channel, UnstoppableCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 1.0Knockback duration: 0.32 secondsKnockback speed: 23Chen can not attack, use his Abilities or stop during Wandering Keg.Colliding with an enemy momentarily Slows Chen's Movement Speed by 7%, stacking up to 42%.

abilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
abilities.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability. The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.Earth can leap to an area and Slow Enemies.Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.Type: Summon, Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), StasisCast time: 1.0 (ch) + 1.0625 secondsInterrupting the Ability during its cast time puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Each spirit ability can be used only once per cast and requires the corresponding spirit to be alive.Chen is put in Stasis while Storm, Earth, Fire is active, removing most debuffs from Chen.Spirits cannot Mount, Hearth, collect Regeneration Globes and power-ups, use Healing Fountain or channel Objectives.At the end of the duration Chen reappears at one of the alive spirit's locations in the order: Storm -> Earth -> Fire.StormType: Heroic PetScaling: 4.00% (damage & Health)Targeting: Player controlledHealth: 1731Basic Attack damage: 59Attack speed: 1.25Attack range: 6.5Movement Speed: 4.4Unit radius: 0.625EarthType: Heroic PetScaling: 4.00% (damage & Health)Targeting: Player controlledProperties: Splash, SlowHealth: 1731Basic Attack damage: 37Attack speed: 0.67Attack range: 1.0Movement Speed: 4.4Unit radius: 0.8125Earth's Basic Attacks splash in 3.5 radius, dealing Spell Damage and Slowing enemies within 3.5 radius of the primary target by 25% for 1.75 seconds.FireType: Heroic PetScaling: 4.00% (damage & Health)Targeting: Player controlledHealth: 1731Basic Attack damage: 17Attack speed: 1.67Attack range: 1.0Movement Speed: 4.4Unit radius: 0.625

abilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire - Earth

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds and reduce the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds and reduce the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

1.name: Reinforced Carapace
1.description: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 40%.
1.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 40%.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.
1.longDescription: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

4.name: Needlespine
4.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.
4.longDescription: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Increase the duration of Toxic Nests by 45 seconds, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.
4.longDescription: Increase the duration of Toxic Nests by 45 seconds, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.
7.longDescription: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.
7.longDescription: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.
10.longDescription: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
10.longDescription: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.
13.longDescription: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 100% of the damage dealt.
16.longDescription: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 100% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.
16.longDescription: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 35% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 35% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.
20.longDescription: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

abilities.name: Locust Strain
abilities.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 16 seconds, have 350 health and deal 46 damage with each Basic Attack. Locusts deal 25% bonus damage to enemy Structures.Type: SummonLocustType: ActiveScaling: 4.00% (damage & Health)Targeting: AutomaticHealth: 316Basic Attack damage: 46Attack speed: 1.00Attack range: 1.5Movement Speed: 3.25Damage bonus to Structures stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Locusts' Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.Type: Invulnerable summonAffects: AlliesTargeting: Unit targetCast time: 0.5 + 1.0 secondsRange: GlobalAllied and enemy Symbiote hosts display a crown icon above their portraits on the Minimap.Symbiote will be paused if the allied target enters a Stasis effect. Symbiote can still be canceled in these situations, but no Symbiote Abilities can be used.

abilities.name: Ultimate Evolution
abilities.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.Type: SummonAffects: Allied HeroesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), StasisCast time: 1 + 0.0625 secondsRange: GlobalInterrupting the Ability puts it on a 10 second cooldown.The target of Ultimate Evolution must be a real Hero; other Heroic Targets, like Heroic Pets and Vehicles, cannot be cloned.Upon successfully casting Ultimate Evolution, Abathur is removed from the map and put in Stasis for its duration, removing negative status effects and making him immune to damage.Abathur returns to the same location where he cast Ultimate Evolution once it ends. This location is visible to all players as a small puddle while Ultimate Evolution is active.Ultimate Evolution CloneType: HallucinationScaling: -Targeting: Direct controlHealth: 100%Damage: 120%Attack speed: 100%Attack range: 100%Movement Speed: 110%Sight radius: 100%Ultimate Evolution Clone is untalented and does not inherit any progress on baseline quests.It is possible to complete baseline quests on the Clone, but any progress and rewards are reset for the next cast.Clone does not gain Ability effects that are unlocked by reaching a certain level, such as Muradin's Storm Bolt pierce.Clone can Mount, use the Healing Fountain and can benefit from, but not directly collect, Regeneration Globes.The Clone can fake channeling Objectives, but it cannot complete the channel to capture the Objective.The Clone's Summons, including Junkrat's traps and Probius's Warp Rifts, do not expire along with the Clone as it has expired or been destroyed. However, Misha and Samuro's Images exceptionally do expire.There are some limitations and exceptions to cloning certain Heroes:- Deathwing cannot be cloned due to his Trait.- Cloning Cho'gall only grants access to Cho's Abilities.- Cloning a Viking only clones the specific Viking targeted, but it gains access to all Basic Abilities the Vikings have unlocked through Talents in that game.- D.Va's clone can only use the form she was cloned from. Pilot D.Va's Call Mech is disabled, and activating Self-Destruct in Mech mode immediately returns control to Abathur, leaving the exploding Mech on the Battleground. Additionally, if Ultimate Evolution expires during this time, the Mech will instantly explode as it does.- Kharazim's level 1 Talent is inherited, as it is his Trait.- Murky's Trait, Spawn Egg, is disabled.- Alexstrasza's and Ragnaros's Traits start on full cooldown every time they are copied, making it impossible to use Molten Core and Dragonqueen during the clone's lifetime.- The effects of Jaina's Frostbite, Malthael's Reaper's Mark, Murky's Slime, Stukov's Healing Pathogen and Weighted Pustule, Sylvanas's Banshee's Curse, Tassadar's Psionic Storm, and Zagara's Creep Tumor do not stack and are instead shared, benefitting both the clone and the cloned Hero regardless of who applied the effect.- Qhira's Blood Rage can stack up to 10 times if a Clone of her is active - if both have at least one Bleed stack on the same target, then they both get a number of stacks equal to double the sum of their real stacks placed on the target (capped at 10). However, only the unit who placed the first Bleed stack on the unit may activate Blood Rage on it. Additionally, after the Clone expires, the Bleed stacks do not, and both Qhira and Abathur may maintain and extend each other's Bleed stacks while at least one of them has a Bleed stack on the target.- Stukov's or his Clone's Bio-Kill Switch detonates all Viruses placed by either. However, only the units that have received a Virus from that specific Stukov can be affected by their Bio-Kill Switch.- Both Probius and his Ultimate Evolution Clone can fully interact with each other's Pylons and Warp Rifts.The Clone grants no XP or Takedown credit on death.The Clone's Summons do not benefit from this Ability's Spell Power bonus.Attack Damage and Spell Power bonuses stack additively with offensive damage modifiers and healing dealt modifiers.

abilities.name: Evolve Monstrosity
abilities.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.Type: SummonAffects: Allied Minions & LocustsTargeting: Unit targetCast time: InstantRange: GlobalAlso gains 0.02 base damage per stack (in addition to the 2% increase mentioned in the tooltip).Cooldown starts when the Monstrosity is destroyed.MonstrosityType: ActiveScaling: 4.00% (damage & Health)Targeting: Automatic, Direct controlHealth: 1350Basic Attack damage: 85Attack Speed: 1.0Attack Range: 2.0Movement Speed: 4.0Sight radius: 9.0Monstrosity can use Deep Tunnel on an 80 second cooldown. This cooldown is separate from Abathur's.Monstrosity can heal in the Hall of Storms.Damage bonus from Minion kills stacks additively with itself and multiplicatively with offensive damage modifiers that can affect Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage.Monstrosity cannot be commanded using the "Force Move" hotkey.

abilities.name: Deep Tunnel

abilities.name: High Five
abilities.description: Cooldown: 20 seconds per allyQuickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is healed for 230, Lúcio is healed for 80 and both gain Unstoppable for 1 second.Type: Healing, Status effect / Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: Allied Heroes, Self / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: UnstoppableCast time: InstantRange: 6.5Missile speed: 15Lúcio himself has no limit to how often he can be affected by the effects of this Ability.The Ability is interrupted if Lúcio cannot reach the target within 1.5 seconds or if the target moves farther than 12 units from Lúcio.Ally cooldown starts immediately when the Ability is used. abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: While moving alongside terrain, Lúcio begins to Wall Ride for 2 seconds. While Wall Ride is active, Lúcio can walk through units and gains 20% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.To (re)apply Wall Ride Lúcio must have proper contact with a wall:- Lúcio must be within 1.4 distance of proper terrain.- Lúcio's Movement Speed must be above 2.5. (This equates to being above ~52% of his base Movement Speed.)- Lúcio may not be Stunned, Dazed or Polymorphed.Once applied, Wall Ride and associated bonuses last for the given duration, even if Lúcio loses contact with a wall.

abilities.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.❢ Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.Type: Percent damageScaling: -Affects: Non-Vehicle Enemy HeroesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Percent damageCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 5.0Mathematically, kills a target which is at less than or equal to 1/3 of maximum Health.Damage is based on missing Health when the Mark expires after 2 seconds.The Mark cannot be removed, but the damage can be avoided with effects that grant damage immunity, like entering the Hall of Storms, or entering Stasis or Invulnerability, at the time of its expiration.While Last Rites is available, enemy Heroes within 12 radius of Malthael are indicated by a red skull above them if the damage from Last Rites would be enough to kill them.

1.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

1.name: Unfurling Shadows
1.description: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

1.name: Overwhelming Affliction
1.description: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.
1.longDescription: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

4.name: Unstable Poison
4.description: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.
4.longDescription: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

4.name: Mercenary Queen
4.description: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.
4.longDescription: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

4.name: Possession
4.description: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.
4.longDescription: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

7.name: Barbed Shot
7.description: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.
7.longDescription: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

7.name: Lost Soul
7.description: Increase Shadow Dagger's damage by 10%.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Shadow Dagger's damage by 10%.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

7.name: Festering Wounds
7.description: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 15%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.
7.longDescription: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 15%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.
10.longDescription: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

10.name: Mind Control
10.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, have 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse applied to them, and are forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, have 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse applied to them, and are forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Cold Embrace
13.description: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Windrunner
13.description: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.
13.longDescription: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

13.name: Remorseless
13.description: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.
13.longDescription: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

16.name: Evasive Fire
16.description: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

16.name: Life Drain
16.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.
16.longDescription: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

16.name: Will of the Forsaken
16.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.
20.longDescription: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds.

20.name: Withering Barrage
20.description: Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse, and Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse, and Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Black Arrows
abilities.description: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.Type: Crowd controlAffects: Enemy Minions, Non-Elite Mercenaries & StructuresProperties: Attack Modifier, StunCast time: InstantBanshee's CurseBasic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.Type: Offensive damage modifierAffects: SelfProperties: Attack ModifierEffects of Black Arrows and Banshee's Curse are applied before the damage is dealt.Damage bonus stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Sylvanas's damage.

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closest enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 damage, prioritizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Automatic (closest)Cast time: InstantRadius: 8.0Missile speed: 45Tickrate: 2.67 per secondCan only be activated if an enemy is within the radius. The Ability can not be activated again until all shots are used.If no enemy is in radius (while the Ability is active), a shot is consumed and the Ability continues until the end of its duration.Prioritizes the closest enemy in target groups of Heroes and non-Heroes.Other Structures are prioritized over Gates and Walls.Can sometimes lose track of their target and spiral around not hitting anything, if their intended target is moved quickly enough (e.g. by Diablo's Shadow Charge, even though that Ability does not disjoint its target).

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Throw a dagger at a target enemy that deals 30 damage and an additional 150 damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Damage over TimeCast time: 0.1875 + 0 secondsRange: 8.0Radius: 3.5 (1Missile speed: 25Tickrate: 2.0 per second (x5, excl. initial)Damage per tick: 301) Spread radius is extended by the main target's unit radius.Cast is interrupted if the target moves at least 4 units past its range during its windup.Initial target is displayed by a unique icon overhead.Cannot spread to Stealthed enemy units, Walls or enemy units that are already affected by it.The initial damage instance is not classified as DoT and is dealt to secondary targets as well when Shadow Dagger spreads to them.

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees, dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, UnstoppableCast time: 0.1 + 0 secondsRange: 14Area of Effect: RadialRadius: - Initial: 1.0 (1- Maximum: 13.96Arc: 24 degreesMissile speed: - Wave: 9.0- Launch: 50Tickrate: 2.0 per second1)Search area expands to its maximum radius over 1.5 seconds in increments of 0.54.After the cast, the Ability can be reactivated for 1.75 seconds to launch to the wave's location.Sylvanas gains Unstoppable while she is traveling to the wave's location.

abilities.name: Wailing Arrow
abilities.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, have 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse applied to them and are forced to walk toward Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.Type: Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Skillshot, Mind Control, SlowCast time: 0.25 + 0 secondsRange: 13.0Hitbox: 2.0 x 1.0Missile speed: 12Mind Control is treated as a Silence effect. 1.name: Patchwork Creation
1.description: Gain 3 Armor for every unit afflicted with Vile Gas, stacking up to 8 times. While Shambling Horror is active, this Armor amount is doubled.  Passive: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%.
1.longDescription: Gain 3 Armor for every unit afflicted with Vile Gas, stacking up to 8 times. While Shambling Horror is active, this Armor amount is doubled.  Passive: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%.

1.name: Savor the Flavor
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour increases Stitches' Health Regeneration by 1.5 and the damage of Vile Gas by 2%, stacking up to 100 times.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour increases Stitches' Health Regeneration by 1.5 and the damage of Vile Gas by 2%, stacking up to 100 times.

1.name: Hungry for More
1.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed.  Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 25.  Reward: Every 20 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches' Movement Speed by an additional 5%.
1.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed.  Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 25.  Reward: Every 20 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches' Movement Speed by an additional 5%.

4.name: Playtime!
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Slam by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana. Hitting Heroes with the inner area of Slam reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Slam by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana. Hitting Heroes with the inner area of Slam reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Vile Cleaver
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemies with Vile Gas deal 35% more damage and spreads Vile Gas to nearby enemies.  Passive: Slam applies Vile Gas to all targets hit.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemies with Vile Gas deal 35% more damage and spreads Vile Gas to nearby enemies.  Passive: Slam applies Vile Gas to all targets hit.

4.name: Tenderizer
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes Slow by 20% for 1.5 seconds and restore 1.75% of Stitches' maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes Slow by 20% for 1.5 seconds and restore 1.75% of Stitches' maximum Health.

7.name: Serrated Edge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, reduces Hook's cooldown by 4 seconds, and restores 35 Mana.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, reduces Hook's cooldown by 4 seconds, and restores 35 Mana.

7.name: Second Helping
7.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge with a 6 second cooldown between uses.  Gambit: If Stitches is at max Health after using Devour, he gains a Shield equal to 15% of his maximum Health for 10 seconds. Every death, reduce this Shield by 3%.
7.longDescription: Devour gains 1 additional charge with a 6 second cooldown between uses.  Gambit: If Stitches is at max Health after using Devour, he gains a Shield equal to 15% of his maximum Health for 10 seconds. Every death, reduce this Shield by 3%.

7.name: Putrefaction
7.description: While Shambling Horror is active, Vile Gas reduces healing received by 40%.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 75% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: While Shambling Horror is active, Vile Gas reduces healing received by 40%.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 75% of the damage dealt.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.
10.longDescription: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

13.name: Meat Hook
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. While active, Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refresh the duration of this effect.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. While active, Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refresh the duration of this effect.

13.name: Under Pressure
13.description: Increase Slam's damage by 25.  Quest: After damaging Heroes with Vile Gas 6 times, permanently increase the damage of Slam by 1, to a maximum of 75 additional damage.
13.longDescription: Increase Slam's damage by 25.  Quest: After damaging Heroes with Vile Gas 6 times, permanently increase the damage of Slam by 1, to a maximum of 75 additional damage.

13.name: Chop Chop
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook or activating Shambling Horror grants 40% increased Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration of this effect.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook or activating Shambling Horror grants 40% increased Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration of this effect.

16.name: Pulverize
16.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 70% for 0.75 seconds and Heroes have their Armor reduced by 10 for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 70% for 0.75 seconds and Heroes have their Armor reduced by 10 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Digestive Juices
16.description: Devour deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. When used on a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Devour deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. When used on a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 4 seconds.

16.name: Flare Up
16.description: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook or activating Shambling Horror increases this damage by 150% for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook or activating Shambling Horror increases this damage by 150% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Gift From The Embalmer
20.description: Putrid Bile deals 100% more damage to Heroes.  Quest: Each time Putrid Bile damages an enemy Hero, the duration of Stitches' next death timer is reduced by 2%, to a maximum of 80% total reduction. All stacks of this effect are lost upon death.
20.longDescription: Putrid Bile deals 100% more damage to Heroes.  Quest: Each time Putrid Bile damages an enemy Hero, the duration of Stitches' next death timer is reduced by 2%, to a maximum of 80% total reduction. All stacks of this effect are lost upon death.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them. Enemies are Slowed by 75% for 1 second after Gorge ends.
20.longDescription: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them. Enemies are Slowed by 75% for 1 second after Gorge ends.

20.name: Master Hooker
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Hook by 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Hook have 75% reduced healing for 2 seconds. Allies hit by Helping Hand are Unkillable for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Hook by 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Hook have 75% reduced healing for 2 seconds. Allies hit by Helping Hand are Unkillable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Gas Bag
20.description: Activating Shambling Horror grants Unstoppable for 3 seconds.  Passive: Shambling Horror's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activating Shambling Horror grants Unstoppable for 3 seconds.  Passive: Shambling Horror's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Shambling Horror

This does not affect the state or strength of Slows and Movement Speed buffs on Stitches.Shambling Horror becomes momentarily inactive if Stitches Mounts or is put in Stasis. This will not disable associated effects from Talents, but prevents applying Shambling Horror's baseline effects.Vile GasHitting enemies with Basic Attacks or the inner area of Slam afflicts them with Vile Gas, dealing an additional 36 damage over 4 seconds. Reapplying refreshes the duration.Damage bonus to Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters stacks additively with offensive damage modifiers that can affect Vile Gas's damage.

abilities.name: Helping Hand
abilities.description: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes.
