1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 20%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.
1.longDescription: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 20%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.
1.longDescription: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Increase the range of Death Coil by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and if Death Coil is used on an enemy Hero, its Mana cost is refunded.
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Death Coil by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and if Death Coil is used on an enemy Hero, its Mana cost is refunded.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.
4.longDescription: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.
7.longDescription: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 5% of his max Health.
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 5% of his max Health.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds and atttack for 20 (+4% per level) damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds and atttack for 20 (+4% per level) damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.
13.longDescription: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.
16.longDescription: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.
16.longDescription: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls deal 50% more damage, heal for an additional 50%, and last 5 seconds longer.
20.longDescription: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls deal 50% more damage, heal for an additional 50%, and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2.5 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2.5 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Increases Movement Speed by 10%. Frozen Tempest's maximum Movement Speed Slow and Attack Speed Slow increased from 40% to 60%
20.longDescription: Increases Movement Speed by 10%. Frozen Tempest's maximum Movement Speed Slow and Attack Speed Slow increased from 40% to 60%

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 4 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
20.longDescription: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 4 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.
4.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.
4.longDescription: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
7.longDescription: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

7.name: Chilling Touch
7.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 80%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 80%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Ice Cold
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.

10.name: Frost Blast
10.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 20%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 20%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.
13.longDescription: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
13.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.
16.longDescription: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.
20.longDescription: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.
20.longDescription: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.
20.longDescription: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return
20.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

1.name: Scroll of Identify
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing permanently increases its damage by 2.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing reveals and reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, this talent's Armor reduction effect is increased to 15 and its duration to 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing permanently increases its damage by 2.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing reveals and reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, this talent's Armor reduction effect is increased to 15 and its duration to 6 seconds.

1.name: Field Study
1.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.
1.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

1.name: Sapphire
1.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and its slow by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and its slow by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

4.name: Potion of Shielding
4.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 140 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.
4.longDescription: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 140 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
4.description: Healing Potions restore 15 Mana and heal for an additional 114 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Potions restore 15 Mana and heal for an additional 114 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.

4.name: Ruby
4.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100%  and it spawns 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
4.longDescription: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100%  and it spawns 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

7.name: Cube Mastery
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.

7.name: Kanai's Cube
7.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Emerald
7.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and have it reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
7.longDescription: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and have it reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
10.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.name: Lorenado
10.description: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it. Deals 20 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes hit.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it. Deals 20 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes hit.

13.name: Super Healing Potion
13.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 100% more.  Passive: Healing Potion heals for 25% more when the target is under 50% health.
13.longDescription: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 100% more.  Passive: Healing Potion heals for 25% more when the target is under 50% health.

13.name: Potion of Revival
13.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 75% of the healing amount.
13.longDescription: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 75% of the healing amount.

13.name: Ancient Blessings
13.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.
13.longDescription: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
16.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.
16.longDescription: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.name: Safety in Numbers
16.description: If at least 2 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.
16.longDescription: If at least 2 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.name: Horadric Staff
16.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Respect the Elderly
20.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.
20.longDescription: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.name: Morenados!
20.description: Lorenado gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lorenado gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Bottomless Flask
20.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.
20.longDescription: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

20.name: Perfect Gems
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems to 5 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems to 5 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.

1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.  Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.  Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.

4.name: Unwavering Faith
4.description: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by 1.1. Whitemane gains 20% increased Basic Attack damage for each active Zeal buff.
4.longDescription: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by 1.1. Whitemane gains 20% increased Basic Attack damage for each active Zeal buff.

4.name: Martyrdom
4.description: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by 30%. Increase this by an additional 10% for each active Zeal.
4.longDescription: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by 30%. Increase this by an additional 10% for each active Zeal.

4.name: Indulgence
4.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional 5% for each active Zeal.
4.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional 5% for each active Zeal.

7.name: Zealous Spirit
7.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.
7.longDescription: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

7.name: Saintly Greatstaff
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 55 (+4% per level) Spell damage and remove the mark.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 55 (+4% per level) Spell damage and remove the mark.

7.name: Intercession
7.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.
7.longDescription: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

10.name: Scarlet Aegis
10.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 300 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 300 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

10.name: Divine Reckoning
10.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

13.name: Subjugation
13.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 50%.
13.longDescription: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 50%.

13.name: Lashing Out
13.description: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to 1 second.
13.longDescription: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to 1 second.

13.name: Scarlet Wrath
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of all active Zeals by 0.75 seconds and lower the cooldown of Zeals activation by 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of all active Zeals by 0.75 seconds and lower the cooldown of Zeals activation by 4 seconds.

16.name: Radiance
16.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level). Activating Zeal while at 3 stacks of Desperation now increases Armor by 15 instead of reducing it.
16.longDescription: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level). Activating Zeal while at 3 stacks of Desperation now increases Armor by 15 instead of reducing it.

16.name: Shared Punishment
16.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds. Affected enemies lose 10 Armor.
16.longDescription: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds. Affected enemies lose 10 Armor.

16.name: Harsh Discipline
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Scarlet Crusade
20.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Judgment Day
20.description: Divine Reckoning deals 50% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.
20.longDescription: Divine Reckoning deals 50% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

20.name: Guiding Light
20.description: Activate to cast a permanent Zeal on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant Desperation. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.
20.longDescription: Activate to cast a permanent Zeal on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant Desperation. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.

20.name: Purge the Wicked
20.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Zeal
abilities.description: Whitemane's healing Abilities apply Zeal for 8 seconds. Allies with Zeal are healed for 100% of the damage Whitemane deals to Heroes.Activate to gain 25% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds. Can be cast while channeling abilities.Type: Defensive damage modifier (active), Offensive damage modifier (active), Healing dealt modifier (active) / Healing (passive)Scaling: -Affects: Self / Allied Heroes, SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Armor reduction (active), Spell Power (active)Cast time: InstantHealing from Zeal follows Lifesteal rules. Healing is calculated directly from final damage dealt and is unaffected by Spell Power's healing modifying properties.Spell Power stacks additively with itself and other offensive damage and healing modifiers affecting Whitemane's Spell Damage or healing output.Does not stack with other negative Armor effects. Other defensive damage modifiers may stack.

abilities.name: Desperate Plea
abilities.description: Heal an allied Hero for 140 and gain Desperation for 4 seconds.Desperation increases Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 45, and stacks up to 3 times.Current Mana Cost: 45Type: HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Self, Allied HeroesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Self-castableCast time: InstantRange: 8.0

abilities.name: Searing Lash

abilities.name: Clemency
abilities.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 329 over 3 seconds while Channeling.Shares a cooldown with Inquisition. Removes a stack of Desperation.Type: HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Allied HeroesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Stationary channelCast time: 0 + CH + 0 secondsRange: - Cast: 7.5- Active: 13Tickrate: 2.0 per second (x7)Healing per tick: 47Clemency can be canceled after 0.5 seconds by reactivating it to end its effect early.Applies Zeal on every tick.The channel is interrupted if the target moves outside the active range.Cooldown begins at the start of channel.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 10% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 10% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.
1.longDescription: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 10 Souls and 20 Armor for 3 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.
4.longDescription: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 10 Souls and 20 Armor for 3 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.
4.longDescription: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.75% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3.5% of his maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.75% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3.5% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Fire Stomp by 1 second. When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and restore 45 Mana.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Fire Stomp by 1 second. When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and restore 45 Mana.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of Shadow Charge and Overpower by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of Shadow Charge and Overpower by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 3% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 3% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.
13.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.
16.longDescription: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 6% for 4 seconds, up to 60%. Heroes Slowed by 24% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 6% for 4 seconds, up to 60%. Heroes Slowed by 24% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.
16.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.
20.longDescription: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.
20.longDescription: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone
abilities.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.3% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.Type: Bonus HealthScaling: -Affects: SelfAlexstrasza's Blessing of the Red also stacks with Black Soulstone.

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 130 damage.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Knockback, Movement Speed, StunCast time: InstantRange: 7.0Missile speed: - Initial: 0- Final: 300- Acceleration: 175Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsKnockback speed: 27Diablo is able to see collision edges of terrain in 18 radius.Target enemy is considered hit when Diablo is within 3 range of them.If the target is not within 30 degrees of the direction Diablo is traveling upon impact, the Ability is interrupted, and if Diablo hasn't moved more than 2 units from the cast location, its cooldown and Mana cost are refunded.

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 damage each. Once they reach maximum range, they return, dealing an additional 36 damage. abilities.name: Overpower

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
1.longDescription: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

1.name: Advanced Artillery
1.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.
1.longDescription: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

1.name: Maelstrom Rounds
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 30% for 5 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes or Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 30% for 5 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes or Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Barricade
4.description: Reduce Concussive Blast's cooldown by 4 seconds, its Mana cost by 40, and when cast create an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce Concussive Blast's cooldown by 4 seconds, its Mana cost by 40, and when cast create an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

4.name: Siege Tactics
4.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.
4.longDescription: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.

4.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
4.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Pulse Detonation Core
7.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Spider Mines by 1.5 seconds.  Increase this bonus to 2.5 seconds while in Siege Mode.
7.longDescription: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Spider Mines by 1.5 seconds.  Increase this bonus to 2.5 seconds while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Hover Siege Mode
7.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.
7.longDescription: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Graduating Range
7.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 2 seconds, up to 3.
7.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 2 seconds, up to 3.

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

10.name: Napalm Strike
10.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
13.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.
13.longDescription: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

13.name: Entrenched
13.description: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.
13.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

13.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
13.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

16.name: Mechanical Know-how
16.description: Neosteel Plating grants 20% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds and increases Basic Attack damage by 30% for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Neosteel Plating grants 20% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds and increases Basic Attack damage by 30% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Giant Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.
20.longDescription: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
20.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.
20.longDescription: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.name: Shrapnel Mines
20.description: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10, up to 30, for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10, up to 30, for 4 seconds.

20.name: Ultra Capacitors
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.
20.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

abilities.name: Siege Mode
abilities.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.Type: Physical Damage / Offensive damage modifierAffects: Enemeis / SelfTargeting: No target (toggle)Properties: Attack Modifier, SplashCast time: 0 + 1.0 secondsBonus attack range: 5.5Splash radius: 2.0Sgt. Hammer cannot use her Abilities while switching into or out of Siege Mode.During Siege Mode, the casts of all Abilities are clamped at max range.Siege Mode can be deactivated, while Silenced by Stukov's Lurking Arm.Damage bonus from Siege Mode stacks additively with other offensive damage modifiers that can affect Sgt. Hammer's Basic Attack damage.Splash damage penalty stacks multiplicatively with other offensive damage modifiers, including Siege Mode damage bonus, that can affect Sgt. Hammer's Basic Attack damage.

abilities.name: Siege Thrusters
abilities.description: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.There is no cast time when using Siege Thrusters to leave Siege Mode.

1.name: Deep Roots
1.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 40% longer.  Repeatable Quest: Every time an enemy Hero becomes Rooted, gain 10 Mana permanently.
1.longDescription: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 40% longer.  Repeatable Quest: Every time an enemy Hero becomes Rooted, gain 10 Mana permanently.

1.name: Vengeful Roots
1.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.
1.longDescription: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

1.name: Emerald Dreams
1.description: Entangling Roots Sleeps enemy Heroes for 2 seconds after its Root expires.
1.longDescription: Entangling Roots Sleeps enemy Heroes for 2 seconds after its Root expires.

4.name: Rejuvenation
4.description: Casting Regrowth on an ally also grants Malfurion its effect for 50% normal duration.
4.longDescription: Casting Regrowth on an ally also grants Malfurion its effect for 50% normal duration.

4.name: Celestial Alignment
4.description: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.
4.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

4.name: Shan'do's Clarity
4.description: Gain a second charge of Innervate. Its cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.
4.longDescription: Gain a second charge of Innervate. Its cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

7.name: Wild Growth
7.description: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

7.name: Tenacious Roots
7.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

7.name: Nature's Cure
7.description: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.
7.longDescription: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.
10.longDescription: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Nature's Swiftness
13.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.
13.longDescription: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

13.name: Hindering Moonfire
13.description: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Revitalize
13.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 80 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 80 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.
16.longDescription: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

16.name: Nature's Balance
16.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

16.name: Moonlit Harmony
16.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 25% and 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.
20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 25% and 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Lifebloom
20.description: Casting Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.
20.longDescription: Casting Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

20.name: Lunar Shower
20.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.
20.longDescription: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

1.name: Guitar Hero
1.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100  Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100 Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

1.name: Block Party
1.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.
1.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain. If no enemies are hit, reduce the cooldown by 5 seconds and refund the Mana cost.
4.longDescription: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain. If Powerslide hits no enemies, then reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund its Mana cost.

4.name: Loud Speakers
4.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.
4.longDescription: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

4.name: Speed Metal
4.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.
7.longDescription: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Hammer-on
7.description: While Guitar Solo is active your Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage.
7.longDescription: While Guitar Solo is active, Basic Attacks deal 30% bonus damage.

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.
7.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.  Passive: Each enemy Hero hit by Face Melt or the Amp reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.
13.longDescription: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later. Enemy Heroes knocked back by Face Melt or the Amp reduce E.T.C.’s Heroic cooldown by 5%.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

16.name: Show Stopper
16.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.
16.longDescription: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

16.name: Aggressive Shredding
16.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 second.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its Slow is increased by 30%.
20.longDescription: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger. Increase the Slow amount of Stage Dive by 30%.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.
20.longDescription: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

1.name: Live and Let Live
1.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 125% faster.
1.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

1.name: Circle of Life
1.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.
1.longDescription: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.name: Flames of Fury
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Flame Buffet from 50 to 40.  Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Flame Buffet from 50 to 40.  Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Surge of Vitality
4.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Heat Exhaustion
4.description: Increase Flame Buffet's Slow from 40% to 50% and cause it to no longer decay.
4.longDescription: Increase Flame Buffet's Slow from 40% to 50% and cause it to no longer decay.

4.name: Exuberance
4.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.
4.longDescription: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Lifeblossom
7.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.  Passive: Reduces the cost of Gift of Life to 10% of Alexstrasza's current Health.
7.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.  Passive: Reduces the cost of Gift of Life to 10% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

7.name: Verdant Flourish
7.description: Alexstrasza receives 40% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.
7.longDescription: Alexstrasza receives 40% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.name: Fire Within
7.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.name: Life-Binder
10.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.
10.longDescription: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.name: Cleansing Flame
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.name: Dragon Scales
13.description: Gain 50 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 50 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Pacify
13.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.name: Life Unbound
13.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.name: Tough Love
16.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 30 Armor for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 30 Armor for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Overprotective
16.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 70% of the amount healed.
16.longDescription: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 70% of the amount healed.

16.name: Draconic Discipline
16.description: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 6 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 6 seconds.

20.name: Ritual of Life
20.description: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.

20.name: On Ruby Wings
20.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.
20.longDescription: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

20.name: Ancient Flame
20.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet.
20.longDescription: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet.

20.name: Blessing of the Red
20.description: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.
20.longDescription: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

abilities.name: Dragonqueen
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health. While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Abilities are empowered, her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her, and the duration of incoming Slows, Roots, and Stuns is reduced by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds.Type: Transformation, Status effect / Physical Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Self / Enemies / Allied HeroesTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack Modifier, Channeled cast (stationary), CC-reduction, Splash, StasisCast time: 1.25 (ch) + 0.5 secondsAttack damage: 143Attack speed: 0.8Attack range: 9.0Splash arc: 50 degreesInterrupting Dragonqueen during its cast puts it on a 10-second cooldown.Dragonqueen grants Alexstrasza a different set of Basic Abilities, which have independent cooldowns and are unaffected by Alexstrasza's Talents that interact with her base form Basic Abilities.The moment the ability is successfully cast, and upon transformation back to base form, Alexstrasza enters a special Stasis for 0.5 seconds, removing most debuffs and becoming immune to damage and untargetable for this period.Both current and maximum Health are increased upon successful transformation. When the Ability expires, only maximum Health is reduced back to normal.Dragonqueen's cooldown starts when the Ability is successfully cast.

abilities.name: Flame Buffet
abilities.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds. Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.Dragonqueen: Wing BuffetDamage and Knockback enemies in an arc.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Damage over Time, Piercing Skillshot, SlowCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 12Hitbox: 1.35 x 2.6Missile speed: 24Tickrate: 1.0 per second (x5)Damage per tick: 12Always returns 50 Mana if hitting at least one Burning target, even if Flames of Fury was taken.

abilities.name: Wing Buffet
abilities.description: Deal 162 damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, KnockbackCast time: 0.25 + 0 secondsRange: 3.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 7.8 (maximum)Arc: 50 degreesKnockback duration: 0.3125 secondsKnockback speed: 16.5The area starts at 3 radius and grows to its maximum radius over 0.3125 seconds.

abilities.name: Life-Binder
abilities.description: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. Both she and her target are healed for 480 over 2 seconds. Afterward, the Hero with a lower percentage of health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.Type: HealingScaling: 4.00% (over time)/ - (end)Affects: Allied Heroes, SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Delayed HealCast time: 0 + 0.1875 secondsRange: 6.0Tickrate: 4.0 per second (x8)Heal per tick: 60Life-Binder immediately ends, going on full cooldown, if either of the two linked Heroes dies, becomes Time Stopped, enters a Vehicle or hostile Stasis or otherwise becomes untargetable by friendlyAabilities.The heal resolves normally if the target ally enters a friendly Stasis effect, like Ice-Block or Bunker. However, the Ability still ends if Alexstrasza herself enters Stasis through means other than her Dragonqueen transformation.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flame
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop fireballs at the position of your mouse cursor every 1.2 seconds for 6 seconds. Each fireball restores 300 Health to nearby allied Heroes, and deals 135 damage to nearby enemies. 2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of your mouse cursor.Type: Spell Damage / Healing / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / Allied Heroes / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), StasisCast time: - Base form: 1.25 (ch) + 0 seconds- Dragonqueen: InstantRange: 20 (retarget)Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.0Interrupting Cleansing Flame during its cast period puts it on a 10-second cooldown.Cleansing Flame's cooldown starts when the Ability is successfully cast.Dragonqueen's duration is paused during Cleansing Flame but its cooldowns are not.If cast during Dragonqueen, heals Alexstrasza for 500 + 4%/level at the end of the effect.Casting this Ability using the Command Queue system (Shift + R by default) lets her immediately travel globally at the start of the Ability (begins centered at the position of the mouse cursor when the Ability is actually cast no matter where on the Battleground that is) but then locks her to within the circle around that location for the duration of the Ability.

1.name: Swift as the Wind
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Agile Dismount
1.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 14 seconds.
1.longDescription: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 14 seconds.

1.name: Pathfinder
1.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

4.name: Shuriken Mastery
4.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.  Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.  Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

4.name: Strike At The Heart
4.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 134 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second.
4.longDescription: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 134 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second.

4.name: Dragon Claw
4.description: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
4.longDescription: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

7.name: Augmented Guard
7.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 100% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 100% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

7.name: Perfect Defense
7.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

7.name: Cyber Shield
7.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

7.name: Dodge
7.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 7 seconds.
7.longDescription: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 7 seconds.

10.name: Dragonblade
10.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: X-Strike
10.description: Perform two slashes dealing 145 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.
10.longDescription: Perform two slashes dealing 145 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

13.name: Shingan
13.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

13.name: Flow Like Water
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

13.name: Way Of The Shimada
13.description: Increase Genji's Basic Attack range by 1.  Each time Genji hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase his Basic Attack damage by 1% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 15%.
13.longDescription: Increase Genji's Basic Attack range by 1.  Each time Genji hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase his Basic Attack damage by 1% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

16.name: Reflect
16.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.
16.longDescription: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

16.name: Final Cut
16.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.
16.longDescription: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

16.name: Steady Blade
16.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.
16.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
20.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If a Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.
20.longDescription: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If a Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

20.name: Living Weapon
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Sharpened Stars
20.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.
20.longDescription: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: Zanshin
20.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.  Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.  Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Cyber Agility
abilities.description: Activate to jump to the target area.Type: Movement: LaunchAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 7.0Duration: 0.5625 seconds

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 damage to the first enemy hit.Stores up to 3 charges.
