abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 damage.Type: Spell Damage / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No target, Automatic (closest)Properties: Mobile channel, ProtectedCast time: InstantRadius: 7.0Genji cannot use Basic Attacks while Deflect is active. Using other Abilities instantly ends Deflect.Cannot target enemies out of vision.Damage over Time effects and Abilities that deal periodic damage proc Deflect on every tick of damage.If the channel gets interrupted by a Stun or a Silence, the damage of the Ability that caused the interruption still gets deflected.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 190 damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes who die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and Mana cost to be refunded.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, ClampingCast time: 0 + 0.125 secondsRange: 12Hitbox: 1.0 x 3.99Duration: 0.1875 secondsKilling Hallucinations does not grant the cooldown reset or Mana refund.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 damage.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No target (initial), Point target (reactivate)Properties: Area of Effect, ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 3.0 (dash)Area of Effect: RadialRadius: 5.0Arc: 180Missile speed: 16 (dash)Dragonblade replaces Shuriken for its duration and can be reactivated with both the 'Q' and 'R' keys. Deflect, Swift Strike and Cyber Agility can be used normally during Dragonblade.

abilities.name: X-Strike
abilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 145 damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 damage to enemies in their area.Type: Spell Damage / Movement: Teleport, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Pseudo-StasisCast time: InstantRange: 8.0Area of Effect: Rectangle (slashes) (1Width: 1.0 (1Height: 16 (11) Slash AoEs consist of a 1.0 x 6.0 rectangle in the middle and 1.0 x 5.0 triangles on both ends.Slashes are aligned 45 degrees to both sides from the direction Genji is facing, the first slash hitting from rear left to front right. Genji turns toward the target point before the Ability is cast.The first two strikes take place at 0.3125 second intervals and the final strike 0.5625 seconds later.For the duration of the slash animation (1.3125 seconds), Genji is put in a Pseudo-Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage.Self-casting the Ability slightly moves Genji forward.

1.name: Impaling Light
1.description: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 75% and its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.
1.longDescription: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 75% and its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.

1.name: Consuming Flame
1.description: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 125% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.
1.longDescription: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 125% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.

1.name: Burn The Impure
1.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
1.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

4.name: Sovereign Armor
4.description: Molten Armor grants 20 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Molten Armor grants 20 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.

4.name: Battle Hunger
4.description: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 80%.
4.longDescription: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 80%.

4.name: Press Forward
4.description: Gain 10 Armor while being healed by a Regeneration Globe.  Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).
4.longDescription: Gain 10 Armor while being healed by a Regeneration Globe.  Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).

7.name: Flash of Anger
7.description: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 150 (+4% per level) damage to the target and nearby enemies and grants Imperius a 250 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 150 (+4% per level) damage to the target and nearby enemies and grants Imperius a 250 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blaze of Glory
7.description: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 185 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.
7.longDescription: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 185 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.

7.name: Holy Fervor
7.description: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.  Passive: Casting Molten Armor grants Holy Fervor for 2 Basic Attacks.
7.longDescription: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.  Passive: Casting Molten Armor grants Holy Fervor for 2 Basic Attacks.

10.name: Angelic Armaments
10.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 850 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.
10.longDescription: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 850 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

10.name: Wrath of the Angiris
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

13.name: Pathetic Mortals
13.description: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their Movement Speed by 25% and their damage by 50% for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their Movement Speed by 25% and their damage by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Divine Rage
13.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.
13.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.

13.name: Heat of Battle
13.description: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.
13.longDescription: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.

16.name: Celestial Swiftness
16.description: Gain 20% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.
16.longDescription: Gain 20% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

16.name: Melting Touch
16.description: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Valorous Pursuit
16.description: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

20.name: Heavenly Host
20.description: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.
20.longDescription: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: Unrelenting Descent
20.description: Descending from the Heavens restores 30% of Imperius' maximum Health and Mana. Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Descending from the Heavens restores 30% of Imperius' maximum Health and Mana. Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 10 seconds.

20.name: Brand of Solarion
20.description: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 5 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.
20.longDescription: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 5 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

20.name: Impervious
20.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Valorous Brand
abilities.description: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for 10 seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing 20% bonus damage per mark and healing for 75 per mark.Type: Offensive damage modifier, HealingScaling: 4.00% (heal)Affects: SelfProperties: Attack ModifierMarks are consumed even if Imperius is Blinded or if the target is Evading (being wasted, as no damage is dealt or healing occurs, except through specific Talents mentioned below).A Hero can not be marked by the same Basic Ability more than once at a time. Further applications refresh the duration.Stacks additively with itself and other Physical Damage modifiers.

abilities.name: Celestial Charge
abilities.description: Lunge toward a targeted direction and stab, dealing 35 damage. abilities.name: Solarion's Fire
abilities.description: Release a fiery wave that deals 110 damage. abilities.name: Molten Armor

abilities.name: Angelic Armaments
abilities.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 850 Shield for 3 seconds. If the Shield lasts the full duration, this Ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 damage to the first enemy hit.Type: Shield / Spell DamageScaling: 4.00% (both)Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No target / Point targetProperties: SkillshotCast time: Instant / 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 11.25Hitbox: 1.0 x 1.5Missile speed: 28Sword spacing: 1.5Launch delay: 0.3125 seconds

abilities.name: Wrath of the Angiris
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 damage and Stunning them for 1 second.Type: Spell Damage, Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes (damage, cc) / Enemy Heroes & Self (status effect)Targeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Skillshot, Stasis (in air), Stun, Unstoppable (dash)Cast time: 0.75 + 0 secondsRange: 6Hitbox: 2.0 x 2.0Leap speed: 30Hitbox displacement: 1 (forward)Air movement speed: 5Interrupting the ability during its cast puts it on a 10-second cooldown.Doesn't affect Vehicles.While in air both Heroes are put in Stasis, removing most debuffs from them and making them immune to damage.Landing location can't be steered over unpathable terrain.Upon landing, the target enemy Hero is placed at the center of the indicator, facing Imperius. 1.name: Once Again the First Time
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2, and increase Echo damage to 45%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2, and increase Echo damage to 45%.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 1%, up to 20%.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Dragon's Breath by 4 seconds and its Mana cost from 65 to 40.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 1%, up to 20%.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Dragon's Breath by 4 seconds and its Mana cost from 65 to 40.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Gain 10% Spell Power and reduce the arming time of Time Traps by 0.75 seconds. Activate to reveal the targeted area for 4 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Gain 10% Spell Power and reduce the arming time of Time Traps by 0.75 seconds. Activate to reveal the targeted area for 4 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Chronic Conditions
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Time Troubles
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 15 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 30 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 15 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Andorhal Anomaly
4.description: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.

7.name: Bronze Talons
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes grants 50% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes grants 50% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Dragon's Breath deals 30% bonus damage to enemies hit by its center.  Enemy Heroes hit by its center are Slowed by 60% for 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Dragon's Breath deals 30% bonus damage to enemies hit by its center.  Enemy Heroes hit by its center are Slowed by 60% for 0.75 seconds.

7.name: A Proper Greeting
7.description: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 20% additional damage for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 20% additional damage for 3 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 10% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.
10.longDescription: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 10% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.
10.longDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

13.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
13.description: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.
13.longDescription: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.
13.longDescription: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Chromie's primary Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Chromie's primary Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Chromie's primary Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.
16.longDescription: If Chromie's primary Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 30% for 8 seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Spell Power by 30% for 8 seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.

20.name: Unravelling
20.description: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 10 up to 50. Slowing Sands persists for 5 seconds after it is cancelled.
20.longDescription: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 10 up to 50. Slowing Sands persists for 5 seconds after it is cancelled.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.
20.longDescription: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blasts cast from Chromie and her Echoes now pierce all enemies hit.
20.longDescription: Sand Blasts cast from Chromie and her Echoes now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: Blessing of the Bronze
20.description: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by 1 second.

abilities.name: Timewalker
abilities.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!

abilities.name: Detonate Time Trap
abilities.description: Detonate active Time Traps.Type: Status effectAffects: Allied & Enemy Heroes, SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Time StopCast time: InstantRange: GlobalArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 2.0Detonate Time Trap is put on cooldown every time a new Time Trap is placed.

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, fire a missile that deals 305 damage to the first enemy hit. abilities.name: Time Trap

abilities.name: Slowing Sands

Stacks are reset immediately when the affected Hero leaves the area.0.75 Mana is consumed per tick.

abilities.name: Temporal Loop
abilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.Type: Crowd ControlAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Displacement, Unremovable debuffCast time: 0.1875 + 0 secondsRange: 8.0Temporal Loop cannot be removed, but its displacement effect will be prevented if the target is Unstoppable when it triggers.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Egg Hunt
1.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.name: A Fishy Deal
1.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.
1.longDescription: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

4.name: Slime Time
4.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.name: Tufferfish
4.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.
4.longDescription: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

4.name: Living the Dream
4.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.
4.longDescription: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

7.name: Black Lagoon
7.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.
7.longDescription: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

7.name: Slippery When Wet
7.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Time to Krill
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.name: Octo-Grab
10.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.
10.longDescription: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
13.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

13.name: Egg Shell
13.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.
13.longDescription: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

13.name: Fish Tank
13.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.
13.longDescription: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

16.name: Toxic Buildup
16.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.name: Fish Oil
16.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.
16.longDescription: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.name: Wrath of Cod
16.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
20.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.
20.longDescription: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
20.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).
20.longDescription: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
20.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.
20.longDescription: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.name: Making Inky
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Spawn Egg
abilities.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. abilities.name: Slime

abilities.name: Pufferfish

1.name: Free Drinks
1.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.
1.longDescription: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

1.name: Serpent Sidekick
1.description: Cloud Serpent no longer costs Mana and while Fast Feet is active its cooldown refreshes an additional 75% faster.
1.longDescription: Cloud Serpent no longer costs Mana and while Fast Feet is active its cooldown refreshes an additional 75% faster.

1.name: Eager Adventurer
1.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 150% and increase Mana regeneration by 150% while Fast Feet is active.
1.longDescription: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 150% and increase Mana regeneration by 150% while Fast Feet is active.

4.name: Wind Serpent
4.description: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased Movement Speed. Casting Blinding Wind increases this bonus to 20% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Cloud Serpent attacks 25% faster.
4.longDescription: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased Movement Speed. Casting Blinding Wind increases this bonus to 20% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Cloud Serpent attacks 25% faster.

4.name: Surging Winds
4.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

4.name: Safety Sprint
4.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet, 30 Armor, and 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.  Passive: While Fast Feet is active, Li Li gains 10 Armor.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain Fast Feet, 30 Armor, and 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.  Passive: While Fast Feet is active, Li Li gains 10 Armor.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.
7.longDescription: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Mass Vortex
7.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.
7.longDescription: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

7.name: Let's Go!
7.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 160 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.
7.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 160 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Lightning Serpent
13.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.
13.longDescription: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.

13.name: Gale Force
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's Blind duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 100% increased damage.
13.longDescription: Increase Blinding Wind's Blind duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 100% increased damage.

13.name: Hindering Winds
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's Slow amount to 30% and its duration to 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Blinding Wind's Slow amount to 30% and its duration to 2 seconds.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.
16.longDescription: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.
16.longDescription: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings Of Yu'lon
16.description: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased healing received and heals them for an additional 0.5% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.
16.longDescription: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased healing received and heals them for an additional 0.5% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.
20.longDescription: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.
20.longDescription: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Shake It Off
20.description: Gain 35 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted.  Passive: Increase Fast Feet's cooldown refresh rate to 75%
20.longDescription: Gain 35 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted.  Passive: Increase Fast Feet's cooldown refresh rate to 75%

1.name: Vigor
1.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.
1.longDescription: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.name: Subtlety
1.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Readiness
1.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Crippling Poison
1.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.
1.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

4.name: Relentless Strikes
4.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.
4.longDescription: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

4.name: Hemorrhage
4.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.
4.longDescription: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.name: Initiative
4.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.
4.longDescription: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.
4.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

7.name: Mutilate
7.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.
7.longDescription: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.name: Fatal Finesse
7.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.
7.longDescription: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.name: Slice and Dice
7.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.
7.longDescription: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

10.name: Smoke Bomb
10.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 60 Armor, reducing damage taken by 60%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
10.longDescription: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 60 Armor, reducing damage taken by 60%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

10.name: Cloak of Shadows
10.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
10.longDescription: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

13.name: Death From Above
13.description: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

13.name: Blind
13.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Strangle
13.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Seal Fate
16.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

16.name: Assassinate
16.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.
16.longDescription: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

16.name: Thistle Tea
16.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.
16.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

20.name: Adrenaline Rush
20.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.
20.longDescription: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

20.name: Enveloping Shadows
20.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.
20.longDescription: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

20.name: Rupture
20.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.
20.longDescription: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

20.name: Elusiveness
20.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.
20.longDescription: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

abilities.name: Vanish

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.
4.longDescription: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.
4.longDescription: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 40%.
7.longDescription: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 40%.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.
13.longDescription: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 10 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.
20.longDescription: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

1.name: Target Practice
1.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

1.name: Simple Geometry
1.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

1.name: Redemption
1.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

4.name: Explosive Arrows
4.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.
4.longDescription: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.

4.name: Serrated Arrows
4.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
4.longDescription: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Ignore All Distractions
4.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

7.name: The Dragon Hungers
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 12 seconds, stacking up to 20%.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 12 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

7.name: Never Outmatched
7.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.

7.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 3 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 3 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

10.name: Dragonstrike
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 75% increased damage.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 75% increased damage.

10.name: Dragon's Arrow
10.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

13.name: Fleet of Foot
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ninja Assassin
13.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.
13.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

13.name: Mounted Archery
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Summon Mount by 2 seconds.  Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Summon Mount by 2 seconds.  Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

16.name: Flawless Technique
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 40%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 40%.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 40%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 40%.

16.name: Piercing Arrows
16.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.
16.longDescription: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

16.name: Giant Slayer
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: The Dragon Awakens
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.

20.name: Play of the Game
20.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.
20.longDescription: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

20.name: Bullseye
20.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Perfect Agility
20.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Natural Agility
abilities.description: Target unpathable terrain or a Structure to jump to the other side of it.Type: Movement: LaunchAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 9.0Leap duration: 0.6875 secondsNatural Agility cannot be used, if there is no unpathatble terrain between Hanzo and target point, or if there are no viable landing spots in range.Hanzo cannot use Natural Agility to jump over pathing blockers or friendly Gates.Hanzo always lands at 2 range from the edge of the terrain, regardless of its width.

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled. Reactivate to fire.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Targeting: Point targetProperties: Mobile channel, Clamping, SkillshotCast time: 0 + CH + 0 secondsRange: - Minimum: 6.0- Maximum: 13Maximum channel: 1.25 secondsStorm Bow can be channeled indefinitely, but its range stops increasing after 1.25 seconds.Cooldown starts once Storm Bow is reactivated.Timing a Basic Attack right before Storm Bow ignores the cooldown of the first Basic Attack, which will cause a second Basic Attack to be launched right after Storm Bow is cast.The Command Queue system (by default, shift) may be used to hold the range increase from this Ability indefinitely by continuing to hold down that key (bypassing the 1.25 second channel needed to extend its range normally). However, this means Hanzo cannot do anything but move and cast Storm Bow while taking advantage of this.

abilities.name: Scatter Arrow

1.name: Volatile Acid
1.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding.
1.longDescription: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding.

1.name: Corpse Feeders
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings have 30% more Health.
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings have 30% more Health.

1.name: Infest
1.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 125% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.
1.longDescription: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 125% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

4.name: Envenomed Spines
4.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

4.name: Medusa Blades
4.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

4.name: Serrated Spines
4.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.2%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.2%.

7.name: Baneling Massacre
7.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings Barrage, but increase its cooldown by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings Barrage, but increase its cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Viscous Acid
7.description: Banelings Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Banelings Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Bile Drop
7.description: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.
7.longDescription: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

10.name: Devouring Maw
10.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 94 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 94 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

10.name: Nydus Network
10.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.

13.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
13.description: Zagara is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.
13.longDescription: Zagara is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

13.name: Protective Coating
13.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.
13.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Corrosive Saliva
16.description: When attacking Heroes, Hunter Killers and Roachlings deal additional damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When attacking Heroes, Hunter Killers and Roachlings deal additional damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Mutalisk
16.description: Reduce the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 4 seconds.  Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.
16.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 4 seconds.  Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

16.name: Jagged Barbs
16.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 50% more Basic Attack damage and her attack range is increased by 1.1.
16.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 50% more Basic Attack damage and her attack range is increased by 1.1.

20.name: Tyrant Maw
20.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.name: Endless Creep
20.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.
20.longDescription: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

20.name: Broodmother
20.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack also launches a Baneling towards the target.
20.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack also launches a Baneling towards the target.

20.name: Pack Instinct
20.description: Zagara and her summons deal 20% more damage to enemies attacked by a Hunter Killer in the last 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Zagara and her summons deal 20% more damage to enemies attacked by a Hunter Killer in the last 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Creep Tumor
abilities.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara moves 20% faster and her summons move 30% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds and reveal the surrounding area while active.Stores up to 3 charges.Type: SummonTargeting: Point targetCast time: 0.2 + 0 secondsRange: 2.5Bonus attack range: 1.1Creep TumorType: PassiveScaling: 4.00% (Health)Properties: StealthHealth: 125Basic Attack damage: -Movement Speed: -Unit radius: 0.5Sight radius: 7.0Leash radius: -Creep buff radius: 6.0Creep grows to its maximum radius over 6 seconds.Creep areas can overlap, but Creep Tumors cannot be placed exactly on top of each other.Creep Tumors become Invisible after 2 seconds of being placed.Damaging Creep Tumors reveals them for 2 seconds.Sight radius increases to 8.5 when the Creep Tumor turns invisible.Creep Tumors are permanently Unstoppable, immune to skillshots and friendly Abilities and do not draw Minion aggro.In the event there are multiple Zagaras in a team, they can fully interact with Creep placed by each other.

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 2 Banelings that deal 80 damage to the enemies they hit.Stores up to 2 charges.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Clamping, Summon figment, Skillshot, SplashCast time: InstantRange: 15.75Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Hitbox: 1.0- Explosion: 2.75Missile speed: 6.0Banelings explode at the end of their range.Banelings benefit from on-Creep Movement Speed bonus.Enemies that are immune to skillshots can still be hit by the explosion damage.

abilities.name: Nydus Network
abilities.description: Charge Cooldown: 120 / 2.0 seconds Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.Type: Summon / Healing, Status effectScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: Point target targetProperties: Attack modifier, StasisCast time: InstantRange: GlobalTickrate: 5.0 per secondHealing per tick: 1.95% (of max Health)Bonus Creep radius: 0.9Bonus Creep sight radius: 2.0Nydus WormType: PassiveScaling: 4.00% (Health)Targeting: AutomaticHealth: 550Basic Attack damage: -Movement Speed: -Unit radius: 0.75Sight radius: 10.0Leash radius: -Zagara can cast Nydus Network while inside a Nydus Worm. 1.name: Contact Healing
1.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.
1.longDescription: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

1.name: Slumber Shells
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sleep Dart by 2 seconds. Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Sleep Dart by 2 seconds. Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Rounds
1.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero or Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses.  Reward: Stack 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.  Reward: Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero or Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses.  Reward: Stack 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.  Reward: Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.

4.name: Biotic Enhancements
4.description: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Overdose
4.description: Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses.  While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses.  While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.

4.name: Debilitating Dart
4.description: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Anti-Healer
7.description: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Night Terrors
7.description: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds for every Hero hit by Sleep Dart. Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 8% of their Maximum Health in damage.
7.longDescription: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds for every Hero hit by Sleep Dart. Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 8% of their Maximum Health in damage.

7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
7.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.
7.longDescription: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

10.name: Nano Boost
10.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.
10.longDescription: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

10.name: Eye of Horus
10.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.
10.longDescription: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

13.name: Speed Serum
13.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

13.name: Purifying Darts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

13.name: Smelling Salts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

16.name: Sharpshooter
16.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.
16.longDescription: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

16.name: Concentrated Doses
16.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

16.name: Active Reload
16.description: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.
16.longDescription: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

20.name: Nano Infusion
20.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

20.name: Deadeye
20.description: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.
20.longDescription: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

20.name: Armored Stance
20.description: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.
20.longDescription: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.

20.name: Dynamic Optics
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by 4.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by 4.

abilities.name: Shrike
abilities.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing 40 damage over 5 seconds plus additional damage equal to the current number of stacks on the target, stacking up to 5 times. Every 0.5 seconds, Ana is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Shrike.Type: Spell Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfProperties: Attack Modifier, Damage over TimeTickrate: 2.0 per second (x10)Damage per tick: 4.0 (per stack)Self-healing from Shrike behaves like lifesteal, but can be affected by healing dealt modifiers, including Biotic Grenade's healing bonus.A distinctive sound effect plays when an enemy reaches the maximum of 5 stacks.Aim Down SightsCooldown: 4 secondsActivating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by 25%, but increases the range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by 25% while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.Targeting: No target (toggle)Cast time: InstantBonus Healing Dart range: 3.1875Bonus Sleep Dart Range: 2.9375Movement Speed reduction behaves like a Slow, but does not interact with effects that interact with Slows nor get removed by effects that grant crowd control immunity.

abilities.name: Healing Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 195 Health. abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Toss a Grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for 152 Health and receive 25% increased healing from Ana for 4 seconds. abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds. abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana.
