abilities.name: Eye of Horus
abilities.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 and enemies are damaged for 135. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.Targeting: No targetProperties: Stationary channelCast time: 0.0625 + CH + 0Range: GlobalArea of Effect: CircleEye of Horus can be canceled after 0.5 seconds through the 'W' or 'E' key.If Eye of Horus is canceled or interrupted before any shots are fired, it will not be put on cooldown.Ana cannot move, Mount, Hearth or use other abilities while channeling Eye of Horus.Channel can last indefinitely and will only end if interrupted, manually canceled or once all shots have been fired.

abilities.name: Eye of Horus - High Powered Round
abilities.description: Fire a specialized round with unlimited range, piercing all allied and enemy Heroes in its path. Allies are healed for 225 and enemies are damaged for 135. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Type: Spell Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes & Structures / Allied HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: InstantRange: GlobalWidth: 1.0 Can be activated using the 'Q', 'R' or left mouse button during Eye of Horus.Using High Powered Round briefly provides vision around the line of fire and upon hitting around the targets.

1.name: Echo of the Elements
1.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.
1.longDescription: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

1.name: Crash Lightning
1.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.
1.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: For 8 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them grants a stack of Frostwolf Resilience. If the target is an enemy Hero, then he also deals damage to them equal to 3% of their maximum Health and healing for the same amount.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.
1.longDescription: For 8 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them grants a stack of Frostwolf Resilience. If the target is an enemy Hero, then he also deals damage to them equal to 3% of their maximum Health and healing for the same amount.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

4.name: Feral Resilience
4.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.
4.longDescription: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

4.name: Frostwolf Pack
4.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
7.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.
7.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.name: Ancestral Wrath
7.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.
7.longDescription: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
13.longDescription: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
13.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.
13.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

13.name: Spirit Shield
13.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 2.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 2.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.
16.longDescription: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Thunderstorm
16.description: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.
16.longDescription: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

16.name: Alpha Wolf
16.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 40 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 40 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Wind Rush
20.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.
20.longDescription: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

abilities.name: Frostwolf Resilience
abilities.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 223 Health.Type: HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Self

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 162 damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 81 damage to each enemy hit.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: BounceCast time: 0.15 + 0 secondsRange: - Primary: 7.0- Bounces: 6.0Bounce interval: 0.375 secondsTargets of secondary bounces are chosen at random from all units in range.Each unit can only be damaged once per cast.

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 153 damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. abilities.name: Sundering

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. 1.name: Force Armor
1.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast and store up to 4 charges.  Passive: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 35% Mana.
1.longDescription: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast and store up to 4 charges.  Passive: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 35% Mana.

1.name: Aether Walker
1.description: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.
1.longDescription: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.

1.name: Power Hungry
1.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

4.name: Charged Blast
4.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Triumvirate
4.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and 40 Mana is refunded.
4.longDescription: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and 40 Mana is refunded.

4.name: Dominance
4.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.
4.longDescription: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

7.name: Seeker
7.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.
7.longDescription: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Zei's Vengeance
7.description: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by 30%. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by 30%. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

7.name: Calamity
7.description: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.
7.longDescription: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

10.name: Disintegrate
10.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.
10.longDescription: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

10.name: Wave Of Force
10.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Illusionist
13.description: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown.  Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%
13.longDescription: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown.  Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

13.name: Cannoneer
13.description: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.
13.longDescription: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Glass Cannon
13.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 20%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.
13.longDescription: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 20%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

16.name: Fireflies
16.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.
16.longDescription: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

16.name: Mirrorball
16.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.
16.longDescription: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

16.name: Arcane Orbit
16.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).
16.longDescription: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).

16.name: Diamond Skin
16.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

20.name: Temporal Flux
20.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.
20.longDescription: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

20.name: Repulsion
20.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
20.description: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.
20.longDescription: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

20.name: Archon: Pure Power
20.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

abilities.name: Critical Mass
abilities.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.This includes all Basic, Heroic and Activatable Abilities, unless otherwise noted.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 damage to the first enemy hit. 1.name: Swift Sweep
1.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

1.name: Increasing Clarity
1.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

1.name: Righteous Assault
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

1.name: Searing Light
1.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.
1.longDescription: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

4.name: Majestic Span
4.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.
4.longDescription: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

4.name: Heavy Burden
4.description: Detainment Strike Slows enemy Heroes by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Slow and duration doubled on enemies it Stuns.
4.longDescription: Detainment Strike Slows enemy Heroes by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Slow and duration doubled on enemies it Stuns.

4.name: Repeated Offense
4.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.
4.longDescription: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

7.name: Glimmer of Hope
7.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.
7.longDescription: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

7.name: Empathic Link
7.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.
7.longDescription: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

7.name: Energized Cord
7.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 120% of the damage against Heroes and 55% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.
7.longDescription: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 120% of the damage against Heroes and 55% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

10.name: Resurrect
10.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 1 second. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 100% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.  Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.
10.longDescription: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 1 second. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 100% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.  Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.

10.name: Crystal Aegis
10.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

13.name: Blinding Flash
13.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

13.name: Converging Force
13.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

13.name: Piercing Lash
13.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Reservoir of Hope
16.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.
16.longDescription: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

16.name: Will of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

16.name: Wrath of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.
16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

20.name: Light Speed
20.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.
20.longDescription: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

20.name: Diamond Resolve
20.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.
20.longDescription: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

20.name: Angelic Flight
20.description: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.
20.longDescription: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

20.name: Shield of Hope
20.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.
20.longDescription: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

While they remain near Auriel, 30% of their damage to Heroes and 10% of their damage to non-Heroes is converted to energy. Auriel can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time.Auriel can store up to 475 energy.Type: ResourceScaling: 4.00% (max Energy)Affects: Allied HeroesTargeting: Unit targetCast time: InstantRange: 10Collect radius: 20

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.name: Fel Infusion
1.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.
1.longDescription: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.name: Mana Addict
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.
4.longDescription: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

4.name: Energy Roil
4.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Mana Tap
4.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.
4.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.
7.longDescription: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.
7.longDescription: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
7.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Backdraft
13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.
13.longDescription: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.
16.longDescription: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Ignite
16.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.
16.longDescription: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.  Passive: Kael'thas benefits from all of his level 7 talents.
16.longDescription: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.  Passive: Kael'thas benefits from all of his level 7 talents.

20.name: Rebirth
20.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.
20.longDescription: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.
20.longDescription: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.Affects: AbilityTargeting: No targetProperties: PrimedCast time: InstantCooldown starts when the effect is triggered by casting a Basic Ability.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 345 damage in an area.Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.25 + 0.0625 secondsRange: 10.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: - Base: 2.0- Verdant Spheres: 3.0Delay starts after the cast goes through, making the total time after initiating cast to damage being dealt 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 126 damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.Type: Spell DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Area of Effect, Damage over TimeCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 5.5Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.3Tickrate: 1.0 per second (x3)Damage per tick: 42Living Bomb cannot spread to targets already affected by another Living Bomb.Main target takes damage from both periodic and explosion damage.Explosion damage is displayed in the target unit's Health bar as if it were a DoT, but does not count as one, allowing it to interrupt Weak Channels (e.g. Mounting & Hearthing).If the target dies while affected by Living Bomb, it explodes immediately.Effects that remove DoTs prevent Living Bomb from exploding.

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds with 100% of Nova's current Health that attacks enemies, dealing 10% of Nova's base damage. Whenever a Decoy takes damage it deals that amount to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.Type: SummonTargeting: Point targetCast time: InstantRange: 8.0Holo DecoyType: HallucinationBasic Attack damage: 10.5Snipe damage: 23Pinning Shot damage: 10Pinning Shot Slow: 5%Decoy can use Snipe and Pinning Shot with reduced damage and Slow values. Decoys only use their Abilities against Heroes.If Nova is Stealthed while casting Holo Decoy, the decoy will also be Stealthed and vice versa.Stealthed Decoys only attack Heroes. Unstealthed decoys also attack Structures, Summons and aggroed Mercenaries, but not Minions, unless the Lethal Decoy Talent has been picked.Decoys will immediately attack the closest visible enemy Hero when one comes in its range and mimics Nova's Basic Abilities in the following order: Pinning Shot > Snipe > Basic Attack.Killing a Decoy grants no XP or Takedown credit.Decoy benefits from all of Nova's non-active Talents, unless otherwise noted.Decoy has its own base damage values, causing the damage reduction percentage to stack multiplicatively with offensive damage modifiers, but displays the floating damage text as if it were from the real Nova (full damage value).

abilities.name: Triple Tap

Exceptionally, this Reveal persists through Unrevealable Stealth.

abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. 1.name: Winds of Celerity
1.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

1.name: Raven's Intellect
1.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.
1.longDescription: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

1.name: Portal Mastery
1.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.
1.longDescription: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

4.name: Mage Armor
4.description: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 30%.
4.longDescription: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 30%.

4.name: Raven Familiar
4.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Dust of Appearance
4.description: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.
4.longDescription: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

7.name: Mystic Assault
7.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 50% more damage and heals for 50% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 50% more damage and heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Arcane Explosion
7.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.
7.longDescription: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.

7.name: Force of Magic
7.description: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.
7.longDescription: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

10.name: Poly Bomb
10.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.
10.longDescription: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Ley Line Seal
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

13.name: Circle of Protection
13.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Enduring Will
13.description: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

13.name: Reabsorption
13.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.
13.longDescription: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

16.name: Arcane Charge
16.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.
16.longDescription: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

16.name: Temporal Flux
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 9%.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 9%.

16.name: Stable Portal
16.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.
16.longDescription: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
20.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.
20.longDescription: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.name: Medivh Cheats!
20.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
20.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.
20.longDescription: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.name: Arcane Brilliance
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

20.name: Dust of Disappearance
20.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Stores up to 2 charges.
20.longDescription: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Raven Form
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfProperties: Immune to damage, Movement Speed, UntargetableSight radius: 7.0Medivh has reduced sight radius during Raven Form.Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus is increased to 40% while within and for 5 seconds after leaving the Hall of Storms. This applies even if Medivh casts a max range Portal from the Hall of Storms, takes it, and then Mounts, letting him reach the frontlines significantly faster.Medivh cannot be targeted by allied or enemy effects while Mounted, but any effects applied beforehand persist for their duration.Using Abilities causes Medivh to leave Raven Form. Medivh cannot leave Raven Form, and thus also not use Abilities, while above unpathable terrain.Medivh can pick up and receive Regeneration Globes and use Healing Fountain in Raven Form.Medivh can collect Experience Globes while in Raven Form.

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.description: Launch a rift that deals 170 damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.❢  Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.❢ Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.Type: Spell Damage / Bonus damageScaling: 4.00% (base) / - (quest)Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.125 + 0 secondsRange: 10Hitbox: 2.25 x 1.5Missile speed: 27

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds. Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target 20% of the damage it absorbed.Type: Status effect, HealingScaling: -Affects: Allied Heroes, SelfTargeting: Unit targetProperties: ProtectedCast time: InstantRange: 13Healing is calculated from the final damage taken, after all damage modifiers.Damage from Basic Attacks that miss due to innate Evasion from Protected-status counts toward damage absorbed and healing.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.Type: Invulnerable SummonAffects: Allied Heroes, SelfTargeting: Point targetCast time: 0.125 + 0.1 secondsRange: - Min: 7.0- Max: 16Radius: 0.5Allied Heroes have to perform a 0.25 second Waygate Channel to enter the Portal. The channel is interrupted if the target is Stunned, Rooted, Dazed, put in Stasis or killed.Active Portals grant vision in 3.0 radius.Taking a Portal clears all of the Hero's queued commands.If a Hero dies from Area of Effect damage during the Waygate Channel, but it is not otherwise interrupted, the Channel will still complete, which is relevant for Heroes with Special Death States (e.g. Leoric, Uther, Tyrael, Gall if taking Psychotic Break).

abilities.name: Poly Bomb
abilities.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.Type: Crowd controlAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Area of Effect, PolymorphCast time: 0.15 + 0 secondsRange: 7.0Area of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.5Poly Bomb can spread to the same target multiple times, but it cannot spread to enemies that were already carrying it.Polymorph counts as a Silence effect. Effects that interact with Silences also interact with Poly Bomb.

abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.Type: Status effectAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Channeled cast (stationary), Time StopCast time: 0.5 (ch) + 0 secondsRange: 14.5Hitbox: 4.0 x 2.9Missile speed: 9.0Interrupting the Ability during its windup puts it on a 10 second cooldown.
